Mr Handyman came promptly at 800am went over the checklist and got to work went through the checklist item by item did not waste anytime worked hard took a 15min break for lunch finished at 430pm Finally after many many months my long list was done in oneday Amazing

I called Mr Handyman in the morning and they sent a technician the same afternoon He arrived his name is Mr White on time with a smile on his face and a professional attitude He was eager to help tackle the two pictures He explained the billing process clearly and began installing the molding He also offered time saving tips since I was charged by the half hour like opening products to be used and arranging them around the room where they needed to be placed Mr White was thorough in centering the frames and installed the undercounter lights neatly and quickly I was well pleased with these services and will call them today for another project

We were very pleased with our experience The handyman did a great job and there were three things that stood out for us 1 Punctuality and promptness start to finish I got a fast callback after I submitted my inquiry on the web and the handyman was right on time 2 We really felt like he was trying to do his best for us  pointing out things that could be done on our own easily and mentioning a couple of roofing issues that he discovered while cleaning the gutters and was able to fix right away We appreciated the honesty and felt like they were really intending to provide us value for our money 3 He even gave us some tips on how to do a couple of jobs that we plan to do ourselves bettermore easily We will definitely call them again the next time we have a need for handyman services
They come on time they clean up after themselves and they do the work with minimal hassle They have came out twice and I would reccomend them highly

First of all I submitted a request for service online and literally someone called me within a half hour of my request The person who called me was the owner and he was extremely nice The handyman comes in a market van and he worked very neatly and was very professional He seemed able to do a lot of things He did an excellent job on the guest room   and the repairs needed were pretty extensive He was unable to repair the ceiling fan because it needed a part it wasnt the easiest to troubleshoot   but I felt he understood all the possible issues and worked to isolate the problem All in all I just found it so nice that in one phone call you could have multiple projects done   so simple
the fix was perfect Technician was on time and creative in the fix

Mr Handyman was outstanding The work was finished timely and the estimates were close to the actual bill It was wonderful to have Mr Handyman fix the issues that came with my new home allowing me to come home and relax
Great They came when they said and did the work quickly and well

He was great The whole experience with this company was great the went way beyond what most companies would do Since I live out of state they made me feel very confident about my property I will use them again and recommend the to others in that area

Mr Handyman called me back After I explained what I need to have done he told me that this particular job really required a licensed plumber So he gave me a referral to a plumber and I have been very happy with the referral I really appreciated Mr Handymans honesty professionalism anmd integrity

The service is extremely professional and convenient to use Great for an out of town landlord They take time to explain work etc Rates are high given that Ive found good handy men for 50hr etc However if you need to insure you get a dependable and trustworthy contractor this is an excellent option
They were very professional responsive and easy to work with in all cases I actually referred them to several of my friends and will use them in the future

He was punctual and very professional and courteous He did an excellent job and even went to the store to get the right shade of paint since the one I had was no longer good He was neat and did not leave a mess I was very happy with everything that was done
The job went well with good results

Extremely pleased The project turned out better than I ever could have imagined Their professionalism was exceptional I felt comfortable leaving them my keys and they completed the bulk of the work while I was out of town The hourly rate of this company is a bit hirer than others but they are extremely quick efficient and professional in the execution fo the projects I believe in the end the total price is lower than their competitors because they finish projects in much less time and the end results are impeccable

Task1 was installed in two visits First visit involved repair of two 24x30 holes created by removal of two inwall air conditioning units by HVAC contractor Units were in the knee walls of the third floor of our 1935 wood shingle home Chris arrived promptly as scheduled sized up job and worked diligently most of which was on done on the ladder He successfully found a lumberyard that had shingles that matched those on our house primed and painted the installed shingles Work was done so seamlessly that you cant tell where the repairs were made Second visit involved removal of an inwall window size air conditioning unit on the first floor Repairs were made to the exterior shingled wall as well as drywall repair to the interior wall Again Chris was able to find a lumberyard that carried molding that matched the existing interior molding The first two jobs were so well done we consulted with Alan and Chris about Task 2 installing hardwood flooring in our third floor master bedroom Previous owners had converted the attic into a master bedroom suite Original flooring was pine with walltowall carpeting Stairs leading to third floor were also pine Alan estimated material needed and provided suggestions of where to find good quality flooring at reasonable prices Following selection of flooring and stairs we called Alan to schedule installation of the flooring while we were on vacation We returned home to a beautifully installed floor and stairs We had one minor mishap during the flooring installation Sawing of the flooring tripped our smoke alarm Chris immediately called us to let us know what had happened seconds after being called by ADT we were able to arrange for ADT to turn off the alarm To avoid any chance of a recurrence Chris performed all additional sawing outside All work was done extremely professionally and clean up was excellent

On 120 I spoke with Ken and scheduled an appointment for 900 AM on 126 for an estimate When no one arrived by 920 I called the office Ken could not locate the painter and did not know why he did not show up The estimate was recheduled for 127 at 830 When his painter arrived the next day there was no apology offered I showed him the work to be done and he told me Ken would call me the next day I did not get a phone call on 128 so I called Ken on 129 His receptionist told me he would call me right back in a few minutes No phone call I called back 90 minutes later and was told by the receptionist that an estimate would be mailed that day On 22 there was still no estimate I called once more and was told it was mailed last week It is now 8 days later and I still have no estimate verbal or written from this company

This is the best experience I have ever had with a home handyman in 35 years of hiring them I was doubtful based on past experience that this could go very well but was so very pleasantly surprised Not cheap but given that he didnt waste my time or his he had proper equipment and he was knowledgeable I think it was well worth the cost

Chris was on time very polite and professional He completed the job in a timely manner The chair rail looks great He cut each piece at a 45 degree angle so they fit together seamlessly Then he caulked all the nail holes and seams The only problem was that the job took longer than the manager had estimated on the phone so it was more pricey than we originally thought Other than that we were very pleased with the work
Alan and Chris are both experienced contracters and they do superb work They did not waste time were cooperative and friendly
They came and did a whole days worth of work The price was a little high but its hard for a handyman not to charge that much
The person that showed up knew what he was doing He was easy to direct and worked efficiently
Outstanding job Very satisfied
Very well
They were very helpful

They were excellent They had a 4hour minimum They were extremely good Whatever I asked the tech to do he did I would certainly hire him again He cleaned up and everything was left in fine condition The price was good because it would have been difficult to coordinate that many different people to do the various jobs

The time to do the requested jobs was pretty much on target I felt like they were using their time wisely and efficiently This fellow that they sent out clearly knew what he was doing and was able to tick the items off the list that we needed

I called the company on Friday evening and got the answering service who told me the company would be in touch with me on Monday morning They called around 830 AM Monday and asked me to describe the work He told me they charge 13800 for the first hour or fraction thereof and 88 for each additional hour which is billed in 15 minute increments at 22 When I agreed he said they would be out between 100 and 300 PM Monday and would call approximately 12 hour before arriving They called back around 945 AM and said they were running ahead of schedule and could come earlier if it was convenient for me which it was At about 1030 AM the technician arrived I showed him the electric eye and the dryer He set about his work and was finished in about 45 minutes I inspected the work and he did an excellent job I was quite pleased

Very punctual Work was of high quality Although cost of replacing screens was high I cant say if someone who charges by the job would have been less The job took longer then originally thought but removing the old screens was more difficult then expected This was because of the way siding around the area had been attached by someone else The quality of the work was excellent so the cost was worth it Worker was professional and personable I would use them again and plan to in the fall for some jobs we discussed Highly recommended

The deck job that they did for us went very well The price was reasonable and the quality of work was great I had called the company again for another estimate on a different job I talked to the receptionist in the office and she said shed take the message However I never got a call back from the company This was the only bad experience that we had with this company

Mr Handyman showed up at the time appointed dressed in a uniform and driving a Van with a Mr Handyman advertisement on it This was good because I live in a small condominium and it is reassuring to elderly neighbors The AC units had been permanently installed in old casement windows on the 2nd floor so I was very reluctant to tackle the removal on my own He had the units out very quickly and used storm windows to create a replacement pane There was time left so he unclogged some drains which I was very glad because one turned out to be completely rusted through I had to get a different plumber to replace that drain because it is a very old building and we only use one licensed plumber But I had Mr Handyman come back to fix some tiles I also had holes in the ceiling from where the electrician had been Mr Handyman fixed those holes beautifully I could tell this guy had extensive experience with drywall I dealt with Ken on the phone and 2 different guys came out to do the work Ken is very easy to deal with and they are professional I am pleased to have the work done so is my husband I got rid of the honeydo list
The experience was great with the office staff and Alan who was efficient and very professional and explained the process as he was doing the projects

I had a shower installed by a reputable contractor Unfortunately his installation of the shower was not up to code and the drain failed which caused a massive leak in my kitchen ceiling I called Mr Handyman and they sent a technician who replaced the drywall in the ceiling and feathered the edges so that the patch will look like the remainder of the kitchen ceiling It was nice to have a contractor show up on time be experienced clean up and be able to speak and understand English I would highly recommend this company

Excellent experience The process of making the appointment was easy and professional The representative Alan was punctual professional knowledgeable helpful and friendly He showed concern in maximizing the efficient use of time readily answered questions and offered helpful suggestions Would gladly use this firm again and am planning to do so in the future

They gave me an estimate over the phone They were able to do the work sooner than scheduled He hustled and did not waste any time He was helpful knowledgeable and eager to do the work He was honest and did not try to sell me things that I didnt need They are accommodating
They came when they said they were going to come They handyman who came out was very thorough and reliable They did what they said they were gonna do

We called Mr Handyman based on reports in Angies List about a week ago and were able to schedule the work within the week Before Alan appeared the company called to confirm the appointment Alan showed up exactly on time and worked steadily all day long until the job was completed His boss Alan Deitch even appeared early on to see how things were going and stayed for quite awhile to help We were very pleased with the professionalism of the two men who showed up and the excellent job that was done to reroof our shed It is now better than it was when it was new

He arrived on time dressed in uniform with a truck full of what he needed to make that floor perfect He replaced one full sheet of plywood purchasing and hauling a new sheet of plywood up to my third floor no elevator coop and hauled away and disposed of the old sheet of plywood He was pleasant polite knowledgeable and efficient The dispatcher was also wonderful calling to tell me that he might be early She was efficient and very personable as well I will definitely use them again

They have come several times and done some small and large jobs for us They have remodeled several rooms for us and have done a wonderful job We have been very satisfied with the services they have done for us The technician that was assigned to us has been excellent and very detail oriented

He arrived on time  was very helpful My only small concern was that he needed to spend part of his time going to the store to buy the threshold piece Since Id told the company ahead of time I thought that was needed it would have been nice if they had sent that along In retrospect he also could have given me a shopping list so I could get it while he was shaving the door The run to the store added a fair amt of time to the job Overall it went well Im glad he was there because I also had a plumber doing other work who needed a hand getting an old water heater out of the house and it was fortunate that Mr Handyman was there to well be handy Id use them again but only if I had enough tasks to take at least 2 hr and if possible Id try to have supplies available I could always return unneeded parts

Overall this went badly The work was done poorly I felt very overcharged and cheated The worker came on time started with the Lazy Susan moved on to the toilet paper holder and then left my home He returned about 15 minutes later and finished all work after one hour and 10 minutes not two hours I was charged for two hours and parts Spackle drywall putty screen 50 lb dry wall anchors which he went to the hardware store to buy I think a handyman service especially when they know the job to be done should be prepared with the appropriate parts The ceiling was a mess when he left screen showing not smoothed off at all Lazy Susan broke again about two weeks later

The work was outstanding I had asked for around five estimates before I hired him and even if he was not the cheapest one the price was completely fair and reasonable I called and they gave me an estimate over the phone
He was very thorough He actually showed me what he was doing and overall he was very professional I even added a job while he was here and he was able to take care of that for me

I would definitely call this company again They were courteous over the phone and Dave was prompt friendly and worked like a dog The project went into a second day and the company rescheduled Dave so that he could come back two days after the first one to finish the job

Overall the job went well We set up an appointment for three weeks after we called Mr Handyman called a few days before the appointment to confirm On the day of the appointment we received a call from the contractor letting us know that the employee that was scheduled to come out to the house had called out sick They did send another employee out that same day to do the work John did come later than we scheduled for He arrived at 435 pm and got right to work on the dry rot While the wood filler was drying he replaced the shutters John told us that the wood filler was not completely dry so he would have to return the next day He did return at 555 pm the next day to paint the wood It took a little under an hour When we checked the work everything seemed fine but the next day we noticed that the wood filler had sunken in We wrote to Mr Handyman to let them know and they promptly sent John and another employee out to correct the problem at no charge

Called on a Tues  was told Thu  Fri were available On Wed these times were gone I couldnt find anyone else so on Thu set up appt for following Thu They are pricey 216 for the first 2 hours thereafter billed in 15 min increments 88hr For that price you get highly qualified technician We opted to buy most of the stuff beforehand but the tech did need to shop for some specialty items The tech was supposed to show up at 8a but had car trouble Mary the office mgr called me at 805a to let me know this he showed up at 9a and finished by 2p Most impressive fixing the kitchen exhaust fan it would been quite costly to replace this He also didnt have to replace the garbage disposal as we thought was necessary wires just needed to be connected correctly The tech was pleasant and knowledgeable Mary was very helpful on the initial call Would definitely use them again and highly recommend them to others

Allen the manager was professional providing an estimate on the phone when I called for a job The job I described sounded like 23 hours job and Rickie came 30min late due to an accident on the road One of the problem was a long hole on the main door and Rickie suggested that the door is not secure and I decided to replace it It ended up costing me a lot but I think it was a right decision I could tell he had done it many many times We went to shopping he took the old doors and everything out adjusted the wall from 83inches to 80 inches and put the new doors in It was great that even though he was supposed to be there for 23hours he asked Allen to move other schedule and stayed a whole day to get it done He cared details and the job was done well

I had the pleasure of working with Ben at AHI for a bathroom renovation and change of bedroom flooring in my condo  My unit was built in 2001 and it was screaming Outdated  Ben presented some ideas that upgraded my unit to present time  He worked around my budget and was able to improvise when needed  The team that Ben put together for my projects was AMAZING  Felixs team handled my flooring and I absolutely love it  Jose and Romeo created the bathroom of my dreams  Julian completed my dream bathroom with a custom shower door  The quality and beauty of a custom shower door from Julian will make you frown upon any other kind of shower door its a game changer  All teams were respectful of my unit by being extra clean and noiseconscious when removing the prior flooring and demolishing the bathroom  Everyone working on my projects was detailoriented diligent and stayed on track with the projected date of completion  Ben visited my unit regularly to monitor the progress of the projects  He also assisted with answering any questions that the HOA had  All in all my experience with AHI was extremely positive  Everything is beautiful  the outcome exceeds my expectations  In addition everything was completed within budget and on time  Looking forward to reaching out to Ben again for my next project

American Home Improvement remodel our home We upgraded our kitchen and bathrooms installed hardwood flooring and repainted the interior and exterior of our house We were so impressed with their attention to detail and how well organized the construction company runs The entire project was handled professionally and the final result was a reflection of our taste Our kitchen and bathroom remodel came out better than we expected During the work that they did at my house I could see that they are detail oriented hardworking and skilled They did the work remarkably beautiful My old kitchen was demolished completely and they installed new plumbing cabinets lightings and appliances while in the bathroom they replaced the tub and shower while installing new floor hardware and vanity with double sink During the work I noticed that Daniel was very honest and fair with me while having excellent communication skills as well I didnt experienced any hidden charges or additional extras With my past experience it was hard to find a team who knows their work so well and that honesty is their main factor I would definitely work with them again

After interviewing several contractors we hired AHI to remodel our master bathroom guest bathroom and laundry room Within hours of initially contacting them AHI sent a project manager Neev to our house to generate a quote From the outset Neev was detail oriented picked up on issues that other contractors had missed and sat down with us to generate a quote onsite AHIs quote was comparable to other bids so we ultimately chose them for the project because they seemed the most serviceoriented and capable of delivering what we wanted Im glad we did

I only have the highest praises for Neev his company and his work From the beginning Neev displayed so much warmth and sincerity towards us From the first consultation he gave tremendous time and detail to what we could anticipate if we were to hire him for our project a full bathroom remodel He was never in a rush so open to conversation and actively listened to what our expectations were for our project Neev always carried himself with utmost professionalism while establishing and maintaining a personal relationship with constant open and timely communication The entire process was incredibly smooth Neev gave us direction each step of the way allowing us to choose our style and shop within our budget Everything was done is a timely fashion and the project was finished so quickly Every person involved in the project was professional and we did not feel that our privacy was invaded at any point We could not be happier with the final result of the bathroom We would recommend Neev to anyone looking to do any remodeling or reconstruction and would definitely work with him in the future Thank you Neev
The installers were very professional and polite My home looks brand new and definitely added to the total value I would recommend them for any home owner I love the way the they designed

We chose American Home Improvement  for a large kitchen and bathroom project that took 2 months It was a fantastic decision because the crew treated us like family were incredibly communicative and professional kind and did a fantastic job Even when they did the initial demolition they left our house swept and ready for us to walk through Its a best case scenario for having contractors in your house everyday When it comes to design they are fantastic and helped us make decisions that really improved the look and feel of our space We couldnt be happier with the final outcome

We were very pleased with American Home Improvement Inc  Our home needed foundation repair along the entire front of the house as well as replacement of the entry stairs which also meant rebuilding a portion of exterior wall and re stucco  Benjamin was easy to deal with and did exactly what he said he would do  The contract and payment schedule was clearly spelled out  They started the job when they said his workers showed up every day on time cleaned up after themselves every day and they finished within a day or so of scheduled completion  I was extremely impressed with how efficient and how wellcalculated they were with their time and scheduling They were attentive to our needs and always followed up with to make sure that we were happyI would recommend to everyone

Excellent work completed ahead of time and was very competitively priced They did a major repair on our kitchen  bathroom Two walls taken down a window put in plus a lot of other work on the house including electrical moving a gas line and redoing floors  I recommend American Home Improvement without hesitation

for a great experience

Thanks to American Home Improvement Inc for our amazing kitchen In addition to our kitchen they also performed painting plumbing and some general contractor work all at a reasonable price My husband and I found them very easy to work with and very professional We would recommend them to anyone looking to have their kitchen or bath remodeled

I needed to add a shower in my parents room and David and his crew came through  David listened intently to my parents needs and offered creative and practical solutions to the limited space available  For the shower addition he was able to skillfully make it so one could roll a wheelchair right in with no step at all  A slight slope was made for wheelchair access and water drainage David offered to assist me in choosing tile fixtures and grab bars for my parents  They look beautiful  He had to deal with many different personalities at my parents home and he was patient and professional through the whole job  His crew was always prompt friendly and cleaned up after themselves He finished the job in just a few weeks My parents are so happy with the finished project  We would definitely use him again

Very pleased with our bathroom remodel  They have done the job in no time with careful cleanup when they were done Installation then went forward with no delays no waiting for materials or available crew Nick helped with selection of beautifully coordinated tile which was installed with meticulous attention to detail  Excellent communications and supervision throughout the whole project  And the price was reasonable  We would hire them again for our future need and highly recommended Nick and AHM for your next construction

Shawn and his guys did a unbelievable job on my bathroom My bathroom was all were old tile from the 80s with a leaking shower Now we have white marble with amazing borders When I was searching for companys all the construction companys I contacted gave me a horrible vibe from the start I decided to invite 2 contractors to my house and Shawn was one of them He suggested different options on expanding my bathroom and changing the layout at an affordable price I felt very comfortable with him and his crew during the job and feel very confident with the quality after The premises was kept clean during the job which was agreed upon in our original meeting and the job was completed on a timely manner I had mentioned to Shawn Ive always wanted a rain shower so he decided it was a good idea to surprise me with one as we did not agree to it on the original contract I owe it to this company for such professional and quality work I recommend Shawn and his crew for any of your remodeling andor construction projects

I will hire this company again They did work for both my neighbors and they referred me them They did my exterior painting windows bathroom vanity and tile The job exceeded my expectation and the time of work was 2 weeks from start to end I will be calling this company again

I recently contacted 1oak remodeling through a friend as she just remodeled her kitchen I also just went through a big renovation and was not in the mood for another one although I urgently needed to repair my driveway and landscape the front of my home They set an appointment with me and guided me through all the steps and procedures My job finished in 1 week They had a full crew working everyday to make my dreams come true This company is really 1 of a kind Thank you for all your help

Shawn from AHI did an excellent job  I recently hired them to remodel my 80 year old Mothers bathroom  My intention was to accommodate handicapped accessible usage to an older home  Most contractors that I contacted prior to the remodel wanted to sell an elaborate over the top remodel to a room that I had already laid out with my ideas and intentions  Those contractors that came out came as a team and wanted to sign a on the spot 1 day only sale price otherwise the price would go up  After contacting them I was listened to told them what I wanted and they proposed a reasonable solution  There was no pressure or sales attack  Having dreaded doing a job like this while meeting with several shady contractors I was pleasantly surprised with the fact that they took care of everything  No surprises or additional charges etc  Just a competent professional and thorough job from a very happy customer  I would highly recommend Shawn and American Home Improvement your remodeling needs

I awarded American Home Improvement Inc my Wiltshire home renovation and am very pleased with their service Very clean crew and they are perfectionists Love their work and their collaboration with my Designer Thank you Jose

American Home Improvement in Los Angeles They understands quality and good building practices From start to finish their attention to detail is excellent The work site is always well organized and clean Michael did an outstanding job overseeing the construction project I had a room addition built and completely renovated my entire house including remodeling my kitchen and all four bathrooms All of the workers were friendly and fantastic at their specific trade They were easy to communicate with and made an effort to keep the site safe I have a toddler They came out was very nice and Michael and his team was able to complete the remodeling in less than a month All the materials were selected from his vendors and Michael was able to get us a nice discount During the whole remodeling Michael visited us often and informed us about the progress and any problem that came up and what solution can solve it His honesty and professionalism proved itself during this work and we are thankful for that I would recommend this contractor to anyone that values quality and detailed work

We replaced all cabinetry tile and fixtures for the entire bathroom including moving the tub and creating a new shower area We had a leak under the previous cabinetry so there were also remediation work and lots of demo leading into the project We hired them mainly because unlike other contractors they were fullservice from the design end Their mobile showroom really helps you make decisions even on the minor details and Eli helped us get ideas and ensure that our design choices would work together for example making sure that all the plumbing fixtures were compatible We also requested some unique features like a rock river effect in the tilegrout leading from the shower to the bathroom door that we had an idea for that resulted in a solution they helped design The team was professional throughout and clearly worked together well Work was done on time and within budget The cleaning crew they had come in at the end was world class as well

This was the most amazing experience remodeling a kitchen that I think you could ask for  Neev was incredible with the timeline what to expect when to expect it and even completed the project early  It is a big undertaking to not have a kitchen for awhile and it was completely worth it  The work is impeccable I could always reach Neev and he was always willing to work with me or explain if I didnt understand what was happening next  The best experience

My friend recommended my American Home Improvement and when I saw how many positive reviews they have I sent a quote I got response very soon and estimate next day I was satisfied and decided to hire them The project was building an addition Before start Tom explained me every single detail about project and that was very professional from him He and his crew were really great worked hard kept eye on everything and cleaned after themselves It was a big project so normally there were some issues but nothing serious and they finished on promised time Excellent work guys highly recommended company

I found this company on internet they have many excellent recommendations so I contacted them because I needed my master bathroom remodeling They answered quickly and very detailed They gave me estimate next day and I was very satisfied I hired them The project started quickly after we signed a contract The project manager Eli and his team did great job and I am very satisfied with my remodeled master bathroom Now I see why this company have so many great recommendations I also highly recommend American Home Improvement

Excellent and trustworthy contractor I hired American Home Improvement for my kitchen remodeling it was very important project for me because I already remodeled my kitchen and wasnt satisfied at all with work provided from previous contractor 2 years ago This time I was looking contractor with many excellent recommendations and I also heard for them from my friends The project went OK some issues were resolved instantly and with no change of price of ending time The most important final outcome was amazing my new kitchen looks stunning Thank you American Home Improvement

I am so happy I found this great contractor I needed to build an addition pretty expensive project and interviewed several contractors American Home Improvement gave me most realistic offer and when I saw their recommendation I decided to go with them Eli was our project manager and he handled everything so easy He was nice and helpful informed me about working progress all the time The project went OK with no issues or extra costs The outcome was perfect Will work with American Home Improvement again thats for sure

Moti and his team did a really great job for me They added an addition to my house it was 1 big room I got recommendation on American Home Improvement from my friend and they also have many excellent reviews so I contacted them to see what options would they offer to me I was very satisfied with their answer and I hired them As I said before Moti and his team were great made complicate project pretty simple The quality of work was at  highest standards so they deserves highest recommendation

I am very pleased with my master bathroom renovation recently completed by American Home Improvement  Neev the Senior Project Manager and Tal the foreman worked to keep me posted as the job progressed  Any problems were solved to my satisfaction  There were a few delays so the project took longer than expected but it looks great The day to day trade workers were very respectful professional and hard workers  I would recommend this company to others planning a home renovation

Im not one to typically post a review but after our recent experience with American Home Improvement and specifically our project manager Neev Kugel I felt obliged to comment on their phenomenal work  We contracted them to remodel our kitchen as well as redo the flooring in adjacent rooms and other related improvements  I was extremely impressed by how professional Neev and the whole operation was from start to finish  Outside of knowing we wanted to update our kitchen my wife and I really didnt have a clear vision on exactly how we wanted it to look  We essentially put our faith and trust in Neev to deliver an end product that we would love and he didnt disappoint  At the start of the project Neev brought in designers who were very knowledgeable creative and receptive to our ideas to help create a contemporary and elegant design that both my wife and I loved  From there Neev developed the project plan and timeline that was consistent with the original estimate  
Throughout the entire process Neev was very communicative and would always clearly outline next steps so we knew what to expect  This made the process much smoother and reduced the typical frustration that can come with remodels because we always knew the status of the work  

Now this is not to say the project was completed without any snags  As with any project there were surprises that came up  However Neev always worked with us to explain the issue outline our options and would work with us to make sure we were happy with the final outcome All of the workers brought into our home showed the same level of professionalism and quality craftsmanship  Most importantly the final outcome of the remodel was outstanding  Not only was everything completed ontime and onbudget but it turned out absolutely stunning exceeding our expectations  And as the say the devil is in the details and it was the details where the quality of the work came through  It was clear that they do not cut corners  The quality of the work was beyond reproach  

In terms of price we didnt do much comparison shopping before going with AHI  Neev impressed us when we initially brought him in so we didnt get other bids for the project  I can say anecdotally the price was very comparable to what some of our other friends paid for similar work  And most importantly the price originally agreed to is was we ultimately paid which is very important to me  No bait and switch   

All in all I would highly recommend Neev and AHI if considering a home improvement project

Do not trust this company  The project started out well but quickly became a nightmare This large company hires out contractors to get work and doesnt seem to check these contractors experience  The guy that I learned later was a great salesman but didnt know how to create a simple footing  I had to correct his formwork Then after he promised to prove himself he failed again and the rebar was all wrong

We truly love American home improvement We had a wonderful time during the remodeling work that they did at our house and we highly recommend this company Mark was able to deliver everything he promise and even more We originally hired them to completely redo the kitchen and bathroom on top of few other tasks around the house One of our friend is an interior designer by profession and she joined us and helped on the design of our new stunning kitchen brand new cabinets new hardware paint counter tops and more Mark and his team were able to join forces very well with her and we were happy by that because it saved us money In the master bedroom and bathroom we removed the existing tub and installed new hot tub including the replacement of all the existing floors and walls in addition to replacing all the light fixtures and the vanity mirrors We fell that we are very blessed by having American home improvement and that the remodeling project was completed right before the holidays We are currently thinking of doing another project and of course we will hire American home improvement We are very satisfied with all the people at American home improvement that were involved at our house project that we invited all of them for a BBQ after the job was done

American home improvement remodeled completely our kitchen and laundry room and it came out gorgeously We found American home improvement through online website We wanted to upgrade and renew the kitchen we had because it was old style and needed to be more functional so we used American home improvement for that and the kitchen is now more than what we wanted We are very fascinated with the precision of the cabinets countertops and paint on top of the other parts of the work Isaac made sure that everything will be without any mistake or error They were very professional  hardworking people All the communication could not been better between us to Isaac to the labor crew The overall experience in this project was great and pleasant Isaac was the best project manager He kept us in the constant loop and made sure that all of our concerns will be addressed Very detailed oriented and high communication skills person We definitely consider working again with Isaac  American home improvement

We hired American home improvement for our entire house remodeling We recently purchased this house and it was in an immediate updates Our supervisor was Isaac which during the whole work was very reliable hardworking person always available quickly respond our calls or messages Like any other remodeling project we came across several problems which we thought will increase the overall budget BUT Isaac took care of them right away His team were all wonderful and we have no complain against any of them They worked hard and fast while making sure that everything works and come out great We truly know that other contractors in case we hired them for that job might do it cheaper but the quality of the work that Isaac did  cant be compared at all Now our house is back to life and looks brand new Thank you Isaac and the wonderful team

I hired American Home Improvement for the remodeling project of my master closet master bathroom and mainly the kitchen I had my vision of how I want them to be done and more than that I was able to design my drawings of the spaces and I just needed someone reliable that can make it happen I spoke to few contractors and met with them too One of them was Mickey Mickey was very nice professional and skilled contractor when we met and he captured my attention compare to the other ones The remodeling supposed to be finish within a month of work but due to several changes that we did during the work it ended up that the remodeling took a little longer than it should but at the end I can say clearly that it was well worth it I must mention also that Mickey didnt charge me anything more what we agreed on and he was very fair and honest while the quality of the work and the customer service was beyond compare

American home improvement has completed several projects in our house including the remodeling of our guest bathroom master bathroom kitchen and living room area The design and remodeling was a custom European stylemodern while the bathroom included a walk in tile shower jet shower system home automation and more part of the design was to reposition the door opening for a much better use of space American home improvement staff helped us by selecting all of the finish materials including the tiles upper and lower cabinets accessories and more including the colorstyle of the paint David included also in his work the remodeling of the guest bathroom drywall type of texture baseboards etc He has excellent professional craftsmanship and creativity skills American home improvements approach and talent to meet our deadlines were fantastic and he was able to finish the remodeling project on time We definitely recommend American home improvement and all the involved people that worked at our house for any type or style of construction or remodeling projects We are very pleased with the completed project and we will hire them again for more upcoming projects Thanks American home improvement for a great job from a very happy customer

American Home Improvement and our project manager Elad have done a gorgeous remodeling job on our open space concept kitchen remodeling We must admit that we are not easy clients As part of our remodeling project we removed several load bearing walls and installed new beams within the ceiling poured concrete footings under the house installed new hardwood floors from the living room into the kitchen and matched the drywall on the walls and ceiling in order to achieve a perfectly flat client and everything went smoothly During the work we lived at the house and the workers sealed off all the spaces that were not part of the work so the dust that we were so concerned of was kept to minimum Elad also made sure to stick to the main budget and the promised timeline which was very important to us We were warned by some friends that these days its very hard to find a good company that will provide the same service as we got from American Home Improvement We are looking forward to hire them for additional projects in the future

We had several meetings with Shean from American home improvement regarding to the kitchen that we want to remodel and what is our vision and goals After he heard our thoughts requests and fears he came up with an incredible open space kitchen and dining room area that came out much more stunning than we imagined Not only does our new space look spectacular its unique and very functional Remarkably Shean and all the people that were involved in our remodeling project were professionals hardworking people who really showed us that they care and treated it like it was their own home The general attitude of American home improvements was very positive and impressive this is the main reason why we are writing this review and we highly recommend them

If we summarized our remodeling project we will say that Daniel is the person that you will want to manage your remodeling project we cant write enough about his personality and working crew They are all absolute professionals Everything was performed within the time frame we agreed on and with the highest remodeling standards Our brand new kitchen looks perfect The crew was very polite skilled and worked very hard to get the remodeling project done to our satisfaction Daniel was in contact with all the relevant updates regards the remodeling and he was there for us most of the time to answer any questions we had His ideas really made a huge impact in the way the kitchen came out His skills and vision made this work so easy The new kitchen is now the main place where we usually spend most of our time We couldnt be happier and pleased We currently have more plans on remodeling additional sections at the house and we wont call anyone else  thats for sure

We hired Shean and his professional workers to remodel our master bathroom The complete preparation of the bathroom space was great easy and they made sure to cover everything to prevent all the dust to come out and make a mess The old bathroom was taken down all the way to the studs while right after that they took care of replacing all the plumbing and electrical so they will be replaced with new ones and being upgraded The inside walls were replaced as well new tile floor have been installed and the bathroom got new fresh paint After all of that was completed Shean start to install the new tub and then the floor was grouted and polished The double sink vanity and all the relevant hardware such as sinks faucets handles etc were installed as well including all the baseboards I must mention that their skills involvement approach and ability to achieve the goals  stay within the budgets while working with other subcontractors was outstanding The finished project is beautiful and perfect We would highly recommend this company as well as Shean and his crew

I hired American home improvement to redo my entire house that I recently purchased and planned to live in I hired American home improvement to design and implement the construction of the Kitchen bathrooms bedrooms hallways front yard and back yard Shean was the main people that I worked with and after several meetings and conversations about what I want to get they were able to come up with the draft design that included everything I wanted and it fit my style and budget The draft design was polished and finalized and I gave the approval for the work to start They were very flex with the entire remodeling project and they even did several changes that came up during the work and they didnt charge me for them Any bump that appeared during the construction the entire team was on top of it and they were able to find the right solution that worked out very well and they took the required measures to remedy the situation to my satisfaction The team including Shean was very responsive to any of my phone calls emails and even text messages and the working crew were skilled and courteous I would recommend them to anyone

Over the years our house has suffered from some abuse from our kids and dogs It was about time to do some upgrades and renovations to bring new life to the house We wanted to do a complete remodeling and we start our searching for a designer and home improvement contractor Our search brought us to American home improvement and we made an appointment with Or for an in house consultation Almost right away we knew that he will be the one that will do the work He spent with us over 3 hours browsing our house and asking many questions about what we were looking for to get in the remodeling At the first meeting he came up with great ideas and few solutions as how to transform our home into a gorgeous and functional place to live After several meetings with Or and his designer our process of remodeling started All our neighbors said how courteous  considerate the people at American home improvement were We could see how the American home improvement crew were skilled and exhibited a great sense of craftsmanship and attention to details It was clear how they took pride in what they were building Or is not only extremely creative and skilled but very detail oriented person and he asked the same from his people Both Or and his crew delivered much more than they promised If something was not 100 good Or had it redone He went above and beyond his words to make sure we were happy The final results are a gorgeous statement of pride craftsmanship and promises kept We will continue to recommend American home improvement to anyone who asks Thank you Or and your team too If ever we need to do this again it would be our pleasure to have American home improvement

We wanted to remodel our Kitchen completely on top of the remodeling of the main floor paint and new floor One family member of us recommended that we should talk to Ziv at American home improvement before making any decision with the other contractors After speaking with Ziv it was pretty clear to us that we should hire them for that work and to leave the other contractors Ziv gave us a perfect direction and ideas about the remodeling and we were very happy with that because we knew that this is what we need and want Ziv and his team were extremely detailed oriented people and they surpassed all the anticipations with the finished kitchen Each day we saw how our remodeling project is moving forward and how friendly and hardworking people the team were Unlike past experiences We didnt have to worry if the workers will show up each morning to work The American home improvement working people were on top of our remodeling project and we cant thank them enough We do recommend them

I hired American home improvement to finally bring the backyard of my house to life The empty lot in the back yard was the same way I got it when I purchased the new house from the builder and all it had was just dirt This project was pretty challenging because of the semi small space shaped and slightly irregular American home improvement was able to provide me with several estimates and options and all of this in order to help me get the feeling of prices based on several levels of items and quality in hardscape softscape and lighting This method of service allowed me to make better choices on areas to enhance or compromise in order to stay within budget My past experiences with landscapers was not good and it made it harder for me to make a decision in hiring anyone to this project My past experience showed me that whoever you hire they will be either good at one thing or not that good at the other one rarely can you find someone that will be goo in both AND mostly they never finish anything when they say theyre going to My experience with American home improvement was completely different and positive Ben was especially knowledgeable about both hard and softscape and provided intuitively good recommendations Sure thing but like any job there will always be few problems but Ben was fair enough and responsive working diligently to come to a resolution we were both happy with I was most impressed with the professionalism and hardworking ethic of the actual crew that did the work They arrived on time every day were polite and cleaned up after themselves each day They take pride in their work and it shows American home improvement did such a good job I will hire them again for any future landscaping needs

Based on several recommendations and help from friends about this company I decided to go ahead and hire American home improvement to remodel my 2 bathrooms and kitchen During each one of the steps in the remodIsaacng Isaac the owner informed me and communicate with me about what is happening  what is going to happened and he always responded to my emails calls or even texts and my feedback about some of the things that the workers did that day or about to do The teams at American home improvement that worked at my house did a great job as well and they put a lot of attention in order to make everything in perfect condition and without mistakes thanks to Juan and all of the others  Even when there were issues or concerns from my end Isaac and the workers were always willing to make it right or to explain to me why it needed to be that way Isaac and Jacob his partner were very helpful and have even provided advice and assistance on other construction issues unrelated to their work I would not hesitate to recommend American home improvement for any large construction jobs and will definitely be using them again whenever I have another project

My home is over 10 years old and we finally decided to do a kitchen update I hired American home improvement to design and implement the new kitchen and make it practical for us Isaac came up with a great design of the kitchen and he actually took the time to listen to us and to truly understand our needs Isaac and his workers on top of his subcontractors worked together in a professional manner to deliver the kitchen I wanted and the result are wonderful His crew were always on time and I was overwhelmed with the schedule and the daily tasks routine they had and mostly the cleaning at the end of each day When the remodeling was completed I noticed of several problems I called Isaac at American home improvement and he came out right away and fixed them all We are now thinking of hiring them again to remodel the bathrooms at our house

I highly recommend American home improvement to for any quality of home remodeling and dealing with creative professionals and skilled people I wanted add an additional space to my bedroom that will have a powder room and a larger bathroom in my house I came to American home improvement with a global concept of what I wanted to achieve Shlomo worked with me hand by hand to make the addition and to enlarge the bathroom and to recreate the closet space while remodeling the bathroom and powder room the way I wanted it to be I trusted the working team from the very early stage of the work but the completed remodeling project is much more beautiful than what I had anticipated Shlomo did a great work by redesigning and polished the original design master bathroom and powder room that feel large relaxed and lovely The crew that executed this remodeling was excellent as well Even our guests and family stated on how enjoyable and trained they were The work took a little longer than it should which is normal to my opinion but Shlomo communicated with me often and provided me with weekly updates and detailed explanations of the work progress and what left to be done I am hoping to remodel the kitchen in the near future and Im looking forward to hire American home improvement again

We had a great pleasure to hire and allow American home improvement to work at our house and Mae and the workers for the recent kitchen and guest bathroom remodeling I write this review based on our experience only of hiring them Mickey and Mae did a great job at the kitchen mainly and Mae made it go easy and smoothly The main points according to our experience with them were

Many thanks to American Home Improvement and mainly Mark and the actual people that were involved in our remodeling for the excellent remodeling job that they did at our house The remodeling project included the full remodeling of our house and it included the kitchen Bathrooms back yard front yard bedrooms and hallways The work changed completely the house and we love it very much Mark and his crew did such a professional work and each part of it was done with extra care and attention During the work and even after Mark was there for us to answer any of our questions or concerns meeting us at various vendors and helped us selecting and choosing all the materials appliances and paint He used his skills and experience to advise us on all the many available options for many issues that raised during the work We would refer American Home Improvement to anyone looking to convert their house space into something stunning

Shlomo did a wonderful job when we hired him and his people to renovate our house We hired him to execute our designed plans that we did with another design firm The design plans were to remodel our kitchen bedrooms bathrooms laundry room and living room on top of the dining room area as well Shlomo at American Home Improvement and their several subcontractors that were hired for our remodeling in order to do the electricity plumbing and custom kitchen cabinets were able to bring the design to life with an amazing skills and special attention to all the small details which made this remodeling project a huge success and very beautiful During the work we noticed very clear how the working crew and the subcontractors were easygoing and skilled with several modifications that came up due to unknown problems that arises during the work and all of them were communicating with us when they happen We look forward to working with them again in the future

We were having Shlomo working at our house for the remodeling project that we needed to do for a while now He met and sat with us several times of different days planning and describing their process and services Our remodeling project was to do a new kitchen master bathroom master bedroom walkin closet and replacing the old HVAC system with new one Shlomo and Ben managed our project together and they started with measuring the existing areas of the house which allow them to come up with a design a week after Each detail of the project was analyzed and discussed to mainly cover the cost and time frame for each task such as appliances countertops cabinet style and colors etc and the time frame that required for installing the new HVAC system from their subcontractor While close to half of the house was under work American home improvement took every protection they could to cover the rest of the house from the dust and debris so we can live at the house for the time been and they made us a temporary kitchen Each detail and part of the remodeling was supervised by both of them The working team were very professional and skilled from the electrician the plumber tile man and the painter They all worked flawlessly together and involved us with each step of the work Each one of them took pride in his own trade which ended in a beautiful kitchen and bathrooms that we enjoy just by looking at them American home improvement finished our remodeling project on time and a little bit below our agreed budget and we look forward to hire them again We highly recommend American home improvement to anyone considering a remodel

We recently worked with Shlomo to paint my house inside and out I purchased this house recently and the house needed to get a fresh look and makeover Shlomo came by the house several times in order to define each space at the house for any color combination and texture in the common areas What I loved about her was that she was able to get a great idea of what needed to be done The color combinations and textures were so impressive and beautiful that the samples of them could prove that immediately From all the samples that she was able to do with her painters it was super easy to imagine how it will look like and the process was very easy In the outside of the house her color combinations made the same effect and this was the killer point that caused me to hire her and the team of painters from American home improvement One of the main problems that I had was all the furniture and items that I had at the house Shlomo was able to solve that immediately by assigning 3 people that came to the house prior to the painters and they moved all the furniture and cover them so it will be ready for the painters to do the actual paint The whole work went smoothly and without any problem which made me very happy and proud at myself that I hired the right company for the job I felt that Shlomo really understood my style and she did all she could to make this on the easiest way and with completely perfection She really listened to what I was looking for and saved me a lot of time and stress If I wasnt hired Shlomo or contact American home improvement Im sure I would still be not able to find any other paint company that could make my house this way
