We chose SW Kitchens to renovate our guest bathroom  This extremely small bath had all original fixtures dating back 34 years  We began the process in October 2021 by visiting the Longwood design center  Later we called to schedule an estimate and they paired us with Sarah  From start to finish on this project Sarah has been amazing  Since this was our first remodel she walked us through the entire process never hesitating to answer all our questions  

She never tried to persuade us in any one direction on colors tile or fixture selection  Being new to this process we would ask for her design opinions and she was always honest and upfront about each item  Sarah corresponded with us on multiple occasions throughout the life of this renovation to ensure all was going as planned and to inquire about any of our questions comments or concerns  

Throughout the life of this renovation there were a number of contractors who came to work on this project  plumbers concrete cutters a framer tile installers painters drywall installers electrician threshold installers and delivery personnel  All of these contractors were highly skilled in their field  All the contractors on our project were very respectful to us and even cleaned the work area before leaving each day  

Our renovation took three months from the start of construction  In all a total of 35 days from the first home visit to the last walkthru  We are so extremely pleased with all the quality work which has been done throughout the course of the project  We have a beautiful guest bathroom to enjoy for years to come    

Sarah was our rockstar  She is so kind patient and puts the client first  She is easy to talk to and discuss ideas and appears to really enjoy her work  We will definitely request Sarah for our next renovation

We recently finished our master bathroom remodel with Sarah Kraus and now were starting on the guest bathroom Sarah was fabulous In addition to her detailed design work Sarah was patient kind and responsive to emails and phone calls Best of all she was an advocate for us when we had workmanship questions or concerns Thats the primary reason we chose to work with her again

We just had our first experience with remodeling our kitchen and SW Palm Harbor did not disappoint Shirley Aguilu project designer and Steve Cota superintendent are outstandingtheir knowledge guidance and patience throughout the project made the experience very pleasant We had many questions since this was our first remodel and they were friendly trustworthy and responsive Everyone including the contractors and installers had an impressive attention to detail and their workmanship was top notch We are so thrilled with the end result and highly recommend them

We hired them Feb 2021 to remodel two bathrooms and outdoor grill Absolute disaster Attached is what our master bathroon looks like now April 2022 We have finally come to the point where we had to make a claim against our insurance Beware of this company Our designer was Sarah Kraus Never saw her after the demo The first GM for the job Brian Pop he walked out right after everything was demod The second GM Pete Coffman was just as bad Actually caught them trying to cover up water damaged wood caused by them using cheap materials They hung up towel racks with just screws not anchors Towel rack fell down during first use Seriously BEWARE We have water damage and a bathroom still torn up after more than a year

I recently finished 2 bathrooms with SW in Palm Harbor Florida  Kirsten Phillips was our designer and Mike Frary was the project managerGC  They were fantastic  SW has an app that allows you to know exactly what is scheduled each day what is planned and easily connect with the team  All of the subcontractors were pleasant respectful and helpful I am sure it wasnt easy one bathroom is on 2nd story one on 3rd story I had a vision of what I wanted shared that and pictures with Kirsten and she helped me through all of the processes  I picked out things that I knew I wanted and she helped guide me in areas I was unsure  We built the house 20 years ago and kept putting off doing the bathrooms  Now I am so happy I should have done it sooner  I highly recommend SW they were fantastic to work with  And huge thanks to Shirley A who helped set me up with Kirsten to keep personal friendship and business separate

SW Kitchens did a great job with our kitchen renovation We have a small kitchen that was not in the best shape and we were really looking for design solutions to create more useable space without changing the footprint of the kitchen Sarah was our designer and really listened to what we wanted and did a excellent job designing our new kitchen She also provided us with many options within our budget so we could get something that fit our aesthetic without breaking the bank The only issue with the whole process was with our backsplash tile but Sarah and our site supervisor Adam listened to our concerns and worked to address the problem so that we were happy with the results

My wife and I were very pleased with the professional experience we had with S  W Kitchens Palm Harbor  The designer Shirley Aguilu provided excellent ideas listening to our ideas and producing a kitchen renovation plan that encompassed all of our requests  The team including Shirley Steve Tony and Amber were on top of all aspects of the complete kitchen renovation  This included frequent contact to ensure the job was being completed and ensuring all segments installing floor tile cabinets laundry room countertops backsplash plumbing and electrical work were correctly completed  We highly recommend S  W Kitchens Palm Harbor for their work

All we can say is WOW  SW Kitchen did a fantastic job renovating our kitchen The difference between our old kitchen and new is like night and day Our kitchen was old falling apart cabinet doors not closing bowing shelves and poor lighting  Lindsey Schwartz our Project designer was great to work with She guided us through choosing cabinets flooring backsplashes and every detail of our kitchen makeover  She pointed out less expensive choices although we did not always listen and different options The demolition and installations teams were all very professional and courteous They always let us know what they were going to be doing and when  We highly recommend SW Kitchens

SW Kitchens does fantastic workfrom the design all the way to the punch list They were perfectionists with our home Our designer Laura listened carefully to our needs and came up with a beautiful design She gave us just enough choices that we felt like it was our personal design without being overwhelmed by selections We remodeled our kitchen master bath and guest bath and we couldnt be more pleased with the results We feel like we have a custom home We fell in love with our construction crewKevin Steven Scott and Brian along with top notch subcontractors They were meticulous about their work and took care of every tiny detail They were professional and friendly too We felt very comfortable having them in our homewhether we were at home or away We have recommended SW to family and friends

Our Kitchen  Fireplace were very out dated  We had heard good things about S  W Kitchens so we went to check them out  Our first impression was great  We met with Designer Amy Downs and was very impressed with her knowledge  experience  She has amazing design ideas  Signed our contract  we were ready to start  We then met with the contractor Davin Johnson  He was also very experienced  professional  Renovations can be a bit stressful but we new we were in good hands  Davin always updated us as to what was happening and when  We got finished before our due date  We cant thank S  W Kitchens enough for our beautiful transformation  Oh yes and we got our house professionally cleaned too the team was amazing  My house was spotless  We would definitely use them again

Victoria Pratt was an outstanding partner and provided a level of customer service that I truly appreciate  She was friendly informative and helpful while we made our choice of wood countertop  I first went online to find an outstanding butcher block or wood countertop product called the manufacturer of the product and was informed SW Kitchen was their distributor of that product in the Tampa Bay area near our home  Once I went in and started engaging with Victoria she struck me as highly professional informative and knowledgeable about the product and how it would look in our kitchen remodel  Victoria took the time to come out see the kitchen remodel and helped me select a product  She was also there upon delivery of a 200 lb wood countertop and helped me quickly find an expert installer for such a beautiful product  I enjoyed working with Victoria and would recommend her services and SW Kitchen to anyone who asked

My kitchen remodel is so beautiful  The project manager Brian  communicated effectively so were kept informed of timelines and next steps Our designer Marilyn listed to what we wanted and helped us create our dream kitchen All of the contractors were very professional and treated my home respectively They even greeted my nosy puppy who had to come say hello to everyone who came to the house Highly recommend

S and W did our kitchen makeover after 44 years of living in this house
I found them to be very professional clean and respectful of our property
I would suggest them to anyone considering a renovation

From the start of the bathroom remodel to the end Whitney at S  W Kitchens took a dream of what we wanted our bathroom to be and made it a reality Our bathroom was original from 1988 and needed to be completely upgraded At the start we scheduled a visit with Whitney and laid out the parts we needed and wanted to incorporate into our bathroom Whitney then helped us to pick out a color scheme and quartz countertop tiles floor lights and accessories After about a week Whitney drew up a CAD design to show us how the bathroom would look like and showed us We immediately loved it and signed the paperwork to get it started Because of the pandemic and wood shortages it took about a month to get all the supplies together for the bathroom Still good if you ask me and then they delivered them to our garage for safekeeping Mike our foreman met with us to lay out the work schedule for the remodel and set a demo date Mike was attentive to our work schedule and our concerns of making sure our cat did not get out Therefore Mike made sure to let us know when people would be coming so we could put our cat in a room All of the people who came to work on the bathroom respected our privacy of not going in the doors that was marked that our pet could be in Over the 6 months of the remodel This was finished on time Mike and Whitney were available for any and all questions concerns and gave updates on everything Our bathroom exceeded our expectations on how it was going to be The new shower is roomier and awesome more cabinet space and the countertops and sinks are spectacular We both are very impressed with Whitney and Mike at S  W kitchens and without hesitation will use them again in the future
Excellent work and professionalism Would hire again They worked with us to make sure we were satisfied with all our choices

Having our kitchen redone with SW Kitchens has been a complete life changing experience  We own a 100 year old bungalow that had an original kitchen with granite slapped on top of the teeny tiny dollhouse size cabinetry  We knew when we bought our house we would redo the kitchen but had no idea with whom  We stumbled upon SW online and read through the reviews  Larissa designed us the kitchen of my dreams within our budget while thinking of every detail and how we could maximize storage and obtain the aesthetic and type of environment that were so important to me  Our superintendent Christian was excellent through the entire process  The amount of time and effort he put into the construction of our kitchen totally surpassed by expectations  If you are considering a kitchen reno I highly recommend SW for the job and HIGHLY recommend specifically working with Larissa you will not regret it

SW completely remodeled our kitchen and two baths  Did it all go super smooth  Not really but what did go consistently right was designer Lacie Rice  She worked with my wife and me from the beginning to the end and helped to resolve issues that arose along the way  We are more than satisfied with the results and cannot speak highly enough about Lacie

Total bath remodel pricey and started months later than wed hoped  partially due to COVID and personnel change but once started project manager Davin was on top of all employees and subs were all professional and we are very pleased with final product

We enjoyed working with SW Kitchens We built a new house and used them for not only the kitchen but all the bathrooms as well Everything turned out beautiful Mollie was great to work with very helpful  informative Even though things were delayed due to Covid we were in the loop throughout the whole process The installers attention to detail is 2nd to none We are beyond happy with the way everything turned out in our home

SW is a five star company  Lacie and Steve were excellent to work with and kept us informed through every step of the process  We plan to use SW for third project to renovate our kitchen  If you have a project go with SW and ask for Lacie and Steve

FANTASTIC Experience We have been working out of our home since March of 2020 so we decided now would finally be the time to upgrade the kitchen to one we had been dreaming of for many years We did our homework read reviews and visited the SW Kitchens Showroom in Melbourne Florida We were greeted by Laura Scott who was friendly knowledgeable professional and honest which made it easy to quickly develop a trust relationship with her Laura ultimately became our Designer and as she gathered our requirements she listened to all of our wish lists and concerns and she shared lessons learned to help guide our decision making She offered excellent suggestions and ultimately created a design that far exceed our expectations and enhanced the layout and function of the original blueprint She also provided quick and timely communication throughout the entire process Laura delivered on every promise she made and she routinely stopped by to check in on the progress and make sure our expectations were being met 

We had a preconstruction meeting at our home where we met the various superintendents and project managers that would be overseeing the job We were provided with documentation that included all of our diagrams and decisions and a thorough timeline of when we could expect events to occur They offered expert advice on what to expect and answered all of our questions They even were considerate of our dogs and ensured us of their safety Our Project Superintendent Vinny Mallo provided excellent communication on scheduled workdays and arrival times He worked closely with the crews and provided thorough oversight The crews demo plumbing electrical cabinet install backsplash tile countertops were extremely professional and provided quality work in a timely manner From the virtually invisible seams on the beautiful quartz countertops to the expertly laid intricate backsplash tile we were so impressed with the quality of work They were always on time and presented virtually no disruptions to us even in our telework environment We were also impressed with how clean they kept the environment hauling away debris at the end of the work days and keeping all of our areas orderly 

Bottom linewe are EXTREMELY happy highly recommend Laura Scott and SW Kitchens and would definitely use their services again

SW Kitchens brought me out of the 70s My remodel was better than I ever expected and the cost less than estimates I had received from other companies The remodel included removing my walls and ceilings down to the studs After our first meeting my designer Sarah Kraus knew exactly what I wanted and needed She went by my color schemes and chose the cabinets tile backsplash and lighting perfectly I love the results  
My supervisor Brian Pope responded to my calls and any questions I had immediately  I felt he went over and above what was expected of him Both projects were done on schedule and my home was kept as clean as possible while the work was in process I now have an open floor plan and a beautiful efficient kitchen and master bathroom I would highly recommend SW Kitchens and especially Sarah and Brian Thank you for my beautiful finished project

We wanted to update our kitchen and laundry room We wanted to replace our builder grade cabinets and granite counter tops with high quality cabinets with better organization quartz counter tops and slab backsplash I spent a lot of time planning my dream kitchen and laundry room Right down to the last detail We also needed new sinks faucets and pendant lights One of the biding companies expected us to source these items our selves What a pain That was one of the main reasons we chose S  W Kitchens and Bath 

The other reason we pick S  W was after meeting our designer Lacie Rice She came to our home and took measurements and listened while I laid out my vision She made the process so easy I met with her several times in the showroom in Tampa to shop and design She found everything I wanted She even matched the outlet covers on the island with the cabinet color 

We met with construction manager Steve Cota and Designer Lacie for a final walk through of the plans and discuss the process Everything was explained thoroughly The estimate and final contract were meticulously detailed We could see where every dollar would be spent

Every team demo plumbing electrical drywall paint cabinet install and counter fabricator worked hard They were respectful and tidy Every step of the way Steve and Lacie were accessible The back and forth communication was excellent The permits all passed with no issues They even sent cleaners before my house guests arrived for a holiday weekend

The quality of the Omega cabinets are excellent The color is perfect The Cambria Quartz counters and backsplash are beautiful The kitchen and laundry room are much more functional now too Everything looks exactly how I had pictured in my mind We couldnt be happier with the results It looks amazing

We are so pleased with the total kitchen renovation we recently completed with SW Kitchens in South Tampa We literally demolished our original kitchen removing walls going all the way down to the studs and built a brand new kitchen Our designer Larissa Hicks and her design assistant Gina Cerimele were able to take our basic kitchen ideas and design the perfect kitchen for us The design process was very collaborative and at the end they were even able to come up with some creative solutions to keep our project within our budget The construction phase went very smoothly When we came across a load bearing beam in an unexpected place the team quickly adjusted the design plan with minimal cost incurred Mike Frary was our construction supervisor and he did a great job keeping us informed and the job on schedule I highly recommend SW Kitchens and designer Larissa Hicks for anyone who is doing a kitchen renovation

SW Kitchens did an amazing job on our kitchen and bath remodel Greg Flassig was our designer and he did an amazing job Also Pete Coffman worked with us to get the construction done He was great at explaining everything as well as promptly answering any questions we had Both were there for us the entire time The crew did a great job Thanks for a great job

We had our master bath remodeled  It took a little longer than expected for the project to be completed  Part of the delay was due to the shortage of building materials not SW Kitchens fault  The Kitchen  Bath Project Designer Sarah Kraus Bartelson and Super Intendent Brian Popp were helpful efficient and easy to work with 

We love our master bath and this company has our recommendation

Lonise

Our new kitchen is stunning The whole experience was so well organized from planning choosing materials and construction completion Our designer Mayerlin was very helpful and responsive SW stayed true to budget and on schedule All of the contractors who came to work in our home were on time dependable professional and very clean I will definitely use SW again Highly recommend

In one word AWESOME  I hired SW Kitchens to remodel both of my bathrooms and my laundry room in a condo that I had just purchased  I have done some other renovation projects in the past and I was concerned that they wait until all your materials are in stock before they start  But now I totally get that concept  There were delays with a few items and I wasnt waiting around in a demolished house  Demo started once everything arrived  Savana Dale Kevin and the rest of the team did an amazing job  They were kind and courteous to me  And clean neat and respectful of my home  If a problem came up they fixed it immediately  They finished a week early and stayed on budget  When Im ready to do my kitchen they will be my first phone call  I would highly recommend SW Kitchens for any remodeling project

It was amazing to see my design come to reality in this kitchen renovation The SW kitchens team was  so amazing  My designer Sarah Kraus and my construction Superintendent Brian Popp were so professional and stayed on to of creating the specks details and scheduling all the different contractors and inspections in a smooth manner They really hire excellent subcontractors that really know their specialties very well They all cleaned up their  area very well after each job  protected the furniture and floors very well and were careful not to damage their surroundings They subcontracted Zolt Granite for the quartz and they too did an excellent job The only 2 drawbacks I had was that I went into contract after Thanksgiving 2020 and the project did  not commence until the 6th of January 19 2021 Luckily the project was completed in 4 weeks The other concern is that they were a lot more expensive than we thought but they really provide quality work so that really counts

We engaged SW Kitchens to assist with renovating our kitchen  Our project was relatively small  It involved replacing the existing granite countertop with an quartz countertop as well as making alterations to the configuration of our counter  SW also performed ancillary work such as replacing our kitchen sink and faucet  They also replaced the countertop and sink in our laundry room and make some modifications to enable our dryer to fit properly  Laura Scott was our designer and she remained involved throughout the project to ensure our satisfaction  We were impressed by Lauras professionalism as well as by the quality of SWs work  We were provided detailed plans for our project which the various tradesmen followed to a tee  Our project was completed efficiently on time and with minimal disruption to our home  SW expended a lot of effort on detailed finishing to make sure that every aspect of the countertop as well as the existing cabinetry was perfect  We would highly recommend SW Kitchens for any home remodeling need

The full review is too long for houzzs submission field Here is an abbreviated review

We had several problems with SW and I could not recommend them as a premium service

They mismeasured our kitchen from the start and didnt catch that error until months into the project We had to redesign the kitchen on the fly and they dont seem to take responsibility for the fact that we did not receive the kitchen we ordered

They are clearly accepting more work than they can handle and their workers are exhausted and distracted This led to several errors My full review has a page worth of bullet points as the errors were numerous and costly

They damaged expensive materials and left us to find the problems There are finish issues that remain to be completed and I have been waiting nearly a month for any answer to my ongoing issues

This project also took months longer than the original completion date

Our foreman quit our project any further repairs pretty much finished once they got things nice enough for a pretty picture

Some of their premium products are already having issues with coatings coming off and blemishes from install that were never repaired

They are a mediocre service charging a premium price

We selected to use SW Kitchens in Longwood after reading all their reviews and completing a consultation meeting with our designer to complete the total remodel of our kitchen  3 bathrooms in our home Considering that we had started this big project in late Februaryearly March 2020 prior to Covid19 we are very happy with the final results and end product and design The whole remodel did take longer than expected and there were a few delays  hiccupsbut over all we love our new kitchen and bathrooms Sarah our personal Designer was an instrumental part in the entire process and a joy to work with She was professional openminded in our vision creative and understanding to what we wanted in our home regarding design  specific efficient functional needs for our familyalso all while keeping our budget in mind without compromising quality and design Robert our General Contractor was experienced  knowledgeable and also was pleasant to work with and was in communication with us and the entire team Our entire SW project team Sarah Robert David Kevin  Craig were professional and great to work with We are very satisfied with the work performed and look forward to enjoying our home with family  friends Thank you to our SW Kitchens Longwood Team for bringing our longtime vision for our kitchenbaths remodel into a beautiful reality It was all well worth it  Dan  Tiffany Marcos

SW Kitchens Melbourne proved to be a firstclass company to address renovation of my master bath which was damaged following a lightning strike at my home  Because the bathroom had been completely gutted ceiling drywall cabinets the challenge was to salvage as much of the original custom cabinetry fixtures etc using my own contractors plumbers electricians cabinet installer etc and then replace my countertops and vanity sinks for an updated look and style  From the moment I entered the SW stateofthe art showroom I was impressed with the array of choices and quality of products  More importantly I discovered that designer Laura Smith is worth her weight in gold   Laura carefully listened to my needs and guided me every step of the way  After her visit to my home we selected the Kohler sinks and the perfect Pompeii quartz Valley Sand with copper veining to compliment my existing maple cabinets and Plantation Shutters  As an added bonus due to her prior background in working at a plumbing showroom she also advised me of drain assembly parts needed for my existing faucets and provided other helpfulhints for the rebuild  She was able to schedule countertop installation within a short timeframe far more quickly than other Melbourne fabricators  Throughout this project Laura communicated frequently with me and was professional pleasant and caring  I am delighted with the results

Back in January we started the process to renovate our main living space focused around our kitchen we delayed construction some as we wrapped our heads around workingschooling from home in MarchApril  Starting in June the construction made an already hectic summer that much more interesting but in the end it was totally worth it  working from home postrenovation these last couple of months has been that much more enjoyable  Heres a few pics of before and the professional final shots  Anyone looking for a recommendation S  W Kitchens was so great to work with

This review is late in the making Sarah Kraus did such a great job in designing my master bath and bedroom This is the second time she has worked with me which says something If you have not worked with a designer you need to What I love about Sarah she not only helps me get ideas but she is hands on from beginning to end With any remodel project things come up Sarah handled every concern I had amazing I love my new space Cant believe it is the same room

We were excited to begin a remodel of our outdated kitchen laundry room dinning room living room and office and decided to use SW Kitchens even though the price was considerably higher due to their promise of excellent service and customer satisfaction That was not the case at all There were problems right from the start with broken promises incorrect measurements a breech of our bank account information involving the police department due to our paperwork and personal check being dropped in the street wrong materials ordered and delivered poor workmanship damaged and incorrect cabinets incorrectly fabricated granite damaged and destroyed new appliances workmen not showing up when promised the list goes on and on Its been over a year since we first met with the designer and over nice months since the gutting of the area first occurred and we are just now getting the final replacement cabinet doors of which one was still blemished Our remodel has been the laughing stock of our neighborhood and we will be finishing parts of the job ourselves This has ended up being what we call The most expensive doityourself project ever Even with the overall design being very nice we see constant reminders of how badly everything progressed

When planning to remodel our kitchen we never thought that our Dream Kitchen could come into fortition this AMAZING Sarah Kraus literally saw our vision from the minute we started to talk  She listened to our ideas was attentive to  our needs and circumstances thoughtful in not only the work she does but goes the extra mile to get to know the client  organized as well  if you were to request a copy of anything she has it readily available  This process really does set the customer up for true comfortability during the crazy process of redesigning a kitchen  The time line presented was reasonable and finished well around the time given  The team that worked with her Brian_ Project Manger David carpenter and the other fields contracted in to assist with the job were always professional and considerate  The kitchen design is beautiful simply breath taking  Every detail we discussed and designed were delivered The craftmanship that was taken into our stair railings is UNBELIEVABLE  They brought our Pinterest idea to life with of course a some designing ideas from Sarah   We have done many remodels with contractors and this by far was our best experience  I highly recommend Sarah at SWKitchens  She is very talented and TOP NOTCH

We used SW Kitchens for our total kitchen and foyer renovation  We literally changed everything from our floor to ceiling in each room  SW handled every aspect of our remodel  They handled everything from demo plumbing electrical flooring ceiling removal and all of our kitchen cabinets are custom made perfectly for our kitchen  Our granite is absolutely gorgeous and looks like the ocean it fits perfectly with our home decor colors etc  Each employee who came into our home were very nice and respectful  They cleaned their work space every time they worked at our home and also sent a cleaning service into our home to clean any dust that built up on our furniture during the demolition  We have 2 dogs that loved the employees as well and it made the process even more enjoyable  Our designer Lacie was absolutely in tune with that we wanted and was patient as we took our time to pick out each piece of backsplash tile flooring granite lighting etc We are remodeling our dining room next and we are 100 sure we  are using SW again for this renovation

My husband and I recently had our kitchen remodeled by SW Kitchens  We had new cabinets and countertops installed  The entire team was  timely  competent and a pleasure to work with  Our communication with the designer and site supervisor was excellent  We were always aware of the status of the construction  Being in the midst of covid  the work teams had temperature checked and face masks on during their time in my home  We highly recommend SW Kitchens

After many many searches for a vanity we went with S  W kitchens my designer Sarah Kraus walked me thru the process  The vanity had to custom designed for the space needed  They vanity is beautiful the staff at S  W are wonderful I would recommend them to all my friends

After searching 3 years for a good company to help me remodel my master bathroom I finally found the perfect company  SW Kitchens did an excellent job  They have excellent designers project managers and a great team who completed the job on time even during the summer of Covid 19 on budget and the final result exceeded my expectations  What else could you ask for  I will definitely be using them again in the future and highly recommend the team out of Melbourne Florida  Special thanks to Lindsey and Dale for making this such a positive experience

Weve just completed a project with SW Kitchens  Theyre not just kitchens  We began with several planning conversations with Carol in their showroom and in our home  She was helpful all the way asking all the right questions providing sketches as the plan came together  It was no small task removing the tub removing wall tile redirecting the plumbing and drain installing new tile on the walls and floor new shower fixtures a corner seat grab handle and sliding glass shower doors  The end result is beautiful with nothing being damaged along the way  All of the materials are top quality all of the craftsmen were skilled pleasant and knowledgeable working under the careful eyes of Carol and of our superintendent Pete who scheduled everything masterfully communicating each day resulting in minimum disruption of our household  We were so impressed with their work we asked them to undertake another project new vinylplank flooring in our home office

We are very satisfied with our kitchen remodel with SW Kitchens  Our Project Designer Mayerlin was very helpful in getting us the right design for our needs  preferences  Our Project Manager Brian was very thorough straight forward and always kept us up to date throughout the process regarding scheduling of electricians plumbers inspections ordering etc  We were never in the dark as to what was going on which made us feel at ease throughout the entire process  We highly recommend SW Kitchens as they were great for us  

Chris  Jo

My wife and I are extremely satisfied with services provided by S and W Kitchens during the complete remodel of our master bath From design to completion Sarah was accessible and attentive during the entire process Was available for unscheduled site visits to verify design changes and the always unexpected issues by providing on site communication with the installers and stayed touch through the process Most importantly the result came out the way we wanted In many remodels the work can end up being what the contractor wants Sarah listened to what we envisioned A special thanks to Robert Ungavarsky the superintendent for the project for  handling and providing recommendations for issues as they came up and for the addons we unexpectedly came up with
We would highly recommend Sarah and her team at S and W

My husband and I recently undertook a major renovation of our kitchen master bathroom and guest bathroom  We were extremely fortunate that we selected SW Kitchens as our partner in this renovation

Christina our designer was brilliant in understanding our goals and worked closely with us on color schemes tile patterns kitchen appliances kitchen island space bathroom hardware and more  From day one of demolition thank you Tony to the final day about nine weeks later Mike Christina and everyone that worked to make our dreams come alive were exceptionally competent responsive professional and friendly  At the conclusion of our project our kitchen and bathrooms were dramatically more beautiful and highly functional than we had imagined possible in our dreams  

When you partner with SW Kitchens you collaborate with true experts  I simply cannot adequately describe how well everyone but particularly Christina and Mike worked with us on all details adjusting work schedules and projects within projects to come to completion smoothly without glitches

We also enjoyed this renovation project  all of the people involved were amazing to work with  Anyone with a dream in mind would do well to contact SW Kitchens to see that dream be realized

Moving from Texas to Florida was quite a challenge  We wanted to be closer to our children and find a home to accommodate our 2 horses and 4 dogs  The home we found was A 
diamond in the rough  The only thing it had going for it was the lovely trees in the front yard enough acreage for the horses and a move in ready barn  
The day I walked into S and W kitchens and met Laura Scott was my best day since moving to Florida  My kitchen and the rest of the house was not functional and so so outdated I explained my dilemma to Laura and thanks to her positive attitude she said she was up for the challenge  And what a challenge it was  Not only was the existing kitchen design a challenge I had already bought the new appliances for the new kitchen  The transformation from old dark and outdated kitchen to a new bright updated and perfectly designed kitchen is amazing  Laura is an outstanding person a designer  She is the best along with the rest of the S and W Kitchens crew  
Our kitchen is perfect  George and Jo Rosenhauer

My wife and I are extremely satisfied with the entire scope of services provided by S and W Kitchens during the complete remodel of our kitchen From the initial design to the final cabinet trim Sarah remained accessible and attentive during the entire process This included but was not limited to effectively dovetailing our vision with her design expertise site visits for design consultation and measurements and subsequent verifications prior to ordering on site communication with the installer and staying in touch through the entire process From working with us to find the perfect slabs for the counter tops to helping us select our appliances we highly recommend Sarah Kraus and her team at S and W

We had a total kitchen remodel done by SW Rosemarie Szedula was our designer she did a fantastic job from start to finish She was ever present and kept everything on time and on track Her design and features were wonderful she had many great ideas that we love

We recently had a bathroom kitchen and bar area renovated by SW Kitchens We entered a project of this scale with some trepidation but overall the whole process went smoothly and we could not be happier with the outcome  Designer Lindsey Schwartz and superintendent Dale Thomas were diligent in the planning of the project such that each aspect was scoped out in detail before they started
Lindsey was always a pleasure to work with knowledgeable about overall design elements as well as available products and always responsive to messages She was able to guide us through making style choices without imposing her personal preferences Dale was always on top of the project available to meet to discuss details and had the knowledge and foresight to avoid problems that might occur 
All of the personnel including the construction workers were diligent and courteous 
All in all we are incredibly pleased with our renovations both aesthetically and from the quality that went into them We would work with SW again in a heartbeat

S W are wounderful people to work with They are extremely professional we did had some minor problems but they took care of any problem that popped up  They did suggest an appliance person that i used and they are helping me where the appliance company wont Not there fault The appliance company has some deal with a warranty company called dish do not use the dish warranty But again Dale and Mike are awesome to work with

Roisin Wong our project manager at SW Kitchens was simply fantastic She guided me through the entire process of renovating our kitchen from start to finish layout cabinet selection lighting countertop and backsplash and installation She is professional patient friendly talented and incredibly helpful She knew our budget and gave several options to help me stay within that budget She asked questions and made suggestions based on the way we use our kitchen As it is the most important room in our home she helped me put together a space that is light bright and welcoming Most important she designed a space that completely fits the design of our home I wholeheartedly recommend Roisin Wong

I had an excellent goldstar experience with SW Kitchens My designer Fred was outstanding and went above and beyond to strategize ideas for accomplishing my bathroom remodeling goals His creative solutions to my needs were wonderful SW is a first class company that employs first class top notch employees Everyone on the team was professional cordial friendly knowledgeable and fun to work with I enjoyed working with them on a first name basis  and getting to know them a bit I found them earnest and hardworking They treated me not only as a client but a real human I would recommend anyone interested in SWs services to contact them

After sourcing many companies and meeting with designers I made the final decision to hire SW for a complete remodel of our very outdated 23 yr old kitchen There wasnt a designer I met that I was more comfortable with then Roisin Wong We met with over 10 local companies and two from out of the area I was drawn back to SW based solely on my interaction with Roisin her compassion patience  level of expertise proved to be the right choice  Throughout the entire project I had my share of panic attacks and once again Roisin eased my fears concerns and Michael addressed any issue or complaints I had Overall the kitchen is amazing the layout gave us additional space something I thought would be impossible Everyone who comes into our home gives us endless compliments as to how beautiful our kitchen is I cant thank SW enough for the professionalism and outstanding quality of work I would definitely recommend their services coming from someone whos had their share of horrible contractors

We really disliked our kitchen at one time and decided to do something about that by hiring Sarah of SW who came highly recommended  The transformation to our new kitchen is amazing Not only does it look beautiful but it is very functional and we now have more storage with a very important new coffee station Sarah gave us a kitchen with a purpose and so aesthetically pleasing We have received many compliments We love it and enjoy every second Sarah truly brought our vision to light Thank you Sarah

We have done 2 renovations with SW master suite and kitchen plus flooring throughout house and have been thrilled Laura is a gifted designer who just knew what I would love  she was right AND professional down to the last detail  Dale and crew are experts and dedicated craftsmen  I enjoy working with them all and would NEVER consider using anyone else

My wife and I heard about SW kitchens from our friends at Real Radio 1041  After doing a little homework of our own it was a rather easy decision to go with them for our kitchen renovation  We werent planning on remodeling our kitchen however due to a leak in our old dishwasher we were forced into the situation  At first we were somewhat concerned with the timeframe budget and the quality of product we would be able to afford  My wife had a vision in her mind of what she wanted the kitchen to look like  Fortunately we ended up working with an amazing designer at SW Kitchens Sarah Kraus  Not only was Sarah able to offer us several highquality options within our budget but she also worked diligently with us to provide an itemized list of the products and services that were in scope for the renovation which was required by our insurance provider  We met with Sarah personally in the SW showroom as well as in our home on several occasions and she worked around our busy schedule to accommodate us  Once the design was completed and construction was underway Sarah made sure to keep us informed on what work would be done and by whom  As with any major construction project there are always a few hiccups along the way  What impressed me the most about Sarah and SW Kitchens was the confident reassurance that they would take on any unforeseen issues in stride and ensure the job was done not only to meet our requirements but also to meet their standard of excellence  Sarah was easy to communicate with by phone email and in person to discuss any concerns  With little to no delay she provided us with a remediation plan each time as well as a followup to ensure any and all issues were taken care of  In the end my wife and I are extremely happy to say that our kitchen is now picture perfect and with the customized personal design our house feels even more like our home A big thanks to Sarah and the rest of the SW team that made it all happen

Our master bath remodel was our second project with SW Once again we are delighted with the results Not only is our new master bathroom gorgeous it is efficient and functional No more clutter on the counter or in the shower Everything is hidden away while still being conveniently within reach The construction team addressed every detail resulting in the flawless execution of the design They were courteous professional and respectful at all times 

We worked with designer Laura Scott as we had on our kitchen project Her approach is collaborative and we knew she would help us bring our vision to life She listened to our needs and desires and then offered fresh ideas that complemented ours We appreciate how she touched base with us frequently from design to completion 

Bottom line we recommend SW and would definitely use them again

I recently finished a renovation of my kitchen and laundry room with SW kitchens I had used them before for my master bathroom
I highly recommend them It was a very professional job
Of course the process wasnt completely smooth but at every turn they came up with a good solutions to any problems encountered 
Krista Agapito my designer and Pete Coffman my construction manager were excellent Kristas design made my kitchen and laundry room much more functional and beautiful too Pete was great with keeping me informed everyday with what was to happen which I greatly appreciated Pete was also excellent with solving problems along the way
I what definitely recommend the whole team at SW Kitchens

We have used SW for both our kitchen and master bath We are very pleased with both projects The workmanship and professionalism of all the trades was top notch 
We feel the leadership and involvement of Robert Ungvarsky the contractor and Mary Burkhammer the designer insured a positive experience 
Roberts daily involvement and communication kept us current throughout the process That was greatly appreciated

We hired S W for our master bath remodel after online research Kristin designer  performed a thorough in house courtesy consultation with very accurate measuring We met at their Windermere location for  a 3D no pressure presentation and obtained an estimate Once we committed to the project  we got introduced to Robert Ungvarswky our project manager  From that moment on he was in charge on scheduling and keeping us informed of  day to day progress mostly via txt message with real time pictures  We encountered some unexpected work order changes but remained confident on their ability and disposition of finishing our project and meet our high expectations   We are happy with our final product and reassured that we can always contact them for any questions since they use reputable local companies And high quality materials  Robert showed great professionalism and was available to address all our questions which made the process less stressful I would recommend SW to friends in the future

Review for SW Kitchens WINDERMERE location
Necessary bathroom renovation LAKE NONA to make shower larger with wide door and ability to rollin wheelchair when necessary  Removed tub to expand shower area and elongate sink wall which gave much more storage space  Wasnt planning this project but became a necessary project for medical reasons and couldnt have gone more smoothly  If you are really price shopping this probably isnt the group for you  But if you have enough going on in your life already and want to know that the team is going to do the project properly and not cut corners and be there when they say they will be there then Robert and James are the team for you  You will pay more but I have seen some questionable construction around here but not with these guys  Everyone was on point the design the construction tilers electricians plumbers paintdrywall  If any construction project could ever be considered great this was it  It was a pleasure to welcome every member of this construction team into our home and if it ever becomes necessary again I wont even consider anyone else

I highly recommend this Contractor  I hired them on word of mouth and theyve done 2 bathrooms in a home which I just sold and we are on our third now in my home
I am working with Shirley and Eric and their professionalism is impressive  Construction is by nature chaotic messy and noisy  They minimized all these factors and I am able to let go and let them handle it every time When it is time to do another they will do it

SW Kitchens Melbourne FL office in particular is a great company to work with and Laura Scott is a wonderful designer 

I hired them to remodel our 35 year old kitchen and had no clue where to begin Laura walked us through the planning process with great patience and ease and cheerful demeanor beginning with an assessment of what we currently had and what we were hoping to accomplish in the finished design With that understanding of our needs she worked up several proposed configurations and presented them to us as 3D and 2D presentations Then she guided us through the material selection process for color style and mechanical configuration Once we were satisfied with all that she worked up a final plan including a detailed List of Materials and work plan 

During that process we also met with Dale construction lead Together they laid out a timeline for the construction giving us a time window of best case and worst case duration For the most part they hit the timeline as promised and finished within the original prediction window

The work crews were polite and friendly We felt very comfortable having them around the house no security concerns They answered any questions we had while they worked and during the job progress They worked carefully and kept the house as clean as possible by removing construction debris each day and hauling it away no dumpster in the driveway Floors were protected with heavyduty cardboard mats that were taped in place to prevent damage Our hardwood floors came through the process without damage We used plastic dropcloths over everything each day to shield from dust Its inevitable that dust gets everywhere Buy a stock of AC filters and plan on changing them out every day or at least every other day during demolition and early phases of the construction especially if drywall work is going on They can also place plastic sheeting to close off rooms as much as possible but the circulating air carries a lot of dust around the house nonetheless

Measurements were taken of our kitchen on at least two occasions measure twice cut once theory so as to be sure they were correct However we still ended up ordering a special cabinet in one position as the one cabinet was too wide for the location because they ordered the wrong size 

The quartz countertop fits perfectly Alignment and seam work are exceptional I couldnt find the seam until my wife pointed it out to me The quality of the backsplash tile work is also exceptional The installer meticulously hand fit pieces around the difficult areas After the cabinets were installed Laura inspected them and ordered replacement bits for anything that was scratched or dinged or had questionable surface finish They cabinet installers adjusted all the drawer slides and cabinet hinges for proper operation

They had first indicated that they would stage all the materials in their warehouse and then bring them over then we discussed storing them in the garage but we were concerned about humidity issues and bugs but in the end the materials were all staged in our family room We moved everything into the other rooms to make room for the materials It had two benefits first it was adjacent to the kitchen so it made work efficient and easy secondly all materials were under AC and so all dimensions stabilized in the wooden parts prior to installation It was inconvenient for us because of the crowding but it was probably the best solution in the end

It is inevitable that remodeling is inconvenient However SW Kitchens did their best to make everything flow smoothly We are very pleased with the finished result and I easily recommend SW Kitchens and Laura Scott for anyone seeking to remodel their kitchen

The team at S  W of James Robert and Aniko did an outstanding job of design and build with our kitchen remodelrenovation  They managed the entire project from start to finish  They kept us in the loop throughout and the project was on track from the beginning  The final results are incredible beyond expectations and we are very happy  We would recommend S  W and this team if youre considering any type of kitchen or home remodel  We will surely use them again for our next project  Thanks again

Thank goodness for SW Kitchens My husband and I had had bad experiences with renovations and contractors in the past and were beginning to think that there was no such thing as a good contractor Luckily we found SW Kitchens Whitney Rutledge immediately understood our style and knew what we were after from a design standpoint She planned out our kitchen renovation for maximum utility and suggested features that brought our kitchen renovation to a whole new level We are thrilled with what she and her team accomplished and we couldnt be happier  We definitely recommend Whitney and SW Kitchens for any project You wont be disappointed

We bought a fixer upper condo on the beach We had heard so many horror stories of remodels gone bad We hired SW because of their great reputation for customer service We were not disappointed Lindsey Schwartz was our designer  We did a complete remodel of master bath and kitchen and minor remodel on the two guest baths She clearly knows what she is doing and was a pleasure to work with We were impressed with the quality of work and how easy it was to work with SW All workers are given  background checks  This was important to us because our condo was not going to be livable during construction Dale the construction superintendent was great He impressed our condo Board of Directors   We needed their approval to proceed so this was important We did not get nickeled and dimed  to death The price in the contract is what we paid Every Friday I received an email from Lindsey with photos on progress for the week and plans for the next week 

 Everyone who has seen our remodel is totally impressed They are a high end remodeler and you will be happy you hired them

Whitney worked with us for several months to find exactly the look we wanted for flooring backsplash paint countertops IT turned out better than we could have imagined Mike managed the construction and was very responsive to our requests and change orders Thanks Mike and Whitney

SW Kitchens delivered on my kitchen remake It was a long and tedious process but construction manager Pete was on top of it all When things didnt work out he moved in and got it right Especially the wonderful company The Groutsmith who worked wonders in my   kitchen backsplash tile  Thank you Pete and SW

It was a great experience working with Lacie Rice from SW Kitchen in South Tampa   They took great care of us and the end result is a stunning a high quality Poggenpohl kitchen  Recommend SW to anyone

We worked with S  W to remodel our master bath  Working with Carol our designer was a pleasure  She made us feel comfortable and valued  Our project manager Pete was easy to work with and kept us updated on the project and let us know when to expect workers on a daily basis  Carol and Pete and the whole S  W team were always respectful of us and our home  We couldt be happier with the finished  project  Would highly recommend working with this company

I chose SW Cabinets to redo my kitchen Shirley and team from GC Mike to all the individuals that performed the many tasks were great and highly professional They kept me informed and as the project progressed Mike even made sure that I had a functional kitchen as soon as they could since this project occurred during the holidays

S  W did a great job and we are 100 pleased with our beautiful outdoor kitchen Working with Yina was a pleasure and we highly recommend her  she was always available and totally responsive to all of our needs

I totally LOVE the way my kitchen came out  With the assistance of Laura at SW it is my dream kitchen that I waited 21 years for  I love to cook and this kitchen makes me want to do more  I will post pics at a different time  I had my colors in mind but the selection and staff were great  Will definitely use them again most likely in bath room

I had been planning and visioning my outdoor living area for a couple of years before finally pulling the trigger I had numerous companies come out to provide designs and quotes to best accomplish my ideas I chose Sarah with S  W Kitchens to move forward with my project because I was impressed with her background and willingness to research ideas that she had not done before The work went as scheduled the job was clean and everyone friendly When the project was complete it was exactly what I had envisioned and I could not have been happier I have been described as very particular and have frustrated contractors on previous projects with my expectations The team at S  W did not bat an eye and made sure that everything was completed exactly to my request I would highly recommend Sarah and S  W Kitchens for anyone that is in the market for an upgrade or an addition to their living area

Mayerlin at SW Kitchens was our designer for our kitchen remodel  She was very professional and very easy to work with  She took the time to make sure our needs were met within our budget  Everything was done on time and our kitchen turned out beautiful  I highly recommend Mayerlin and SW Kitchens

SW Kitchens redid our kitchen and replaced all our tile flooring in the house  Designer Jaime was patience itself as he helped us select product guiding us to the price quality and styles that we were interested in  He accommodated our schedule for meetings at home and at the show room  Project supervisor Austin kept us informed through every step of the process  He communicated with us every single day most days in person as he stopped by to check on the work  If not in person then on the phone  If I needed to call him he always answered my call  All the workers did great work were polite and efficient  I would most definitely use SW Kitchens again

The SW team lead by Krista was phenomenal to work with during our entire process She Mollie and Haleh from the Winter Park location were intuitive creative and had follow through after every meeting They gave clear direction and recommendations Dale their specialist that did the install was professional polite and very talented in making any needed adjustments to  our cabinets Theres nothing better than working with experienced people that actually listen when were investing in high quality cabinets with smart designs I would 100 recommend them for any design needs

We had managed several home renovation projects in our previous home and we were reluctant to start another one in our current home knowing the time commitment and the disruptions to your life  As a result we thought we would start with a small project of replacing our kitchen cabinet doors  Our research brought us to SW Kitchens  After our initial meeting and learning they were a full service company we decided to switch projects and move forward with the renovation of one of our guest bathrooms  Once we connected with Lacie Rice in the South Tampa office we loved the entire process  She was amazing to work with and had great design ideas  The SW process was fantastic  Lacie and Mike construction foreman facilitated everything for us from design demo renovations and inspections  Lacie reviewed every finishdetail budget and calendar with us up front  The timeline was accurate and the project was completed on time and within budget  Lacie and Mike were awesome to work with during the project  they were very communicative and were great with our dog  We did not worry about a thing  it was the smoothest renovation project we have ever had  The finished product is beautiful  we love the new bathroom and our family does too  We highly recommend using SW for anyone that is contemplating any house renovations  We will be using SW on our next project  Thank you Lacie Mike and SW Kitchens

We started out with the intention of hiring a contractor to perform a  modest kitchen renovation replacing cabinet doors and countertops but even that proved to be daunting as we needed to manage and schedule each trade separately  Then we found SW Kitchens  SW acts as the general contractor and handles everything from design to renovation and appliance installation 
Our modest kitchen renovation mushroomed into a whole house makeover  we replaced everything in the kitchen including the appliances which we ordered through SW added new wood flooring throughout the house renovated a bathroom added crown molding built out a new pantry and more  
Lacie in the south Tampa office was fantastic throughout the design and construction process  She spent countless hours with us not only in her shop and in our home but also accompanied us to our numerous visits to varied locations to select our countertops plumbing fixtures electrical fixtures etc Eric was the construction foreman on our project and was likewise great to work with  We couldnt be happier with the finished product and would definitely recommend SW to anyone contemplating a home renovation project large or small

Everyone I came in contact with was professional patient and knowledgeable including the subcontractors Workmanship was good and communication was timely and clear
I would recommend this company as long as u dont mind paying a little more

When we decided to do a complete teardown and redo of our kitchen we knew we needed a fullservice company that would manage the process start to finish We definitely got that with SW Kitchens  They took care of every detail and gave us a new kitchen that exceeded our dreams and expectations 

We knew we needed a designer that we would feel comfortable working with Our designer Laura Scott listened to us and completely understood our vision She used her design knowhow and considerable talent to pull together a kitchen that is not only beautiful but incredibly efficient as well There is nothing better than function meeting form and she definitely achieved that for us  She was attentive to our project throughout the process checking to make sure all was going well  She went with me to the slab yard and patiently viewed all the countertop options to narrow down the selection  I really appreciated her helpful suggestions and support during the selection process  Picking out the color palette and the various materials for the kitchen was a breeze with her guidance  Looking at the result we would not change a thing 

We were impressed with the SW planning process where no detail was overlooked A great deal of attention was given to planning which we believe is a large part of the success of the project SW provided us with full documentation including all of our decisions plans and diagrams for the crew and the sequence of events that would take place over the course of the project The project stayed on track with only minor delays resulting in a fully functioning kitchen by the promised end date

Our project manager Dale Thomas is highly skilled at managing a project  Not only did he keep the project moving he used exemplary problem solving skills to resolve issues that came up along the way  He elicited excellence from his crew trade contractors and vendors  Observing him in action we came to trust that we were in good hands with Dale and crew
Friends had warned us that a kitchen redo of this magnitude would be a horrible experience  But SW made it as painless as possible Before tearing down the kitchen they moved our refrigerator to the dining room so that we could set up a temporary kitchen to use during construction They were thoughtful of our comfort throughout the process keeping disruption to a minimum The crew was friendly and considerate They cleaned up at each step of the process and hauled away multiple trailers full of debris They hooked up our washer and dryer early on to allow us to do laundry at home as soon as possible  Long story short the experience was far less disruptive than we expected  

In a word SW stands for excellence  We are glad we went with them and would definitely use SW again in the future

I have worked together with Matt Carpenter on multiple occasions now and would highly recommend him to anyone in need of a professional cabinet designer  His projects always run smoothly from start to finish and his ability to incorporate amazing design features is second to none  Keep up the great work Matt I look forward to the next one

Just completed a major renovation kitchen bath laundry room and fireplace with SW Kitchens I choose SW because of a recommendation from a friend and neighbor and to avoid all the nightmare kitchen remodeling stories I have heard over the years  SW came through for us and it was a stressfree remodeling project Our SW designer Mary Burkhammer took the time to understand our design goals and vision and added the detail to turn our dream into a real plan and design My husband is a detailoriented engineer and he was greatly impressed by the SW design and build process Our construction foreman Robert Ungvarsky turned the design into a reality  They send master craftsmen across all the trades to complete your project Believe me you will not find this level of craftsmen in the yellow pages Im so satisfied with their work I will be calling SW to remodel my master bath

I am an interior designer in Orlando and I have worked with Matt Carpenter on several of my projects  The experience has been nothing but positive  Matt is easy to work with and creative as well  We have worked on large custom jobs as well as more simplistic projects  The result has always been the same total customer satisfaction and ease of execution  I would certainly recommend them for your cabinetry job

I have had three remodeling jobs done by Bill and Tom of S  W Kitchens in Longwood Florida One bathroom and my kitchen were totally removed and rebuilt  The other bathroom was basically refreshed with old wallpaper removed new flooring bathroom hardware vanity mirror and fresh paint Bill provided the decorating expertise while Tim supplied the project planning supervision and selection of fantastic craftsman My kitchen had some layout issues that compromised its utility  These utility issues were completely resolved and I was left with a much more useable space  All three spaces always receive compliments from my guests I recommend the pair to anyone considering remodeling

I bought a house on bayshore 2 years ago and decided to totally remodel the whole kitchen  After interviewing a few designers we settled on SW  This is a totally honest review and anyone is welcome to come see our amazing kitchen The design of the kitchen was amazing  Wolf and Subzero appliances great layout beautiful counters cabinets and flooring  Its been a year and we are still amazed at how well it came out Larissa was our designer in the Tampa office and she is totally gifted Our foreman was John and he kept us up to date through out the project The subcontractors were pros as well  The price was agreed upon upfront and that didnt change even though there were some changes along the way

We chose Sarah at SW because of her design ideas listening and understanding what effect and style we wanted to achieve  She has been wonderful to work withvery talented with lots of great ideas  We realize were not always easy to work with but Sarah has been wonderful throughout the project

This is the 2nd phase of our kitchen remodel Kristin Rutkowski and SW crew were very professional in meeting our needs Our Project Manager Robert Ungvarsky kept us up to date on crews coming in to work on our house They were very professional and listened to our needs and requests  We love the new change updates such as moving Washer and Dryer and placing additional Cabinets into our Galley Kitchen Design  Love the extra space  Thank you Kristen and Robert for a very good experience

We needed a complete kitchen and master bathroom renovation and after 3 quotes for the job we selected SW Kitchens Whitney Jeff and project supervisor Eric were all so professional helpful and knowledgable Whitneys help in everything from the design to the selection of cabinets counter tops and matching tile to existing flooring The plumbing fixtures I had in mind she was able to match to a brand that fit our budget

I have worked on several homes with SW over the last couple of years and the experience has been fantastic Matt brings years of experience knowledge and creativity to make each and every project unique I know when I bring a client here they are taken care of from start to finish because of Matts dedication to the project from the initial sketches to detailed drawings to onsite meetings and installation I will continue to bring my clients to Matt and the SW team for their outstanding customer service

After a previous kitchen project with SW we were certain that they would be the ones to remodel our bathrooms As expected the same quality was delivered Larissa was there every step of the way creating a design that was what we had imagined and seeing every detail through to its final stages Larissas assistant Yina and construction manager Mike were excellent and responded quickly to our questions

SW were incredible  Krista listened to what we wanted  They provided a detailed set of drawings to review  They changed the drawings until the design was perfect  The budget was fixed and our family and SW found ways to make it work  Then the work began  The team was professional  The workmanship was at the highest level  If the work was not as indicated on the drawings then it was reworked  Changes happened and adjustments were made  The project finished on schedule
