SW Longwood did a fantastic job remodeling my condo I had a basic idea of how I wanted my new kitchen to look Greg Flassigs design gave me more than I had thought possible Greg listened carefully to how I wanted my kitchen to feel and he presented me with options that created my dream kitchen Greg and his team paid careful attention to every detail In addition to the kitchen SW removed and replaced my popcorn ceilings throughout with a knockdown finish They installed new flooring and coordinated with my carpeting company with my painters to ensure a seamless completion I will definitely use Greg and his team again and highly recommend them

We absolutely love our bathroom remodels Master and Guest  An outdated space was turned into our own personal spa  Our designer Sarah Kraus was a dream to work with  A complete professional that helped us bring our vision to life making it nicer than we could have imagined  We are busy professionals with hectic schedules  Sarah was considerate of our time and flexible with her schedule  Remodeling can be stressful  Sarah ensured we had a pleasant experience  She has great vision and will help you make the most of any space

I absolutely love my new master retreat  Thanks to the incredible design ideas of Sarah Kraus I have an incredible master bedroom and master bath  Sarah took a 1980s bathroom with a huge tub and tiny shower and redesigned it into a luxury spa oasis  I asked for a wow factor and she delivered  The old tub area is now an incredible shower with a river rock floor quartz seating and beautiful quartz and river rock shelving  The shower wall with the window is framed in a unique tile that brings the beauty of the view into the room  The cabinetry is elegant and functional with a ton of storage  She turned a tiny shower into a linen closet and added a new dimension to the room by adding a barn door with a mirror    The quartz waterfall countertop and shelving are a beautiful finish to an incredible space  Sarah is very nice to work with and she listened to what I wanted and took my suggestions and designed the rooms to my personality  If you are looking to transform a space into something special Sarah Kraus is the person for the job  You will not be disappointed in her artistic creative abilities  I would highly recommend her   
The review would be 5 stars if I only considered the designer and the final product  However since this is a review for SW Kitchens I can only give 4 stars   We had so many issues with our master suite remodel  We went through 3 superintendents and the first 2 were not very organized and did not communicate with us  We would show up expecting to see progress just to find out that things had not been done and no one bothered to let us know  Even with the detailed instruction book we had a lot of mistakes  The tile folks used the wrong grout on the entire floor added a step down into the shower and cut and tiled one wall so that everything was off center   By the time Tim Hobson came into the picture we were weeks behind schedule and completely frustrated  Tim immediately started communicating with us and all of the mistakes were corrected and the job was completed  SW did provide additional work at no cost to make up for the mistakes that were made during the renovation  Sarahs design and choice of products deserves a 5 star rating

Sarah was magnificent She worked tirelessly to ensure the bathroom design we were looking for translated into exactly what we wanted Her suggestions and recommendations were always with our best interests in mind She maintained regular communication to keep us in the loop and aware of any work schedule changes

Sarah had a great eye for detail and was extremely knowledgeable of all pertinent bathroomrelated products Her suggestions were based on knowledge and not just guesswork 

The finished product is nothing short of a thing of beauty and surpasses all we could hope for We cant wait to show it off

Thanks Sarah for taking the time to work with us You did a fantastic job
changed a shower into a bathtub for the grandkids  great designer and tileman  a little pricey but got an high end quality product

Have worked with Andy Meeder with S  W Kitchens on several 
projects He is a tremendous designer with a sharp eye
A great talent I hope we have many more together

We were fortunate to have Laura Scott and Dale Thomas create a gorgeous master bathroom for us where none existed before  There wasnt any existing plumbing and the electrical had to be totally redone as it wasnt up to code  We live in an old 1935 house and they turned what used to be a very small 10 x 5 enclosed front porch into a spa like retreat  It definitely was an adventure as we encountered many stumbling blocks along the way as one does when challenged with renovating an old home  You never know what you might uncover including a few extra layers of floors extra layers of ceiling and extra layers of walls  The original design would have been beautiful but because of all the adjustments we had to make the design morphed and developed along the way and it came out even better than the original plan and I wouldnt change a thing or the process that got us here  Laura was fabulous to work with and from the moment we met her we felt like we had known each other for years  She was such a joy to work with and we felt that we were always on the same page when it came to coming up with materials or ideas  She definitely got our vision  I couldnt have asked for a better team  Dale our construction guru was incredible when it came to having awesome and unique ideas that fit perfectly with not only our style but the style of the house  We kept having to change materials and adding and subtracting things and he was always so creative but always keeping in mind the era of the house and the fact that we were trying to stay true to that and we had a great time feeding ideas off of each other with the end result that the finished product was something we can all be very proud of  I cannot thank the team at SW Kitchens enough for not only giving us the master bathroom of our dreams but also for making the experience one we will always cherish

Susan  Gary Drake

Hiring S and W Kitchens was possibly the worse decision Ive made as a homeowner The project was started in December and was to be completed by midApril It is now well into August and the work has yet to be completed I was told by Larissa Berendsen that all the materials would be ordered prior to demolition was I didnt know was that much of what was ordered would be the incorrect size color or style My foyer tile was installed three times before they used the correct tile Bedrooms were all painted the wrong color The wrong interior doors were ordered The wrong interior hardware was ordered The wrong laundryroom cabinets were ordered The glass panels on the custom front doors were incorrect Hardwood floors in all bedrooms were damaged upon installation and had to be ripped out and replaced The kitchen lights continue overheat and cutout after 20 minutes of use On one occasion my neighbors called to let me know that my front doors were left wide open without anyone on site for hours I came home to find my doors unlocked at least five times There is a lot more but this gives you some idea I met with the owner Joe Steenbeke two months ago to address these glitches and he assured me that the problems would be addressed yet two months later I am without a finished home I saved for seven years to afford a home remodel it is heartbreaking to know that I gave my money to people who care nothing about their customers

We are extremely pleased with the remodel of our master bathroom  Working with Lindsey and Dale was a pleasure They were very professional and even when we ran into an electrical problem that was not their fault they helped us get the issue resolved and worked diligently with our condo association to help us move the project forward We finished within the budget and love the new look  I would highly recommend Lindsey and SW

I hired SW to remodel my master bath  during the initial meeting I was told it would only take 34 weeks then when I went to sign the contract it stated 57 weeks When I questioned the time I was told by the designer its in all our contracts but it wont take that long I promise  Then when the job manager came out to do the first look at the bath I was told it would take the full 7 weeks  I questioned this with the designer and he said it probably would so he lied  We went through not having people show up to having inferior work done  The tub had to be removed three times due to measurements not being correct counter had to be removed due to wrong measurements glass around shower had to be removed due to wrong measurements  Each time it would take another week or two to get them back out It finally took over 12 weeks to remodel a 10X12 bath I called the owners and never received a call back I wrote them and never heard a word I have other issues but will just say I wouldnt recommed SW for any project Im doing

The designer Sarah Kraus did an amazing job of helping me design my master bathroom She showed me the whole process from start to finish We went over each product that was going to installed in the bathroom Since this is my first remodel of a room I was overwhelmed with all the steps it takes and the process involved Sarah showed me the process and the steps it takes to do the project Without her help and guidance I would be stressed over the project Sarah is a true professional in that she has the knowledge and the ability to deal with my budget of the project I would highly recommend Sarah Kraus as a designer for either your bathroom or your kitchen design
Bill Burke was our designer and he did an excellent job transforming our kitchen into my dream kitchen I would highly recommend SW Kitchens to anyone

Could not be happier with S  W Kitchens  Our kitchen renovation is a total success and mainly due to the efforts of our designer Sarah Kraus  She stayed on top of the progress being made every step of the way and kept us informed almost daily  Since this was our first renovation this was very much apppreciated and would not hesitate to contact her again for any future plans  Great job Sarah

Beautiful job on my bathroom   Great designer and superintendent  No complaints Left my bathroom spotless  All the workers were top notch  Will definitely use S  W for my next project  Kirsten worked very well with me

Worked with designer Lola Gainer and Construction Superintendent Eric Rodeback from Palm Harbor office  They were very professional and great attention to detail  Remodeled a condo kitchen when we were away as this is a second home  New cabinets hardware sink faucet flooring tile backsplash countertops under cabinet lighting and appliances  Completed on time and on budget  Would highly recommend
I find SW Kitchens very professional and knowledgeable about their products The prices are reasonable The work is exceptional

My husband and I chose S  W Kitchens to design and remodel our 1983 kitchen  I could not be happier  We were treated with such respect and professionalism  Our kitchen cost approximately 77000 dollars and it was worth every cent  Everyone went out of their way to make this experience go smoothly and it did

SW did a fantastic job on our kitchen renovation Greg Flassig and everyone involved were highly professional knowledgeable and respectful We were kept informed every step of the way and we absolutely love everything about our new kitchen Would highly recommend Greg and the SW team

My wife and I recently had one of our residential bathrooms totally demolished and renovated We decided to use SW Kitchens because they are local have a reputation for a top quality finished product and have been in business since the 1970s 

Also one of the main selling points for us was the designer Sarah Kraus Sarah developed the layout and basic design ideas She discussed all the menu of products designs prices colors etc and incorporated our preferences into a final design My wife and Sarah worked very closely to coordinate each detail 

Sarah is very thorough She verified all the products necessary for the job both at the warehouse and at our home before the renovation could proceed She communicated with us daily and was always available to us when we called 

The project finished slightly ahead of schedule and on budget My wife and I are extremely happy with our new bathroom SW provided us with a professional team and they did a very professional job for us 

But we cannot overemphasize the value Sarah Kraus played toward making this such a great success She built the foundation with her attention to detail keen eye for design and quickly developing a free and open communications with my wife and me Therefore we give Sarah our highest recommendation
From start to finish I was completely happy with the design team and contract team from the Palm Harbor office Kristin Phillips made my kitchen the amazing centerpiece of the house Thank you guys

Bill is very knowledgeable  in all aspects of kitchen design  I am on the radio with Bill quite often on a home improvement show and we have had many great discussions about kitchen design the design process the excellent teams of installers they use etc  Ive spoken with some of his clients and have seen some of the kitchens they have designed that are just beautiful    If you want to speak to the most knowledgeable kitchen designers in town S and W Kitchens is the place to call

Greg Flassig designed the renovation of our Master Bedroom bath  We are thrilled with the outcome  We wanted a roll in shower to accommodate our needs in our golden years  Gregs design was both elegant and highly functional  Greg was also very responsive to all of our concerns as construction progressed  Great job

We hired SW Kitchens to renovate our Master Bath Sarah Kraus was our designer  Sarah was a joy and pleasure to work with  From the beginning she really listened to our vision our ideas and somewhat lengthy list of desires for our bathroom  She was able to incorporate what she heard from us saw in our way of living and personal design to create a gorgeous functional and unique Master Bathroom that we will enjoy and appreciate for many many years to come Our vision came to fruition with Sarahs amazing skills and artistic flair Truly a dream collaboration Sarah and the whole team Chris the superintendent as well as all of the very skilled tradesmen were there for us through the entire process  There were a few bumps in the road as expected in a project of this size but they responded quickly and did what it took from each of their perspectives to correct or overcome any issues that came up Sarah became a friend through this process and I would not hesitate to recommend her and have her design our next project I would also like to mention that all of the people we worked with throughout this project were first rate and a pleasure to talk to and work with Their skills were evident which shows in the end result We have a great deal of respect for everyone who participated in our project Although slightly more expensive than other quotes I believe it was well worth it as SW stands by what they do and deliver a quality product and service We have already had someone ask if they can rent out the spa

I hired SW Kitchens to do a whole house renovation This included the kitchen the master bathroom and the guest bedroom and floors  They did a spectacular job of transforming a pig sty into a palace  I worked with designer Krista and contractor Tim  They made sure everything was done either on schedule or ahead of schedule and on budget If there were any concerns each were easily reached by phone or text and the issue would be resolved post haste

Our experience was not a positive one  When we went in for a final review of our plans there were several issues  The designer left out several details that were very important to us including the wrong size upper cabinets which created other issues  We were very clear about what we wanted and the designers reaction was to blame us for making too many changes  We feel changes are part of the process and so many would not have been necessary if our designer would have listened and not continually added their personal preferences into our design  The worst part of the experience was when trying to finalize the design for a 2nd time we were pressured by the manager to make a quick decision  In the end we discontinued working with them and would not recommend them as we feel they were dishonest and did not deliver what they promised

We had a 20 year old bathroom with ugly cracking tile and a jetted tub that was never used We didnt know know exactly what we wanted but knew what we did not want Kristin showed us options we did not realize were  possible  The end result is wonderful The construction went smoothly SW clearly explained how the remodel would progress Our new master bathroom is great
We are currently planning our next renovation with SW

SW Kitchens did a total remodel of my 27 year old kitchen and brought it beautifully into the 21st century My designer Mary Burkhammer was exceptional and was with me in every aspect of the design and construction The SW crew rolled like a welloiled machine during the entire process They were extremely knowledgable professional and dependable This was a big project building up walls tearing up flooring redesigning the footprint adding new lighting and electrical outlets re plumbing etc and it was totally STRESS FREE for me from start to finish My new cabinets are of the highest quality as is everything used in the renovation project Floor countertops back splashes lighting appliances hardware  all top notch  I couldnt be happier with the final results and would highly recommend SW Kitchens to any one who wants a truly quality company

Sarah Kraus from S  W Kitchens designed our beautiful Jack and Jill Bathroom We found them a very professional firm and were delighted with the final product The project was completed on time which was wonderful S  W Kitchens come highly recommended by us

Mrs Rachel Miller

S  W Kitchens just designed and installed my beautiful new kitchen I am very pleased with the final product Everyone is very professional and very quick to handle all questions and concerns And though it was tough at times to be without a fully usable kitchen S  W made the process less painful by staying on track They actually completed the project a little ahead of schedule Thank you project manager Tony I highly recommend them to everyone And kudos to my designer Jean for her attention to style and detail Thank you S  W

SW kitchens did my design and remodel of my 23 year old kitchen The design was fabulous and the remodel went perfect Krista from SW did the design and she really knows her craft Very knowledgeable and understands all the different aspects of the construction process She is very attentive and when she is not available she has a very capable right hand person Whitney that is Johnny on the Spot Bottom line They do what they say they will do and they do it well We are extremely happy with the end results

Outstanding We have nothing but positive recommendations for Lindsey Schwartz at Brevard S  W Kitchens

It all began with Lindsey listening to our wishes then moved on to her designing and creating our condo kitchen master bath  guest bath renovation Not only did she listen to what our desires were but added so many great practical and decorative ideas all the time keeping within our budget allowance Lindsey  Kevin visited our condo to get ideas of what we wanted to do for the renovation they spent time learning what we wanted discovering what style kitchen baths would suit us best with our renovation Kevin measured everything to make sure what we decided to do would work for our space  meet our condo building code

 We replaced our kitchen  bathroom cabinets removed some walls replaced  counters sinks lighting mirrors appliances removed all popcorn ceilings replacing with textured ceilings  had entire condo painted With this being an ocean front condo Lindsey designed our kitchen counter with a slight wave along the edge  added wavy tile backsplash to carry on the ocean wave theme using neutral Quartz stone with tiny seashells on top of white cabinets It is just beautiful  quite the conversation piece

Project manager Dale was awesome to work with coordinating the entire project  managing all of the subs plus doing a lot of work himself The subs were all top quality  were all fantastic from the cabinet installers counter templaters  painters electrician plumber appliance installer all took tremendous pride in their work All kept very clean work space  thoroughly cleaned up space each day when they were finished

We felt we were in good hands with our renovation from start to finish Lindsey did not rest until she was sure we were happy with everything no matter how small the detail Not only was she knowledgeable in all areas including electrical plumbing cabinetry along with kitchen  bath design she was a joy to work with We highly recommend Lindsey  her team

We were pleased with the plans SW drew up for the remodeling of our two  bathrooms  Everything went smoothly with the work  SW personnel and contractors went out of their way to see that we were pleased

We were looking for a full service company to coordinate the work needed to update our  kitchen cabinets and two guest baths We are very pleased with our decision to work with Nate Schuck our project designer and the team at SW Kitchens Nate listened to our needs provided great ideas and worked within our budget Travis Boley our superintendent coordinated the activities and was quick to respond to our questions The quality of the products and service and the attention to detail was outstanding We had an excellent experience and would highly recommend Nate and SW Kitchens
Guidance throughout a stressful kitchen renovation  Excellent choice of cabinets colors  marble and granite  backsplash Professional installation that has held up

I contacted SW Kitchens and spoke to Nate  He came to my house and previewed the remodel of our guest bathroom  We had been having major mold problems which drastically affected my wifes health  We got three bids but even though they were not the lowest I was impressed with the way SW personnel communicated with us  We signed the contract to completely remodel the guest bathroom with Nate and set a date to commence the remodel with Nate and the Superintendent on the job Chris Hooper  Because of the problem with mold they moved the work forward and started construction  We were completely happy with the results and we would recommend SW to anybody we know who needs work done  To us first comes dollar cost and then communication  I stressed this to all three contractors  SW was the only company to comply and stay in regular touch with us throughout the remodel  Again Nate Chris and the people that did the remodeling were all outstanding  Everybody that worked on our home was friendly very knowledgeable and took great care in the work they did

My name is Jack Flemm i am  home owner in windermere fl I have had the extreme pleasure of doing two kitchens and three bathrooms with Nate Schuck Each experience was better than the last Nate is a real pro He has an incredible eye for design while always respecting my wallet even when i do not seriously Nate is willing to speak his mind and work with your ideas the first kitchen and two bathrooms were mostly his ideas and the second kitchen and one bath were mostly mine i love them both 
Nate does a great job of making you the customer feel comfortable while under promising and over delivering at the moment i have run out of projects but i will always remember Nate Schuck when the next one shows up You will love working with Nate and his team i guarantee it

Our designer was fabulousMary listened to our needs and planned the kitchen to what we were envisioning  Tim was our project manager he communicated beautifully and was very willing to listen when we had concerns  The cabinets are gorgeous and installed perfectly  We also loved the counter tops beautiful  Everything that was recommended to us delivered  Very pleased

The S  W Kitchen designer we worked with Greg Flassig was very conscientious in helping us decide what materials and colors to use in our new kitchen remodel  He gave us plenty of options but did not overwhelm us  He listened to our needs and wants and was able to incorporate some fresh and innovative ideas into our living space without destroying the uniqueness of our home Greg was very personable and patient even when our decisions changed dramatically at the last minute when we added extra floor tile into our family room The whole S  W team worked well together to finish the project on time and they continued to be available when a few details needed to be redone after the project was completed  We felt very comfortable with all of their workers and employees  We highly recommend S  W Kitchens for quality service and distinctive designs

We just used SW to add a bathroom and they were awesome They made an addition to the house adding a bathroom in our garage The bathroom is beautiful and they finished ahead of schedule I have a newborn and they were always so accommodating They would call us to tell us who would be there the next day and when they would be there The room was finished several weeks ahead of schedule and could not have come out better We are so happy that we chose them

S  W Kitchens Remodeled my kitchen removed a wall raised the ceiling new cabinets and countertops new plumbing and electric
The designer assigned to me was Kirsten Phillips from the Palm Harbor location She was WONDERFUL She really listened to me I was not present for the construction however she kept me informed every step of the way with calls texts and pictures Everything was finished to my complete satisfaction Kirsten and the others went above and beyond to make sure that I was happy with my new kitchen  I do not have one bad word to say about any of the people involved with my remodel Do not hesitate to contract with this company

SW completed a massive renovation for me in a most competent efficient and timely manner  Chris Druschel and Tim Hobson were my main contactsadvisorsdesigners and working with them was truly a pleasure  The project was completed on schedule in my absence and with constant feedback and progress reports  The quality of product and workmanship were extremely satisfactory  

I am completely satisfied with the final result and would recommend SW without reservation

Adam from the Palm Harbor location came into our home in Brooksville and enlarged as well as completely remolded our kitchen  We had used Adam and S and W previously so we knew what to expect  Adam and his team were on time and ready to go  Project took less time than expected and came in on budget  Anyone looking for quality work needs to go to S and W

My wife and I were looking at doing a large renovation to our foyer living room gallery moving the kitchen laundry room dining room and two bath rooms We talked to several companies before S  W Kitchens and after meeting with Chris Druschel his ideas the store and meeting some of the management we were sold on SW as the best people to hire 
Working with Chris was a real pleasure and what a great design we as a team came up with  The project once started went very smoothly from start to finish All of the outstanding subcontractors were very professional and Tim Hobson  construction project manager worked the daily problems and kept everything on track The project was finished well ahead of schedule and we are extremely pleased with the quality of workmanship and attention to details that was put into beautiful restoration SW and all of the people involved in this project are highly professional very talented and a real pleasure to work with  
A very special thanks to Chris and Tim for an outstanding job We couldnt be happier

Lindsey did an awesome job in translating my concepts descriptions and examples of what I was looking for in my kitchen remodel  While modern is not typical in Brevard Lindsey was excited to do a project of that nature  

The job consisted of new cabinets countertops and appliances  While no walls were moved and the basic layout was retained it was still a fairly extensive job  

The entire SW team were very professional and I was always kept up to date as to what was going to happen when  There were very few issues that came up during the project  The communication was always timely  Whether it was Lindsey the job foreman or any subcontractors they always communicated directly and honestly when any issues needed resolving and sought my input in determining solutions  I felt that my satisfaction was their primary goal  

The kitchen turned out fabulous and I would not hesitate to recommend them highly to friends  I plan to update a bath in the near future and plan to give Lindsey and SW my business when I do

As we embarked on a major remodel of our kitchen and both bathrooms we were quite impressed with SWs design and materials selection We tweaked the plans a bit but only to accommodate our concerns about wear and tear in the kitchen as we use our kitchen a lot SW quickly made some changes in the materials and we were set to go The materials selection process was a breeze SW narrowed down the material selections to two to three choices which for us designchallenged types was very helpful If we didnt like any of the choices they would bring in two or three additional choices  
Throughout the entire process SW was very professional Before any work started we had plans we understood the costs and we understood what would happen if we ran into unexpected snags Enduring a remodel can be challenging but a few things that we really appreciated were
Everything was resolved to our satisfaction There was never any quibbling with anything we were not pleased with 
All workman and subs were very polite conscientious and always cleaned up at the end the dayand when youre living through a remodel thats very much appreciated
SW is very responsive to callsemails
The project was completed in about three months and we couldnt be happier It turned out fantastic We did go slightly over budget however that was mostly due to changesadditions that we made Since the remodel weve had a few little things break or require some adjustment which SW attended to right away no questions asked

We give SW high marks There were no surprises on cost design project timing etc They have a great pricevalue proposition and they are there for you during and after the project So without hesitation we highly recommend SW

Outstanding describes our experience working with Chris Druschel of S and W Kitchens From the design stage through demolition construction and completion Chris worked diligently to bring our unique vision to fruition The quality of the materials and workmanship was of the highest order At no time did we feel pressured to hurry the process Deadlines were met We would strongly recommend Chris Druschel of S and W Kitchens for any project

We decided to update parts of our home and met Chris at S  W Kitchens   It was a pleasure from start to finish    We had both bathrooms and kitchen cabinets refaced and quartz counter tops in both bathroom    The work is perfect and we were so happy we decided this year to have the kitchen counter top replaced with the same quartz we used in the bathrooms   It had been tiled a few years ago but after seeing the quartz in the bathrooms we could not resist completing the project by having the tile removed and the same quartz installed   Every thing went so well  jobs completed on time and all involved were very kind polite and skilled    It makes us wish there was more work we could have done

Project consisted of all new wood floors through out the house new granite counter tops in the kitchen new back splash and new appliances

The designer Kristin was very patient with her picky clients and in the end it was worth it She worked with us on finding the right floor grade and stain color granite slabs and back splash design The gentleman that installed the wood floors was second to none for being detail oriented thorough and you knew he took pride in his work The other subs did quality work as well and knew their craft The project manager did a good job of trying to keep everything moving towards completion

I did not give 5 stars due to the lack of communication and it was obvious the PM had too many projects assigned The end result was quality craftsmanship and product

Chris response to our problem was quickly resolved  In all of our dealings with SandW Kitchens we have been extremely pleased with their professionalism and rapid response to our questions and concerns High quality work completed on time with excellent results  We will use them again on our next project
We recently had an issue with lighting but it was resolved with one phone call  GREAT  RESPONSE AND SERVICE

We hired sw kitchens to do a complete tear down and build up of our 2 bedroom beach condo  Adam Vinson of the Palm Harbor office and his crew did a superb job  They worked carefully with us to consider all the options for flooring paint countertops windows etc and helped us make the proper selections that fit both our taste and our budget  SW overcame challenges with permits condo building restrictions and unexpected structural oddities  The crews that worked on our place were very capable and professional  With the completed job we have a redecorated condo unit that looks fantastic and meets our every need  We are very happy and satisfied and cannot thank SW and Adam Vinson enough for creating such a wonderful place to live  I would highly recommend SW to anyone looking to renovate their house or condo

We purchased Omega cabinetry from SW kitchens for our bathrooms  We love the high quality American made product from Omega cabinetry  The SW designers are very knowledgeable about the product and were able to help us customize the layout color and design for our particular needs With their large selection of products that they carry SW staff was able to help us decide on the product that was right for us and our budget The cabinets were delivered to our house in the time frame that was estimated  My husband did all the installation of the cabinetry and SW was very helpful with questions he had during installation  We will soon be doing our kitchen and will most definitely be purchasing through SW Kitchens

We were very excited to remodel our Master Bathroom  It started out as just adding a jetted tub to the space and grew into our Dream Bathroom by completely redoing the walkin shower Vanity top sinks toilet and water closet along with reconfiguring walls  We didnt know that our Dream would turn into a Nightmare  Earlyon in our planning we found a supplierinstaller for the quartz that we wanted to line the walls tub deck and Vanity top and needed a local Bathroom contractor for the remainder of the project  After contacting a few local Kitchen and Bath professionals we decided to contract with SW Kitchens even though their estimate was 4000 higher than any of the others  We made this decision due to our comfort with the Designer and EstimatorProject Coordinator that we dealt with during the detailed planning process SW Kitchens reputation advertizing and the promise of a structured process with the Highest Possible Level of Customer Service  Communication

We were assigned a Construction Superintendent who initially met with us and our Designer to go over the job ALL details of the contract and develop a schedule  Our job was estimated to be 5 to 7 weeks from start to completion which based on our prior knowledge of construction practices we thought was a little excessive but we accepted it

Initially the job started out as promised with daily morning planning calls from the Superintendent which we had requested  There were minor daytoday issues which popped up and were dealt with  We understand that this is normal for construction  However we began to notice a pattern starting with the quality of subcontractors on the job  Next the communication started to drop off  It became a REAL PROBLEM after we made the substantial post demo payment  The Construction Superintendent had all sorts of excuses as to why he didnt call us with a daily update as we had requested  Often he didnt even return our voicemail requests for a callback He didnt seem to understand many of The Contract details or be able to manage the project properly  The Superintendent consistently tried to put the blame on our Designer or others in the Company for his inability to control the job  As our main contact on the job we were told that it was his responsibility to understand our project and Contract completely in order to execute the job  The final straw came when the subcontractor to install the shower floor showed up and was NOT the original person that came out to preplan the installation  They had NO knowledge of the product that we had specified Our Designer and EstimatorProject Coordinator had researched the product thoroughly and knew that it was different from regular epoxy The subcontractor refused to follow the very specific instructions that came with the product stating that they knew epoxy floors  We tried to contact the Construction Superintendent who was not on the job site when ANY of the subcontractors were performing because the shower floor subcontractor started to apply the product improperly but we only got the Superintendents voicemail  So we panicked and called our Designer to report we had a major issue onsite Later we were chastised by the Superintendent because he said we should only go thru him SW Kitchens literature states our project managers construction team members and designers are always available for any questions you may have  When the Superintendent finally did show up on the job he didnt stop the shower floor subcontractor and he gave us his personal guarantee and that of SW that they knew what they were doing and we would LOVE the finished product That wasnt the case  It turned out totally unacceptable with sharp edges uneven coverage and no slope in some areas  At that point we knew that there was no way that the Superintendent was credible any longer and our relationship with him had deteriorated to the point that we could no longer rely on him to complete the project He had taken some shortcuts throughout the project was NEVER onsite for the mandatory County Inspections we had to walk the inspector through every detail and had NOT adhered to the Contract requirements We contacted our Legal Representative and sought her advice regarding our possible courses of action We had to request a new Construction Superintendent and threatened legal action  As a direct result The Director of Field Operations took over our job  A Certified Installer for the shower floor product was retained to chipout and redo it  This time it turned out perfectly  We went over ALL the missed details issues and Contract concerns with the Field Operations Director  He was very professional addressed these items and we were finally able to get the job completed

Its a shame that we didnt have someone like the Field Operations Director to work with our wonderful Designer and Project Coordinator who were both very knowledgeable and professional from the beginning  We might have been spared the painful experiences and anguish The Total Project Time was 12 12 weeks and only then due to getting our legal representatives support and advice not the original 5 to 7 weeks estimated  We can only hope that if there are any Warranty Issues in the future that SW Kitchens will stand by their Warranty  Unlike their advertising we were NOT 100 happy with the overall process and The SW Difference was NOT Simply Wonderful

SW Kitchens of Melbourne FL were extremely difficult to work with  We hired them to reface the kitchen cabinets and install a granite counter top and backsplash The project manager would not communicate with us and never met any of the deadlines  We would have to track him down just to get an update  It was a fairly small and simple project yet it took over a month to complete not to mention the two months it took from the initial consultation to the project began  

The project manager wound of quitting the company in the middle of the installation phase and no one from the company would return our calls It took a couple of  visits to the showroom to talk to the manager to get the project back on track  During the installation phase the wrong parts were ordered two different times which delayed the project even more  Not once did anyone come to perform a Quality Assurance check of the work that had been done  

Since the installation we have had cabinet doors fall off twice  We come to realize that they did not secure the dishwasher to the cabinet or countertop  So the dishwasher tilts forward anytime the door is opened  We have contacted the manager once again and it has been two weeks and they have yet to send anyone to correct the deficiencies or contact us as to when to expect repairs to be made  

I would personally not recommend this company because they only seem to care about getting paid and not providing a quality product I say this because they would not return our calls and seemed to blow us off during our visits to the showroom  However they were quick to call if they had not received their money
This company remodeled our bathroom this past winter  They have a new location in Tampa and we worked with the new store

Kristin did a great job on designing the kitchen She was very helpful in suggesting ideas when I was trying to figure out how to work my cookbooks into the kitchen in my old kitchen I stored my cookbooks across the top of my cabinets and it was very inconvenient  She suggested the open cupboards over my washer and dryer This worked wonderfully  She never looked at my thoughts as no you cant do that but rather what if we did this  She helped get me the maximum amount of storage that I needed while staying within our budget She was able to work my washer and dryer into the design of the kitchen as well

We hired SW Kitchens to do a complete renovation of our laundry room  From design to demolition to procurement installation and completion they did a fantastic job all around  Chris Druschel design coordinator and Tim Hobson construction superintendent are creative dedicated and skilled professionals who were a pleasure to work with from start to finish  The project was completed on time and within budget as promised  Tim and Chris kept us informed at every step of the process  While we had high expectations going into the project SW far exceeded our expectations  We could not give SW as a whole and Chris Druschel and Tim Hobson in particular a higher recommendation  We would not hesitate to recommend them to our friends and neighbors or to hire them for other projects in the future

Recently had a complete remodel of my 80s kitchen  They did a great job designing the new space and all of the workmen were very professional  The old space was gutted  One window was removed  and the ceiling was raised to increase storage  I now have more storage space than I have stuff  A very nice predicament  I replaced everything in the kitchen except for 2 of the 3 existing windows  I am very pleased with how everything turned out and the time line and cost was right on target

Bill is an exceptional designer  He listens to your needs and offers very good suggestions  He is detailedoriented which is really a plus when you know how you want to use a space but not how to make it happen  Bill makes it happen  This is the first part of a twopart home office project

We could not be happier with our experience with Finecraft renovating our kitchen and bath as well as overseeing the installation for a new HVAC system  Every craftsman was skillful kind and thoughtful of us as we maneuvered around them over the months of this project  The attention to detail was impressive and the handson approach of George the owner and Vivian the project manager  and Georges first cousin always made us feel totally confident that we were getting our moneys worth  We recommend them without reservation  Maryetta AndrewsSachs and Bob Zeskind  4920 45th St NW

I had the pleasure of working with FineCraft Contractors on a full renovation and addition that I designed for a client in Northern Virginia  George Papaheraklis and Vivian made a great team paying close attention to details and quality workmanship It is refreshing to work with a builder who has a collaborative approach and is hands on The client lived in the house during a large project and FineCraft worked hard to make that happen and ensure they were happy with the end result I would highly recommend FineCraft as a topnotch builder to any of my clients and hope to work with them again

We really enjoyed working with FineCraft for our basement refresh They were extremely responsive and took great care in making sure our project was done right and on time They do a really nice job setting projects up with a team so you always know who your point person is for questions or concerns during the work They also did a really nice job keeping us updated We really appreciated that as issues came up which they are always bound to do when renovating a 70 year old house that our contractor was always ready with options as well as his best suggestion for how we could solve problems and make it work We will definitely be returning to FineCraft for future projects and are really loving our new basement space

Ive had the pleasure and privilege  to work of Fine craft Contractors  for a very long time The first time  Owner and principal George Papaheraklis and I initially contracted with me was in 1987 almost 35 years ago One can immediately ascertain that George has Architectural Training and an artistic eye merely by the way he could anticipate the next design move and and the way he can finesse meticulous details with visually graceful solutions Our Attention to detail and the minutia are often a challenge for many general contractors but George leans into these challenges with a positive attitude and productive energy One particular ecfample was the sculpture above the front door of our Midcentury addition and renovation  Initially a flea market fragment DLAs last minute detailing required stone and steel This could have been vocalized with frustration but instead was met by George Papaheraklis with passion and has become the crowning jewel of the composition A client once heard George saying under his breath that his quest for good construction is life sustaining for him Since we first met decades ago his close knit staff has  grown in both size and professionality One of our mutual projects was of particular challenge However it was constructed methodically and intelligently along with  Vivian who is integral to FineCrafts efficiency stream lined production and can do nature  This was was no small task especially as two prjects they have worked with us on took place in the middle the pandemic Dasha Niko and Patrick who I have worked with personally  are all a part of the caliber FineCraft Contractors brings to the table and table saw

We couldnt be more pleased with FineCraft They flawlessly executed a complicated design to create a modern floating porch on our 1930s center hall colonial house All of their trades  including the mason carpenter electrician painter etc  worked together seamlessly and in lockstep to bring the project to life We loved how George and Vivian were always coming by the house on a daily basis to answer any questions and make sure the quality was up to par We always felt like we were up to speed on what was happening and where we were in the process We would definitely choose FineCraft again for future projects and we are ecstatic about the work they did or us

I have to say we are completely satisfied with the bathroom remodel It met and exceeded expectations and was long overdue I never had to question the teams expertise or competence which cant be said for every contractor in the DC area We look forward to either working with your team again
Great companygoes the extra mile  Very dedicated professionals who do what is needed to make it right Great to work with

FineCraft just completed a major yearlong remodel for us in Northern Virginia  We are delighted with the quality materials workmanship and attention to detail  We lived in the house during the work You might question this choice but with FineCraft it worked  We saw the same crewsnot random contractorsevery day  To a man they were friendly courteous and took pains to leave a clean living space at the end of every day  George Papaheraklis was on site every few days troubleshooting improving and explaining what was going to happen and in what order  The house looks great and is easy to live in  We got more than expected and at a fair price
Consummate professionals Easy to work with and would recommend these guys to anyone who wants a high quality and professional job
They did my addition and were excellent Shout out to Chris who was always so kind and professional and always available when needed

Finecraft prides itself on attention to detail and indeed this was our experience throughout the renovation project a kitchen and sunroom upgrade that opened interior space without modifying the exterior footprint of the house To make our lives much easier they built a separation wall between the work area and the rest of the living area and reconstructed a temporary kitchen on the main floor in the living area so we were able to stay in the house during the construction This made a big difference during the forced homebased work due to Covid pandemic The staff left the place in good shape each day before leaving At the end they did not hesitate to come back several times and in a timely manner to complete the details remaining on the punch list We love our new space

FineCraft has done two significant projects for us  a major terrace remake four years ago and now a total kitchen renovation  We are very pleased with their workmanship and the ease of our working relationship  On several occasions they have taken extra steps to please us

We were converting a two story great room into a second floor with new bedrooms as well as renovating our kitchen and a bathroom  laundry room   With a baby on the way our timeline was tight  no room for delays  and Finecraft not only delivered but exceeded all expectations in terms of reliability craftsmanship and staying true to the estimate   We were out of town for most of the project and were able to communicate effectively with the team via mobile app andor Facetime   Once we were back in the house Rosendo and his team were very respectful and friendly and kept everything clean and responsive to any and all questions or minor issues   Would hire them again for any project   Very pleased with the final result as well as the process  Thank you
Finecraft did an excellent job our addition is beautiful and they were nice to work with  We had a few hiccups along the way but they were quick to fix

We have had the pleasure of working with FineCraft on a handful of projects They are attentive and responsive to both clients and fellow professionals We look forward to future opportunities to collaborate with the crew at FineCraft
It has been a pleasure to work with the Finecraft team They have great communication responsive and their attention to detail is top notch I am looking forward to future projects with Finecraft

Finecraft did a fantastic job on our renovation  we highly recommend them Thanks to all the staff but especially to Rei for shepherding the project through on the site We were consistently impressed by the level of craftsmanship and attention to detail that went into the project We cant thank the team enough

We had a great experience with a Finecraft from start to finish Their professionalism attention to detail and flexibility were remarkable Our project turned out even better than expected at a very competitive price We are delighted

Once again it was a pleasure working with George Papaheraklis and the Finecraft team This project was very sophisticated involving creative building challenges which Finecraft easily met George always adds both value and Grace

It was a great team that worked diligently and cohesively to deliver a new beautifully detailed and elegant twofamily home on Capitol Hill

Fantastic experience We just love the team at FineCraft Contractors We have used them for two renovations at our house and will use them again Their customer service and professionalism are outstanding We absolutely love the finished project and would recommend them to any looking to do work on their home

We hired FineCraft to renovate the basement in our 1958 splitlevel home  It was important to us for the project to create a more functional living space that was still traditional enough to match the rest of our homes interior  They did a terrific job  followed the architects plan to the letter  The quality of the work was topnotch  In fact the WSSC inspector thought the work under his purview was the nicest hed seen  The members of the construction crew were polite and professional  George has a fine aesthetic that clearly carries through to all of the work done by FineCraft The workmen who laid the tile particularly in the bathroom are truly artisans   It is a lovely space and we could not be happier  Id recommend FineCraft to others who are considering a remodeling job

We have done the remodeling of a bedroom with loft  stairs and a bathroom
We were very pleased with Finecraft and I would highly recommend them
This is a team of high professional with a very friendly staff Everybody in the team has some specific expertise and are managed by a project lead Though the company is not too big and you can feel that this is a family business company and that they care about project

Working with Finecraft was a very rewarding experience for me The company worked well with my architects and executed all aspects of the project in a professional manner I look forward to working with them again

Our screen porch has a wow factor  Finecraft took the architects plans and turned them into a gorgeous and functional room  The craftsmanship and attention to detail is apparent in every aspect of the construction  They stayed within the specified time and budget constraints  It was a pleasure to work with all members of the Finecraft team

We went through a long process of selecting a contractor for a remodel of our home on Capitol Hill We are so glad we chose the fine people at Finecraft The moment we interacted with them we knew that there was chemistry It was a long project with many customized flourishes that were unique and challenging The Finecraft team did an incredible job and delivered our dream house Their professionalism attention to detail and overall team work made for a stress free journey through the construction If we had to do this again we will do it in a heartbeat 

Thank you to the entire Finecraft team  Specially Jose and Dasha
Enjoyed working with this team Very professional and worked hard to minimize disruption to our family during construction period Quality of work was stellar and communication was excellent

This team of professionals has an amazing ability to see what it is you want to create  I have worked with this team in the community many times and when it came to getting a bid on my personal project I knew they would not disappoint us  Finecraft came was on time listened to our ideas and then really looked at what we had to work with and created a plan that would work in our family budget  They also gave us plenty of referral projects to go look at and customers to talk to for references  Its not like here are 3 people its years of happy customers  Their attention to detail and craftsmanship on their projects was what sold us  Quality and excellent follow up

Finecraft Contractors Inc is an absolutely firstclass organization Their name suits the quality of their management personnel and workmanship very well They are true professionals in every sense During the course of our home elevator construction and installation project my wife and I got to know the Finecraft management and craftsmen team very well We have only the most complimentary things to say about their courtesy creativity flexibility and project management and execution skills We highly recommend Finecraft Contractors Inc to anyone who is looking for a superior home remodeling contractor
Finecraft did a wonderful job on this project  In particular their craftsmanship timeliness and attention to detail were admirable  We look forward to working with them on Phase II of the project

We have now worked with Finecraft on a number of remodeling projects in the DC area  They are a highly professional and skilled Contractor that produces quality craftsmanship and on time project delivery  As Architects we have found Finecraft brings value added ideas to the project whether it be product recommendations or if an issue is discovered how to solve it We would highly recommend Finecraft to our clients

We hired Finecraft to build our screenedin porch on a recommendation from our architect and overall were very pleased with the project  The quality of work was very good and their team was professional and courteous  We would absolutely recommend them for similar projects

Finecraft Contractors is a top quality operation I have done multiple renovation projects with George and his team including bathrooms kitchen addition terrace and inlaw apartment Finecraft has a great sense of aesthetics great attention to detail and the construction site is left impeccably clean every night Thats why I am a return customer

Finecraft contractors is a well rounded professional company in the DC area 
Their crew is highly skilled and the staff has superb customer service Every project we have seen has exceeded our expectations It is hard to find a building company with such high attention to detail Working with the Finecraft family makes your experience enjoyable and gratifying

I have worked on several projects with Finecraft They are an excellent company to work with and have a pleasant and knowledgeable staff that will always make client communication service and quality their to priority

Finecraft did an excellent job renovating our garage and converting it into a gym They were prompt in their reply and finished the project in the time they quoted which is huge The price was reasonable and the staff was very responsive throughout the whole process I highly recommend them for any home renovating project and will be using them again in the future

I hired Finecraft to handle a gut renovation of an 1890s townhouse in downtown Washington DC The property was an absolute mess and had been abandoned for 20 years Finecraft were able to retain the front facade while constructing a new modern home with what was left of the old bones of the home It turned out beautifully and is true to the architects design It was delivered on time and mostly on budget I would recommend them to any other property owner in similarly situated historicalrenovation jobs

As an architect Im naturally very protective of my clients with regard to contractor selection  With Finecraft i know that my clients are in good hands with a professional honest and thorough contractor  Their work speaks for itself in terms of quality craftsmanship and they are a delight to working with  Communication is one of the most important parts of client management and Finecraft clearly excels in this department I would strongly recommend Finecraft to all of my clients no matter what type of project we design

We could not have imagined a better renovation experience Everyone at Finecraft was a pleasure to work with from the owner all the way to the project manager employees and subcontractors All were extremely nice friendly attentive and with tremendous attention to detail You could always contact them with a question and they would get back to you very quickly to explain or help 

They did a great job on the addition of a mudroom expansion and creation of a new open floor plan kitchenfamily room combo moving of a bathroom renovation of two other bathrooms and replacing the entire outside including roof windows siding patio walkway and portico 

They completely transformed our house into a brand new property and we could not thank them enough They were exactly on budget and on time with no delays even though we substantially expanded the scope of the project They were able to change gears smoothly and efficiently as our ideas evolved through the course of the work They worked around our busy lives with 3 small children and were able to create a fully functioning minikitchen to allow us to stay in the house during the work  Highly recommend them for your renovationaddition needs

Finecraft did an extension on my historic house and it really is beautiful George kept me in the loop about how it was all going The team were efficient and respectful of my property and the problemsolving on the best way to get it all done was excellent I would highly recommend this company

As both architect and client I was pleased with Finecraft Contractors I found the crews to be hardworking and pleasant With our project George took a hands on approach from beginning to end and collaborated well to help create what we envisioned for our home

Generally quite pleased with our experience with Finecraft  We hired them to complete a three story 900 sq ft addition plus some renovations to the existing space in our NW DC home originally built in 1932  They worked well with our architect and showed consideration and willingness to work with us throughout the process and were responsive to the minor concerns of our neighbors  We were able to stay in our home throughout the project which was completed though punchlist in less than 6 months

In particular we found the quality of their carpentry everything from floors decking exterior closet work trim and paint to be outstanding  We were very impressed and received lots of compliments from friends and family

Two areas Id suggest clients keep in mind first as with almost all contractors their approach to project management isnt to the same standard as with full service designbuild firms  Youll want to be proactive on communication about timelines and confirm everything in writing either emails or text  They are great at honoring commitments but sometimes memories arent perfect and its helpful to have a record

The second area related to above was with the electrical work  We did change things up a bit but even with that I wasnt super happy with the electrician  Some of the work could have been done to a higher quality and we had to tussle a bit him to get what we wanted in a couple of cases the project wasnt done exactly as we wanted  That could have been prevented if we did a better job documenting and holding them to what we discussed

That all said Id definitely recommend them  Friendly and flexible quality workmanship and great price

We hired Finecraft to repair our master bathroom after the discovery of a leak and mold  The Finecraft team was very professional and a pleasure to work with  They listened to our concerns as well as our ideas and came up with recommendations that fit with the design  They have a great network of suppliers and we were able to find great deals on tiles fixtures and granite

After a year of discussions with our architect and Finecraft over the renovation of our 1920s colonial we decided to go from a one story addition to a three story addition George patiently addressed numerable questions raised by my detail oriented husband We lived in the house during the eight months of renovation which enabled us to closely examine the outstanding craftsmen at work George regularly came up with creative solutions to maximize the functionality of the space within our budget When my husband and I disagreed about anything we could always rely on Georges professional vision and diplomatic resolution   My serotonin levels would rise each day when I saw George and Vivien arrive in the red pickup they inspire confidenceThe Finecraft team is committed to excellent craftsmanship in a timely manner We enjoyed working with them immensely and would love to do another project with them soon

Finecraft Contractors is by far the most professional caring competent company we have used to work on our home They completely restyled our 1940s Cape Cod 1st floor as well as completed other outside improvements with magnificent results From start to finish we always knew what was going on with our project All of the folks on the project were absolutely the best  and they all stayed on the job until it was finished As with older homes there are usually surprises when making changes to the floor plan Our team anticipated those possibilities and problemsolved with us to accommodate our wishes We felt that Finecraft truly cared about us our needs and our home and we could not be more pleased We truly feel part of the Finecraft family

Tess Moran and Cabinet Discounters have worked with Finecraft Contractors on many projects  Finecraft can always be counted on for beautiful craftsmanship excellent project management and top notch customer service
Fisher Lumber has been working together with Finecraft Contractors for four decades They perform first class detailed workmanship If quality is what you want in your home improvementslook no further

I am an architectural designer based in LA and my parents live in Rockville MD  Though they were in need of some basic home maintenance repairs as well as a kitchen renovation they were completely intimidated by the construction process and didnt know where to begin  Finecraft was recommended to me by a reputable architecture firm in Maryland and it was a very smooth process to get everything completed on time and on budget once they were provided with a scope of work and design even from across the country  My parents are now thoroughly enjoying their kitchen makeover and new non leaking windows

We were the architects for a complete 2nd floor remodeling job in Rockville The project included the complete reconfiguration of the master bathroom and bedroom as well as moving the laundry closet into a new laundry room We recommended Finecraft to our clients when they asked us about a trusted contractor Often times it is risky for an architect to recommend a certain contractor but with Finecraft we have no hesitation I know they will be professional honest and if selected do a good job that is in line with the design intent
I highly recommend them for your home remodeling projects

Professional company with a very personal touch  High quality work You truly get what you pay for  I feel confident every time I refer them to friends or clients  They earn  keep the love  trust from their clients because they are passionate about what they do  Cant say enough wonderful things about this company  leadership

We hired Finecraft to perform a remodeling of our townhome third floor It was a significant undertaking as every room was impacted by the remodeling which involved the renovation of the master bathroom second bathroom creation of a laundry room expansion of closet space in the 3 bedrooms creation of 2 linen closets and renovation of the half bathroom on the main floor Finecraft was recommended by the architect who designed the plans of the remodeling as he pointed out the quality of the work performed We ended up hiring Finecraft because they were interested by the project and they wanted to work with us In comparison with other general contractors we interviewed their pricing was very competitive Overall the project lasted 2 months Our family of 4 lived in the house while under renovation the workers were very accommodating and respectful of the circumstances and most importantly very clean in consideration of the work performed What we are the most pleased with is the quality of the work and the details in the finishes They fully enable the vision we had for this remodeling Even though we wish that there was more clarity on the agreement better communication with certain change orders and more flexibility with the allowances we are very pleased to have chosen Finecraft The functionality of our new layout and the beautiful bathrooms are now permanent features of our new home working with Finecraft worth every single penny We also referred Finecraft to friends who have subsequently hired them for their project needs

Top notch service

After meeting with over a dozen contractors we found Finecraft to be the perfect fit for our renovation  They performed the work within the timeline specified and ensured we didnt exceed our budget  The crews showed up MonFri at the same time and progress was made each and everyday  Although we the customer made a number of mistakes Finecraft was patient and understanding ensuring we were satisfied every step of the way

Overall we would recommend anyone use Finecraft for their future renovation needs  I never wouldnt of imagined I would ever be so happy with a contractors performance but here I am writing this review  If your a stickler for exceptionally high quality work without having to pay ridiculous prices go with Finecraft it will be worth the wait considering their high demand

We have been working with Finecraft Contractors for a while now and have had a great experience  we are stone fabricators and they send us their clients to choose their countertops They are professional and helpful to ensure their clients needs are met  whenever we need specific information about about a job they always make sure everything is correct and we are on the same page on every project As a sales representative I know how important it is to communicate with the client  especially if there is a contractor involved 
We definitely recommend  Finecraft for your house renovation and look forward to working with them for future projects
Finecraft is just terrific Their staff is friendly their work is meticulous and the did our project ontime and within budget

Finecraft is an unusual combination of exceptional talent fine craftsmanship delivering more than expected and with personal touches that would make any home remodeling or home construction project a dream for the owner  On time on the ball on target and on top of the project from start to finish  Its been a pleasure to attend the open houses to discover the range of services and beautiful outcomes

Mario worked on two separate projects at my home  One was an outdoor window that needed to be rebuilt the other removing an old bar area and replacing it with a closet  Mario was efficient polite fairly priced and provided outstanding workmanship  Im using him again this month for yet another project  I highly recommend him

I am an Interior Designer and I had the pleasure of working with Finecraft Contractors Inc because my client was doing a major renovation and Finecraft was doing the remodel
