I have found Finecraft to be a very professional company who focuses on customer satisfaction and delivering a superb product above all From first contact to finishing the project Finecraft is friendly professional and genuinely cares The project turned out beautiful and better than I expected

We hired Finecraft for three projects that included remodeling our kids bathroom from a single user to multi user setup refinishing our basement and creating a builtin bookcasefireplaceTV wall for the master bedroom  All 3 projects turned out great  The team working on the projects where there every day and they staffed resources accordingly  so some days it was 2 guys and other days there was up to 5 guys depending on what needed to be accomplished  All projects where completed within the time estimate and on the agreed upon prices  Their construction staff all wore corporate teeshirts and where professional and careful of cleanliness and the surrounding spaces  While I think it is hard to determine a low cost provider for these types of services value is more important  And Finecraft delivered that as well as adding a designer to take our project visions into reality  We have more work to do and will hire them again

We hired Finecraft to renovate our late1890s row house in DC including putting in a new kitchen  We were very pleased with the work done by Finecraft  George and his team were able to create a kitchen that has all of todays modern amenities but still has the charm and finishes consistent with the age of the house  The craftsmanship of the cabinetry and molding is beautiful  They created plaster molding in the kitchen that matches the original molding perfectly  Beyond the kitchen the Finecraft team carefully restored the walls molding and floors back to their original glory and updated our powder room and foyer tile  The work was done timely and within budget  And the Finecraft team was responsive to our questions and requests  We would recommend them without reservation for any type of renovation  from new build to restoring an older home
George and his crew are complete professionals with and eye for details The additions to our house by Finecraft are high quality and very well constructed I highly recommend them for any project

We were set to hire another contractor when we met George Papaheriklis of Finecraft Contractors Inc Not having any experience remodeling or hiring contractors and after hearing some of our friends experiences we were very weary and nervous about the whole process Georges openness demeanor and patience answering all of our questions and concerns put us at ease in no time Needless to say after just a few minutes we knew we have found our contractor The experience overall was great and the end result fantastic It was not without its ups and downs but during the process George and the Finecarfts crew were very patient diligent and most of all professional They addressed all of our requests and made sure we were completely satisfied with the end work not an easy feat when dealing with a selfprofessed perfectionist An inch to the left or to the right was not an issue they worked very hard to make us happy George was very handson throughout our project and was available anytime there was a question or concern He was very candid and willing to explain things to us both regarding the scope of work and the costs involved especially on those pesky change orders our own requests Because of his background in architecture George offered suggestions and made changes that made things just right going so far as to doing things just because they will look better no change orders We were living in the house while the renovationaddition was going on Finecraft not only provided us with a temporary kitchen complete with a sink and running water while they did the work but they were very accommodating to our needs and timing made sure everything was clean at the end of the day and took every possible precaution to avoid dust and debris coming into our living space Many friends have commented on the craftsmanship and quality of the work Most of all Finecraft stands behind their work they have been prompt and thorough in addressing all those little and no so little things that sometimes pop up on new construction nothing has been too big or too small for them to come and fix In the end what matters most is that George and the Finecrafts crew has our gratitude respect and above all trust

We contacted Finecraft for a smaller project in the summer of 2016 based on the Houzz reviews They contacted us back very quickly but because we had a tight deadline Finecraft were not able to do the project themselves but recommended one of their subcontractors called American Trademark AT renovated a small master bath for us on a very short deadline and completed the project in just over 2 weeks The process went smoothly and we got the bathroom we wanted They cleaned up at the end of each day and kept the mess to a minimum The team was professional and met the deadline and stayed within budget After completion we noticed that some paint in the stairway to our second floor had been ripped off probably when they removed the paper that had protected the stairs Not a big job to have fixed but the reason what I did not give the full 5 stars

We hired Finecraft Contractors Inc for a third floor addition to our row house in Washington DC  We would highly recommend Finecraft as a contractor  We were very happy with their work  In addition they were responsive answered our questions and concerns promptly and went above and beyond to make sure the project was completed to our satisfaction including the completion a number of added change orders along the way and completing punchlist items

We contacted Finecraft because one of my coworkers had used them for 23 projects and recommended their work  Niko and Chris came to the house and looked over the kitchen  They immediately made some useful suggestions about the design for our new kitchen  Niko put us in contact with a first rate designer  We visited Appliance Distributors Unlimited ADU after seeing the listing on the Finecraft website  We worked with the designer and a representative from ADU through several iterations of design cabinet selection and appliance selection until we had a design and set of appliances that we liked and that fit within our budget  The good folks at Finecraft got to work on Tuesday July 5th and finished on Friday July 15th  They had told us it would take about two weeks meaning 10 business days and it took 9   Most of the work on the kitchen was done by one worker Moses and his assistant  The work was extremely well done  Moses is a true craftsman  He is meticulous and he knows what he is doing  There were several points along the way at which we had to make decisions about routing wires the vent for the hood and other things  We were given the opportunity to participate in the decision making where it was appropriate to do so  All in all we are very satisfied with the final product  I would be very happy to have Finecraft do other projects such as our master bathroom especially if Moses or someone else with similar skill is involved

After interviewing several other local contractors I hired Finecraft to relocate our master bathroom to the window line to permit natural light in the bathroom  We also created a master dressing room closet  I was so impressed with their work that I expanded on the assignment to include several other projects  I truly enjoyed working with George  He is delightful to work with  George comes up with excellentcreative ideas to solve issues while being sensitive to cost restrictions  George was personally very involved in our project from start to finish and he went over and beyond many times  The construction workers who were in our home were very respectful of our home and cleaned up every day  They were very accommodating and did an excellent job  FineCraft cared very much about our project and ensured that we were satisfied  I am very pleased with the project and FineCraft and highly recommend them

We recently completed a magnificent kitchen and renovation project with Finecraft and we could not be happier George and his team brought their fine workmanship and attention to detail that made all the difference in producing a finished product that exceeded our expectations George was very handson throughout our project and made himself available anytime there was a question or concern  Because of his extensive background in architecture George worked well with our architect and other vendors we used to complete our project The entire Finecraft team was extremely professional responsive and truly a pleasure to work with  I would not hesitate to recommend Finecraft to any homeowner interested in doing a renovation or building a brand new home

Finecraft did a fantastic job on remodeling my bedroom and bathroom The work crew was tremendous  talented courteous professional on time The design staff was very helpful in helping me with decisions on color selection of materials and decor They were very accommodating and a pleasure to collaborate with

We have worked with Finecraft Contractors Inc in several projects now and it we must say their work is 5star In addition to their quality and superb customer service they are a joy to work with Its rare to see first hand a construction company that stands behind their word and delivers with such abundance The Finecraft team truly cares for they clients and goes the extra mile to make sure they are happy and satisfied with the project Looking forward to more projects with them

My wife and I downsized to a condo The location of our new condo  was exactly what we wanted but the interior of the condo was not We decided to gut our 2000 sqft condo and  construct a very  modernly designed one After much searching  we and our designer chose Finecraft as the builders We presented  precise plans which had a number of unusual features  Finecraft did excellent work details of the construction were carefully attended to they arranged for material to be brought from Portugal Japan and elsewhere they were flexible in accommodating some changes we made as the construction went along The configuration of our glasswork was unusual in shape and size but  the work of Finecraft in managing to actually bring the glass into the condo and install it  was truly impressive 

The cost of the project was what we had agreed to The project took a little longer than expected But this was because of the severe limitations our condo association placed on the times when work could be done  and the convoluted  rules and unpredictable inspection scheduling  imposed by the Fairfax County building inspection bureaucracy

Finally  the President of Finecraft George Papaheraklis  kept a keen eye on the projects progress as frequently present  and responded quickly to any questions we had   We highly recommend Finecraft
Finecraft did great work for us and when we had issues arrive they were quick to rectify them We are very appreciative of there attentiveness

We recently had two bathrooms updated by Finecraft in our 1930s Glover Park house and could not be happier with the process and results From the beginning Niko and his team excelled at communication  whether it was Niko checking in to make sure the work had begun on time or Chris our project manager letting us know what work would be done We were impressed with how hard their team worked to make sure the project was complete before our planned movein date Every time we went to the house to check on the progress the team was working incredibly hard and were happy to show us what had been completed that day We are already planning to use Finecraft again for future projects

In February 2016 Finecraft renovated our family room  The owner sketched a preliminary drawing based on our desire for light and warmth and provided a ballpark cost estimate  We discussed the options and details and finalized the plan and cost estimate with the caveat that we could be flexible with the artistic plan and the cost if and as needed The big decisions were made prior to beginning the work  We were guided to a door company to select a door and a stone company to pick out surround and hearth stone To make a more expansive family room with plenty of light they knocked down a wall installed a window that matched the other two windows already in the room built bookcases with storage cabinets a window seat with drawers and a closet installed a wood floor and ceiling lights updated the fireplace from a brick to stone façade with an inset for a flat panel television and replaced a sliding glass door with a double French door  The crew arrived on time each day completed the work assignments and cleaned up at days end The crew was friendly professional and not intrusive In fact they were so trustworthy that we provided access to a key for flexibility such that we were not dependent on their work schedule  We were contacted at the end of each day with a summary of what was done what would be done next and what we as the homeowners needed to decide or go pick out in the week ahead eg paint color cabinet door knobs  The crew even moved large furniture in and out of the work space so we did not have to do so Overall our experience with Finecraft was extremely positive The work was done within schedule and budget We have worked with Finecraft on previous renovations large and small and will do so again
The crew at Finecraft are true professionals well trained and skilled such that they act independently and do not require direct supervision

I had the opportunity to work with George and his crew on a number of different home renovations ranging from small remodels to full bottom to top demolition through renovation  In all instances I found the crews to be pleasant and hardworking and fully in alignment with Georges vision for the final product  George takes a very hands on approach to all his projects from the beginning to the end and works very well with his clients to create exactly what they envision for their new home

We had Finecraft remodel our kitchen and family room from July 13  October 13 2015 Every aspect of the renovation was a positive experience They said it would take three months and they were done basically three months to the date they started The quality of work was superb and it was easy to get in touch with either the owner or foreman throughout the entire project We will definitely use Finecraft again

Finecraft Contractors are the best  Their workmanship is topnotch and their workers are all experts in the respective fields  They are a fantastic crew  We are pleased with our additions and changes which will enable us to stay in our house as we become less mobile We now have a beautiful custommade rollin shower and other bathroom changes that enable a person in a wheelchair to use the bathroom This was a tricky undertaking because of the configuration we wanted Most importantly the owner George Papaheriklis listened to us and made sure that the construction was perfect  He consulted with us all during the construction

We are first time home buyers and have never dealt with home renovations Our house was in decent condition at purchase but needed a serious facelift throughout  we hired Finecraft to renovate the majority of the house which meant new bathrooms kitchen new drywall pretty much everywhere electrical etc etc They did an excellent job guiding us through the process their site manager was particularly good always calm easy to talk to They handled hiccups in the schedule and work plan very well and had really good suggestions for improvements throughout the house removing parts of walls design ideas for custom cabinetry Overall excellent experience and we are thrilled with the results Highly recommend

Late 2014 through spring 2015 FineCraft undertook a major reconstruction of our backyard terrace plus improvements to the inside of our house  Outside work included new retaining walls with extensive foundation improvements extensive drainage improvements blue stone paving tree pits trellis and wood slat fencing new lighting redirected and reinforced stairways and removal of sunroom parapets  Inside work included two skylights two new windows that required breaking through the existing structures installing lighting fixtures and ceiling fan and completion of requested small tasks
 
Being a project limited to a small area detail design and execution were critical  We employed The Kurylas Studio as project architects  Kurylas Studios recommended FineCraft as one of several contractors  FineCrafts expertise with architecture and attention to detail proved critical to the project success  As a real team effort FineCraft working with the architect and us made several valuable design alterations   They rebuilt one retaining wall rather than repair it and for a second retaining wall they used traditional brick facing rather than ¼ inch brick facing  Both company owners and the project foreman were professional respectful knowledgeable and easy to work with  When we disagreed their professionalism always led to quick resolutions which all parties felt good about  Impressive to us was how fair FineCraft priced change orders  Not only are we satisfied the whole team is proud how the project turned out

We hired Finecraft a few years back when we were planning a major renovation to our home We had completed a similar renovation in the past on a previous home and the difference between our first experience and this one was like night and day From the very beginning George his foreman and the crew were professional responsive worked quickly and efficiently and got the project done in the time estimated We lived in our home during the renovation and the Finecraft crew showed up on time EVERY time did the work each day and cleaned up after each days work We had the same foreman for the complete project and he reflected Georges and Finecrafts values of professionalism attention to detail and pride in craftsmanship During the process George would review the upcoming work and make sure that all the details were taken care of Their workmanship was superb the fine details that speak to master carpentry and pride in workmanship are evident throughout the project We have lived in our home for 10 years since that work was done and it still looks as good today as it did when it was newly finished We recently needed some repair and remodeling done to another part of our home and we didnt even need to go out to bid  we just hired Finecraft again You will not be sorry you chose them

This project involved the complete renovation of the second and third attic floors of the back wing of our historic home to create a master bedroom suite with full bath and 2 walkin closets laundry area and linen closet on the second floor and two bedrooms and a full bath on the attic floor  It involved creating 2 new dormers and a new gable on the attic floor and installation of new windows  Considerable upgrading of joists and rafters to meet modern codes was required in this historic home  Great care was taken to ensure that all changes were consistent with the historic nature of this home including custommilled moldings and use of antique recovered heart pine flooring among others
Finecraft did an outstanding job on this project as they have in previous experience with them on other projects on this property  They took exceptional care to get the details of the finishing right  The same experienced workers were present for the entire project  They listened careful to any questions or concerns we had and consulted frequently with us as the job progressed  They were highly professional at all times and it was a pleasure to have them in our house we remained resident in the rest of the house throughout the renovation  Their proposed cost for the project was reasonable and the job came in at the agreed price and we agreed to some minor change orders as the work progressed  The project took about 6 months for completion which was somewhat longer than anticipated but not unreasonable given the structural work involved
Overall I have the highest recommendation for Finecraft for their professionalism and the quality of their work from their initial comments on the design and detailing through demolition construction and finishing to the final cleanup  It was a pleasure to work with them and I recommend them unconditionally

They are my favorite They always seem to make things right Even when things are tough they work through them and the outcome is always amazing They have worked on several projects in my house and all of which are excellent products which reflect the level of detailed work that epitomizes Finecraft From smaller projects to larger ones from my experience I can guarantee theyll leave you satisfied with the job you contract them for hands down

House build in early 1970s Contempoary design We acquired in 1977 Project was from 52011 to 112011 We had some specific ideas at outset like remodel kitchen and baths but more general undeveloped ideas for other improvements like consolidating a small unused balcony room into a walkin closet and enlarged bathroom We moved out for 3 months We never had any issues with Finecraft Contractors in clarity of work the  timeliness of completing projects  or billings We did not use an architect or interior designer Instead we relied upon Finecraft to recommend enhancements we did not see or think about which was a brilliant decision on our part Finecraft George in particular had the ability to visualize a change which could be made to enhance a rooms appearance and in many instances with little added costs For example outside windows for an expanded master bathroom or remaking a large outdated family room with a cathedral ceilng into a  dazzling room We would recommend them without exception and use them again It was indeed a pleasant experience We continue to enjoy to this day their work

Finecraft is an excellent home builder and home remodeling general contractor in the Washington DC region I have worked them them on at least 10 significant projects over as many years What sets them apart are 4 strengths
1 Their commitment to be faithful to the design created on paper and   not deviate from it without sufficient cause

Owner George Papaheraklis is close to finishing our second project  One was demolishing a kitchen and family room and making a single space with a bump out for a breakfast area  Neighbors who know our community are amazed when they see it  We have now gutted an oldstyle bathroom vanity area and modest walkin closet and are making a larger integrated bathroom with a bigger walk in closet

What distinguishes George is that he is an artist with a keen eye  Not only will he tweak an architects plans for aesthetic and functional reasons but even as the project is in midstream he is consstantly thinking perhaps we should do it this way a frame around tiling or switch a regular door to a pocket door or change the orientation of the stall shower glass door He obsesses about little details and in the long run that makes a big difference

I found out about Finecraft in the house of a friend where George had gutted the back of the house and added on to it  I had no doubt about the big picture and the attention to detail  If any reader could see a typical Finecraft project up close he would not have to rely on ramblings like thishe would see the work and know all he needs to know to hire the company

Finecraft Contractors completely revamped our family room  Tore out old dated paneling and popcorn ceiling  Now it is not all chopped up looking and it is calming to look into it  Also they made custom bookcases on the sides of the fireplace that have ample storage below and great display space above  Im very pleased with the results and the respectful people who came into our home to do this work

Finecraft is an excellent construction company and a pleasure to work with  George Papaherkalis has an excellent sense of design and constructions his crews are skilled and the final product is enjoyable space to live in  I have hired them five times over 25 years and would use them again

We had Barron do a complicated addition and remodel that added a bathroom and expanded the footprint of the house No they definitely were not the least expensive bid we got on the project But they did really nice work mostly on time and within budget we expanded the scope of the project midway through which added to the final cost and completion date We were nervous going in because friends of ours with similar or even smaller projects would complain about things taking much longer than promised and being ghosted for days by their project managers

Fortunately that wasnt the case with Barron Leeran the project manager was very communicative and flexible responding quickly to questions and issues while helping us stay within budget and make the most of what we could spend Thanks to the companys willingness to work with us we were able to stay in the house during the majority of the project  it wasnt easy for the construction crew to work around us and our furniture but it saved us a lot of money and allowed us to splurge in areas that were important to us

We did run into a few problems along the way but Leeran was very responsive and got things fixed or redone quickly As worried as we were about ballooning costs unpleasant surprises and the project dragging on and on I cant say enough how pleasantly surprised we were

The addition is beautiful and the house is much more functional and enjoyable And our teenage daughter is thrilled to have her own bathroom

Im very unhappy with my experience with Baron We worked on a 1000 sq ft remodel that took over a year when it was originally quoted for 36 months Months after Im still trying to clean up the mess they left me with and the damages they made to my house It was a headache and complete stress working with them They are the nightmare remodel that I hear others talk about Our project managers did not remembered anything that was discussed and there was little to no follow through They would say they were going to do something or that this is how it would look but then when its done its completely different and not what was discussed Every meeting with the project managers ended up being pointless I had to escalate many issues to the main office and the owner Mike in order to get some type of acknowledgement explanation or answer HVAC was installed incorrectly exterior hole in the wall was not repaired correctly crew did not know how to install our cabinets incorrect measurements which affected cabinet order and window order which was not returnable patio furniture used as work benches patio and yard used as a dumping ground etc We were the points that had to point out the issues and then argue with them to get it resolved when these are very simple things that should just be done correctly in the first place Follow the manual follow what city inspector expects etc I cant imagine the customers who dont know any better and assume things are okay when there could be bigger issues caused to their house in the long run

Finding a contractor that does quality work and is reliable is rare My husband and I decided to remodel  90 of my childhood home and after meeting with six contractors it was clear from the beginning that we wanted to work with Leeran He was always prompt to our meetingscalls explained things in an easily digestible manner and was honest 

This project was insanely important to my family as we had a lot of memories in the old home and the Baron crew created a new modern home for us to make new memories in with our toddler Leeran was one of the big reasons why our project got done on time especially impressive during COVID as he was extremely responsive Anytime we had a question or needed his advice during the project he was there to help answer questions explain the timeline help facilitate and project manage timelines with the crewvendors etc 

We also worked with Noya one of their interior designers and she was so sweet and helpful in designing our home She attended multiple meetings with us to understand our design aesthetic shop with us for finishes kitchen tile countertop etc 

I have been recommending Baron the entire time weve been working with them Their work is top notch and having a PM dedicated to your project is a game changer My husband and I are working parents with a toddler so it was less stressful and not as overwhelming having Leeran help steer the project for us

I had a great experience working with Leeran and the Baron constructions Our project was based in Sunnyvale while we were living in San Francisco with a less than two year old toddler in the middle of the pandemic We were redoing 23rd of our home which entailed large structural changes We knew this wasnt going to be easy and we wanted to go with the best in the area 

For day 1 Leeran and the firm were punctual outright honest and very collaborative making them one of the most dependable contractors Ive ever worked with In the early days I remember brainstorming layouts with Leeran late into the night over zoom He was always very accommodating open to creative ideas and sharing this experience to keep the project feasible When it came to quotes while Baron was a bit on the higher side I knew I was going to get what Im paying for So we decided to go with them 

The project had a very tight deadline as our lease in SF was ending in March and we were starting this project in early October Leeran stayed on top of it throughout Even when there were hiccups like when we found out our ducts needed to be replaced and one of our structural beam was infected with termites Leeran added more workforce instead of pushing out the finish date Leeran has a fabulous team of people he works with From the architect to the designer everyone was such a pleasure to work with From finalizing permits to ordering finished materials everything was so systematic and well planned that Im afraid Im spoiled for life 

The final product of their work was above and beyond my expectations When I shared the photos with my friends and family I had to convince them that they are not photoshopped Checkout out the Kitchen  Bathrooms Design  Remodel project from Sunnyvale

I highly recommend Leeran and Baron Constructions If I had to do it all over again Id go with Barons again

We started working with Baron Construction this year on a multistage project and we are about to complete Phase I of it  a full KitchenLiving room remodel to a modern farmhouse Leeran is our Project Manager throughout the project  Overall I am very happy with the work so far and how the new Kitchen  Living room area is shaping up

Like any renovation project there are surprises and complexities you encounter along the way  and while not everything always goes according to original plan I truly appreciate working on this with Leeran  we are able to work through it together evaluate different ideas an options and were able come up with reasonable solutions to all problems along the way I also appreciate the completeness of the work and ensuring we get a higher quality finished product which meets code  Leeran ensures the work is done right above everything else

I look forward to continuing our work together in Phase II of the project
They rebuilt our shower to exacting specifications We are in love with the resulting artwork which is sturdy and beautiful I highly recommend the services
There is a lot of unethical behavior on the part of the staff They do not respond to calls and dont care about the customers I had a very bad experience

This companys service is overpriced and their staff is unprofessional It is a shady business and I regret choosing them They have been refusing to give me a refund for two weeks The service has been inconvenient for me

BUYER BEWARE  If you are thinking of hiring Baron Construction Or David to do any major work  think twice The company is a complete disaster and incompetence They dont understand architectural or structural plans or even care about doing so 
On their website Baron Construction claim that We are LAs premier DesignBuild Contractor with over 55 years of combined experience but their presence in the SF Bay Area is a mess
Their approach is to sign you up for a highpremium contact and then hire halfcost subcontractors and provide zero supervision to any work Subcontractors do whatever they think sometimes not even up to Code with zero guidance or supervision from GC Subcontractors make costly mistakes for which Baron Construction will charge you Subcontractors damage expensive finishing materials and nobody at Baron Construction takes responsibility Dont bother Take your money somewhere else where you will get quality communication and responsibility We hired Baron Construction to build our dream home and with the project still unfinished it turned to be a nightmare all way along Baron Construction had promised us completion in 9 months but turned it into over 25 years project We had no choice but to fire Baron Construction and it took other General Contractor a long time to correct all mistakes Baron Construction and its subcontractors had made

Have you ever envisioned and dreamed of improving your home We have for a very long time And with the help of a talented Baron team and great delegation by Sean the project manager were now living in our dream home Despite many setbacks this year due to pandemic Baron team made our vision a reality

We hired the Baron team to turn our historic San Jose craftsman house into our dream home and could not be happier  It was a major project including converting an unfinished lowceiling basement into permitted living space an addition to the main floor and rebuilding most of the structure while keeping some of the original redwood bones and craftsman charm that other builders didnt want to touch  Ron and Eli have been with us every step of the way from architectural drawings and shepherding plans through the city to major excavation and framing now to the last finishing touches  Whether Baron employees or hired subcontractors everyone on the job has done top notch work and displayed pride in their craft  Big shout outs to Salvador the framer for stopping at nothing short of perfection and to Courtney the interior designer for helping turn our ideas into a reality beyond our dreams  We will be raising our family in a beautiful home and creating many memories for years to come  Thank you Baron

Our home was built in the 1950s and needed some major work  What started as the wish to add central heat turned into a entire home remodel with the help of Baron  We bid out several companies for plans and Ron was personable kind  asked great leading questions  He returned with three options Good  Better  Best and provided the reasoning behind them all  He was knowledgeable of the requirements of our city plus had great suggestions on how to better our ideas  

In the end we ended up adding 400 square feet plus brought the entire home down to the studs  We updated everything  from the roof to plumbing to electrical to the stucco around the house  The end product is absolutely gorgeous and we are thrilled with the work that was done  

The project completed on time  and although over budget it was due to unforeseen circumstances lead  asbestos and beautiful add ons like our newly vaulted great room ceiling and front of the house upgrade  The on time portion was essential though  as with SIP starting due to COVID19 we were able to return to our home from the small apartment we were staying in  Ron kept the team on schedule and pushed hard to ensure we could come back ASAP  

I highly recommend Baron  especially Ron as the PM on the job  Between his ability to keep the project on schedule and Courtneys amazing eye for interior design  we are proud to have our kitchen  master bath featured on Barons website Home Expansion  Renovation
Very professional prompt and they do great work Highly recommended Obi was always reachable by phone and responded promptly to all queries Extremely pleased

We remodeled our 30year old kitchen and appreciate the job that Baron did  We especially appreciate the work of Obi the Project Manager who kept track of the various subcontractors and their schedules  As with any remodeling project there were hiccups along the way and his sense of humor and commitment to quality helped us a lot  We love the finished product

I used Baron for design  build for a master suite bedroom  bath addition on my house    They did a great job  The quality of work was high and they worked through a number of unexpected challenges that popped up along the way  The project took a bit longer than originally expected but very happy with the final results
Baron is great to work with They are respectful and responsive and their work turned out great They have experts in lighting plumbing etc

We worked with Baron Construction and specifically project manager Ron Hogen to remodel our 120 year old Victorian home It was a long and complicated project that was basically a gut job for a significant portion of the house  involved a completely new kitchen great room relocated the kitchen to a new part of the house laundry room bedroom 3 bathrooms butler pantry finished basement and more Now as I sit in my beautiful new and sparkling kitchen great room I can wholeheartedly recommend Ron and Baron Construction for your project Looking back on our project  yes there were ups and downs and some challenges as you would expect with the extent of our project especially given we lived in the house through most of it However Ron maintained open communication and transparency throughout He was dedicated responsive and accommodating Their price was extremely competitive and in the end they finished very close to the original bid most of the change orders were initiated by us We are happy with the quality of their work and they didnt close the project until all the final minor adjustments were perfect We will be calling them for any future projects

I was very pleased with baron construction especially Etels project management She was very professional and accommodated our quick turn with this remodel She was attentive with my concerns and responded quickly with questions If something didnt work Etel went beyond to do the research to figure out a solution I would recommend Etel to anyone

My wife and I needed one of our bedrooms completely rebuilt flooring ceiling walls insulation painting AND we wanted to completely renovate the attached bathroom For starters I will admit I am extremely particular I scheduled consultation appointments with 5 contractors all of which had great reviews on Yelp and other sites From prior personal experience and friends experiences with contractors their reputation on the street is not that great poor communication lack of timeliness etc After all the consultations I decided to go with Baron Construction For the record they were not the cheapest but their offer was fair and I felt good about our project manager Leeran Shlomo Our project is now complete and I have to say I feel very good about selecting Baron Construction and Leeran Shlomo Leeran proved to be anything other than the contractor stereotypes I mentioned above He was personable friendly a GREAT communicator and he made himself available almost anytime even before 8 am and up until 10 pm at night sometimes His customer service was superb I would highly recommend Baron Construction and this is almost directly attributable to our experience with Leeran Shlomo The project manager can make your life really smooth or miserable Leeran managed our project extremely well and kept us updated almost daily If you can select Leeran I would highly highly recommend him Hes awesome

Never gave them the contract Just too expensive Got 3 more quotes from licensed and bonded contractors and trust me they were 8 times more expensive 
Maybe they are good at doing fabulous job but Ill settle at 95 great job at 18th the price 
2 stars for the project manager who was patient spent time to understand needs

My husband and I decided to renovate our kitchen After getting some estimates we decided to choose Baron construction This job included removing a wall two fireplaces all cabinets countertops and appliances and then installing new fireplace cabinets quartz waterfall island quartz countertops and backsplash 

Every construction project has some hiccups here and there ultimately its the end products that count We are very pleased with our new kitchen and fireplace The quartz for the island was cut and installed wonderfully Wow factors are definitely there

An incremental payment schedule was provided All changes during the project were itemized and approved by us prior to work We paid as various stages of the work were completed

Overall We are happy with the way our kitchen turned out and we could not be more pleased with Baron Construction and all the products of their teams work

My project manager Lital was beyond fabulous  She was both professional and personal  Professional in every aspect from start to finish and yet personal in the way she listened to me and put my wants and needs at the forefront  I would absolutely call her again if the need would ever arise  Cant say enough good things about her and how she handled my project

We just completed a complicated kitchen remodel and full bath remodel with Baron Construction  The project was completed on time actually early and for the most part within budget  There are always a few surprises with a project dealing with an 80 year old house and constraints imposed by our first major remodel a number of years ago not to mention current building codes  Our project manager Eli and his assistant Obi where wonderful to work with and the Barons management model is unique and ensures positive communication and rapid problem solving throughout the project process  Further the actual work did not start until all critical decisions were made and key materials in place or their delivery date assured eg new kitchen cabinets  This was essential to project timing and minimizing our disruption 

In addition the on site construction crew was amazing  They were there every day as promised and a pleasure to have in our house  Fernando is a master craftsman and even the Palo Alto building inspector told us in front of Fernando that he was an amazing builder who did everything according to best practices and worked to perfection He solves problems and is so conscientious What a prize Baron has in Fernandoand those who work with him as well 

Our new kitchen cabinets had to to fit exact specifications for a variety of reasons and this was very important to us  Eli and Obi did meticulous measurements and the cabinet makers did an excellent job as did the installers Marco and Carlos  They worked hard to have the cabinets just perfectly placed They were true perfectionists 

Eli and Obi were more than fair in listening to our requests and satisfying our needs  They worked around our schedule to insure work timing was handled correctly  And when the few problems did occur the Barons team was on top of them and they were resolved to keep the project on track and meet our specific needs 

The contract for the work was fair  The only real issue for us was that the allowances were somewhat low  We went over because we selected more expensive products We would encourage more generous allowances with the contract budget adjusted accordingly 

Overall we could not be more pleased with Baron Construction their management team and all the products of their full teams work  We are thrilled with our finished product and would certainly use Baron again A big Thank You

Baron rebuilt our shower to exacting specifications after a previous tile replacement done with another contractor failed just like the original tile  The resulting work is sturdy and beautiful and we couldnt be happier with the results

We had the pleasure of working with Eddie on project management and Lucas as our foreman  Both Eddie and Lucas were very prompt professional and knowledgeable  Any time we had a question they were available to answer  Although it didnt have any material effect on the job we also really enjoyed just chatting with Eddie and Lucas when they were around  Everyone we dealt with felt warm and genuine and it made the whole process a lot more pleasant

Now the work wasnt cheap and we did have some overruns on time estimates but nothing outrageous  When something would go longer than expected Eddie always kept us in the loop as to why

All things considered we would absolutely use Baron again and would recommend them to anyone whos willing to pay for great craftsmanship

Craftsmanship at Baron Construction is world class  We had the pleasure of working with project manager Ron who worked with us from project definition all the way till the everything was fully completed including the professional power wash to remove any type of debris on the drive way  Ron was with us every step of the way throughout the project and was always super responsive via phoneemailtxt   In addition Ron always came over to checkin with us to ensure were happy with the progress and accommodated to our busy schedule by coming in later in the evenings after were done with the kids dinner

We contacted Baron in Dec 2017 when we purchased our home and wanted them to update 3 of the bathrooms  After a walk through of the existing bathrooms measurements were taken and we received a formal detailed quote  The 2nd best aspect the best being their quality of work of working with Baron is how they never nickle and dimed us  what we paid for the project was exactly what they quoted at the start  fair adjustments due to us adding wetwalls in 2 of the bathrooms which we didnt want initially when we started the project

The only criticism we had with Baron is the length of time it took the finish the bathrooms We were originally told itd take 34 months and it ended up taking 6 months  Part of that is our fault because we had guests over and had to stop construction for a couple of weeks which caused downstream delays The wait was well worth it because the masterful work of Sergio who does tiles was simply amazing  Overall we were extremely happy with the way the bathrooms turned out so we just wanted to take a few mins to acknowledge their amazing work here on Houzz
We recently had our bathroom remodeled and hired baron construction Everyone was professional and courteous We were very happy with the results and would recommend to others

As a Realtor my responsibility is to my clients When my sellers wanted to do improvements to their investment property in preparation for Sale we chose Barron Construction for the job they were AMAZING they took all the headache out of the renovation they acquired the permitsoffered insight to the design and materials and even when we hit budget snag they were able to accommodate Eli and his team were super professional and skilled The property sold before ever hitting the market while under construction and was over our target price all cash 7 day close Everybody was happy Will definitely call on them when I have another project And so should you

I interviewed Mike Baron owner of Baron Construction  Remodeling Co to remodel my ranch style home to an up to date open concept look I knew within 10 minutes that this was going to be a good working relationship and I was going to hire his company for this project The first thing that impressed me was I had a long list of things I wanted done and he glanced at it put it aside and just listened to my ideas We did a walk through the house and the first thing he noticed was the foundation in the TV room was sloping and needed to be replaced This was not on my list but he recommended this be my first priority and Im glad I agreed The moldy musty smell that was plaguing me disappeared and the floor is now even 

I was fortunate to have Mike work with me on the whole project As a client I appreciated the consistency and confidence working with one person and helping with the design and selection of materials This was very important to me and high on my list I also appreciated working with the same onsite people when possible

The scope of the project entailed new wood floors crown molding and baseboards throughout the house A beautiful custom fitted cabinet under a wall mounted TV with matching floating shelves in the front room 

The entryway into the kitchen was enlarged to give it the open concept look I wanted The kitchen was enhanced with a quartz countertop sink beautiful backsplash shaker cabinetsdrawers and hardware

Replacing the old brick with natural stone and a streamline mantle changed the existing fireplace

The master shower was gutted and replaced with a decorative mosaic tile strip large complimentary tiles for the shower walls and bathroom floor frameless glass shower doors and an infinity drain The mosaic tile was also used as the backsplash behind the bathroom sinks and an area behind the toilet 

The interior walls were freshly painted with an accent wall in the living room and TV room The exterior of the house took on a whole new look with a change of color 

I do want to qualify that it appears that the project took a long time but this was my decision not the contractor We have two additional projects that will be completed this year and I will be finished with my long dream list

So the questions are Would I hire Baron Construction  Remodeling Co again would I recommend this company to others Am I happy with the results Answer Absolutely

I wish I could give only 1 star the 2nd star is for what they have done right I read through all the spectacular reviews below so I chose them but ended up really painful experience which will be unforgettable once in my life time This is a really long story I have with them 

Mike appears to be a nice guy and promise whatever you ask claim they could deliver your dream project But when coming down to daytoday project execution it will be your big nightmare and you are doomed if you go with them

I just finished a very large addition project with them and the following are the pitfalls
1 the contract only lists the major items but not down to all the details In the beginning they alluded that they always write contract this way and not worry about the details but later on when specific details were requested they argued that those were not included in the contract and would be considered as change order items for extra cost
2 no interior designer provided in the contract they promised to offer an interior designer to complete my ideas and discuss all the details to select proper fixtures for my huge addition project However the first 2 designers quit after first contact the 3rd one agreed to take this job but couldnt receive my ideas accurately nor complete the design in the booked time frame I ended up doing the rough design on my own with limited knowledge without any professional assistance Had to decide and made all the purchases myself This is in disagreement to the contract
3 upon signing the contract they claimed they would have 46 people on the job site everyday but that only happened in the first 2 weeks After 23 months they began to not have full crew working full time on your project On some days even no one showed up due to various excuses Then the GC began to take vacations or go out of town for personal issues
4 They claim to progress very fast so they want you to have all the fixtures ready or some jobs would be delayed in order to wait for the parts So I had to get almost all parts early on in a short time but then realized theyd reach that task much later
5 Very poor in communication They send multiple people to interface with you and they are sometime inconsistent within themselves Not all the parties are on the same page all the time You need to deal with different people with different personalities and responsibility in one project And the real working contractors are another different group of people
6 Theyd break the fixtures you buy The stuff are all stored in the garage before getting used after long time they may not be able to find specific parts you prepared and claim them missing or parts may get scratched or broken due to careless handling so you end up buying same items twice
7 The raining season came before the roof was installed and they didnt do proper treatment to prevent water damage Only simple tarp was laid on the frame which collapsed in the evening storm and my existing living room was flooded because the rain leaked through the roofwall crack they made When I expressed my concern to them regarding the waterdamaged wood framewallfloor they simply shrugged it off saying itd dry out over time If they are real professional they should know that the waterdamaged wood will be distorted and becomes very hard even after drying out And the wall will not be evenly flat and becomes wavy in some sections
8 the floor in the extended living room area is not level with the existing flooring The flooring was fully renewed in the integrated living room but you can feel the slope in the extended area When the issue was brought to them Mike first said hed send some other guy to investigate it then that guy simply said he couldnt feel the difference and attributed it to the new wood accommodation 
9 they may do well if your project is quite standardized in that everything just gets replaced without any particular design change With not too many customization your project would be delayed In the beginning they claimed to complete my project in 6 months then it ended up to take 13 months
10 their secretarys attitude is very poor When they want to collect payment they want it right away and would harass you in email But when you request them to fix something theyd have various personal excuses 

Above are just the major pitfalls what I could remember after 13 months there are so many miscellaneous minor complains which I cannot list them all After all if you choose them you wont have peace in mind during your project and the journey will be winding as they are not professional enough to handle projects in modern style

I worked with Baron Construction  Remodeling Co on several occasions photographing projects they completed Each time I was able to witness firsthand uncompromised quality of their work the beautiful functional designs attention to the smallest details happy home owners I am confident to recommend their services to even more discerning clients

I would highly recommend Baron Construction  Remodeling  We were working with another GC to add a bathroom and new kitchen  The project was to have been completed in eight months  Instead it took more than a year and a half and the project was still not completed My husband and I were very stressed and frustrated as the GC and workers did not show up to work everyday  
Baron Construction was doing a remodel for three of my neighbors  They were all very happy with Baron Construction  We decided to part ways with our GC Mike decided to help us finish our project so we would pass our final inspection Needless to say we were  very happy and relieved to be working with Mike Baron  He checked the job site often and saw that things ran very smoothly for us  Everyone from the job crew to the office staff is very professional friendly and efficient  Very happy with the quality of their work Each project has been completed in a timely manner We still have little projects that they are helping us correct from the last GC  I would highly recommend them

My wife and I wanted our old home to wear a new look So we consulted the Mike of Baron Construction with his crew to make our dream come true The task was deftly executed and each day ends with a general cleaning even till the last day of the work Our experience with them was quite awesome  every time they resume work the atmosphere seems like a family reunion Mike and his crew diffuse warmth and friendliness each day Now our home is a place of regular visit for our friends All thanks to Mike and his crew for their best shot that changed our old house forever into the best we can ever think of

I cant say enough how helpful Eli Levy and Mike Baron were in our construction project We started with a master bath and kids bath remodel but the project soon expanded to the entire upstairs Eli and crew were easy to work with extremely detail oriented and had great suggestions throughout the process Even as we expanded the scope of our project Eli kept the project moving and we were quickly finished with an entire floor remodel We couldnt be more happy with the results and even look forward to our next project

We really enjoyed our remodeling process with Baron We interviewed a couple of contractors and are glad that we made the right choice Eli has been really pleasant to work with from the very beginning through the end He is responsive professional and paid attention to details Luis and Emilio who worked onsite were fairly hardworking and friendly Though it took a bit longer and extra rework to install the tiles perfectly it was an overall smooth and efficient process We love our freshly updated home when we wake up every morning

I never thought that remodeling could be as hasslefree as Mike and his team made it to be Last year my husband and I had a grand plan to remodel our kitchen We had been getting into cooking and loved entertaining that we felt it was time to make the plunge I learned about Baron Construction from a friend who spoke very highly of them All I can say is that our decision to get our kitchen remodeled and to work with Mike has been ONE OF THE BEST DECISIONS for our family ever The whole process went by smoothly We set up an estimate and then they promptly started with the work They made the house very livable and they were there to answer any questions Now the finished product was wonderful I dont know how we could have waited this long for the kitchen remodel We got our dream kitchen and even if our home was built in 1988 it made our house look brand new The cost was reasonable and very worth it due to high quality Very satisfied and I cannot wait to get other parts of the home done by Mike and team too

Of all my years managing my home i have never encountered a contractor as reliable creative and efficient as Baron Construction These folks are the best and i would only trust remodeling my home with them They worked on my kitchen guest bedroom and living room and kept the place clean throughout the process It was very liveable to come home They respected the place and did a fantastic final job at a great price I never knew my kitchen could look like one out of the magazines but they gave very useful design advice I would get them again for all future jobs Communication was polite and very consistent as well Six stars

I am not a fan of remodeling projects I am always worried that the time and effort is too tedious for our household given that I work full time and manage a small business Mike and the team at Baron changed all of this Remodeling was hasslefree because they kept the entire house clean throughout the process They listened to us about what design we wanted and delivered on it Everytime we had a question the team was always one call away I never thought our bathroom and masters bedroom can look as beautiful as it is now Next my kitchen I will only trust them Great value for money Prices are on point and you can see the high quality

I used Baron for an extensive kitchen remodeling job as well as new flooring and ceilings  The management of the job was excellent with lots of design advice and guidance flexibility in accomodating my personal choices and high level of expertise in all phases and areas of the job which included complete demolition of the existing kitchen installing all rough plumbing and electrical new flooring tile and wood new cabinetry and painting throughout  Eli especially was terrific at managing the whole thing The crew was always respectful and courteous

When you work with Mike Eli Oded and Cheryl you get great customer service and amazing work Ive tried other contractors in the past but the quality of their work is literally the BEST in the market Highly recommend

My bathroom called for a muchneeded makeover I had been thinking about it for years I heard from a friend that renovating bathroom would increase value of the house so I said game lets do it I asked around for the best contractors in the South Bay and instantly got drawn to the team of Mike and Eli of Baron Construction in Saratoga From my first inquiry they were patient with taking me through the entire process  They came promptly for a free estimate They listened to my design and gave valuable inputs They were experts in constructing and were very efficient way  being sensitive to my budget and true to my vision The construction came and went and it was a breeze I did not stress about anything because they guided me throughout the process  plumbing design materials labor I couldnt be happier with the end result My bathroom is exactly how I imagined it and more I will definitely call them again for my future projects THEY ARE THE BEST

Best remodelers in the Bay Area They are extremely trustworthy no hidden costs and are patient in answering any questions I showed them a picture of my dream kitchen and everything exceeded my expectations  the finish seems very good the lighting is perfect and the paint is amazing They know their design stuff These guys are the real deal

Eli Levy of Baron Construction and his crew Luis and Fernando did an outstanding kitchen remodel  on time and within budget Eli was very patient with our first major renovation and helped us pick out flooring cabinets and handles backsplash countertops sink disposal and lighting Moreover he also brought the walls insulation electrical the junction box and smokeCO detectors up to code in the original time estimated Luis and Fernando were polite and worked long hours to finish their projects letting us know when they were starting or finishing for the day They cleaned up at the end of every day and Eli gave the kitchen a professional cleaning at the end They even did little extras like putting in a dimmer switch and installing an underthecounter toaster oven Our most positive renovation ever and I hardly recommend Eli Luis Fernando and Baron Construction
Mike and Carol C Menlo Park

Baron Construction  Remodeling is the BEST contractor that I have EVER worked with The quality of workmanship is beyond excellent They were constantly in touch with us making sure we were satisfied with the work in process If we had a question they would immediately respond Fantastic Customer Care So if you want to have a Wow experience with a contractor just give them a call

My husband and I have been wanting to redo our kitchen and we finally had the opportunity to do so earlier this year Since we have never done any renovation project before we decided to research online and found a website that allowed us to reach out to several companies We collected 5 companies one of which is Baron Construction They were the first one to contact us via email We narrowed our choices down to three companies and set up appointments to meet with them We met Eli and we immediately connected We had a vision of how we wanted our kitchen to be and this is something out of the box Eli understood our vision despite it being different from most of his clients and he assured us every step of the way that he will carry out this vision This was very important to us Bottom line is after 8 weeks of patience our kitchen turned out to be what we had envisioned it to be Eli and Baron Construction delivered what they promised to deliver and we are very happy with the result We have since hosted parties at our home and have received very positive feedback on the kitchen We will not hesitate to recommend Eli and Baron Construction to my friends and family Keep up the good work

As remodeling jobs go ours was rather small under 50K but you would never know that from the attention we received from Mike and Eli at Baron Construction We had a minor problem with one of their subcontractors but it was resolved immediately and the bottom line is that the job was done in a timely manner and we are extremely pleased with the results Mikes design suggestions were spoton and without them the results would not have been as good as they were

While we did not hire Baron Construction for our current project given a preexisting relationship with another contractor we were very impressed by the professionalism and responsiveness of this company We contacted several firms and Baron stood out Jesse came to our home for an initial consultation and immediately followed up with another visit to go through the proposal in detail  and we found both the proposed scope and budget to be very fair We will definitely consider Baron in the future

My parents shopped around for a while before Baron Co and Remodeling They made it worth the search Very respectful of our ideas and the kitchen was finished with great attention to detail Would recommend them to anyone May use them again for a bathroom
