We are very pleased with the endproduct and the process Horizon followed from start to finish including design suggestions and assistance with surface material selections  Thank you very much to all of the Horizon project team including the backoffice team for a job well done 

We wholeheartedly recommend using Horizon and will most certainly use Horizon for any projects we undertake in the future

Originally written about 35 months after job completion  I must admit that we were highly cautious with our next bathroom remodel hire Reason being was a previous contractor abandoned our master bathroom remodel after attempts to have them address valid concerns That other contractors license was eventually suspended after multiple consumer complaints were filed Thankfully working with Horizon Construction and Remodeling Inc on addressing a previous contractors mess ups and then completing a redo of another bathroom in our home was a much better experience The new remodel job that was Horizons from start to finish was completed in a timely manner With our older house there were issues uncovered after the demo process that were not too much of a surprise The issue extended our timeline and did add somewhat minor costs to the job When questions or concerns were raised Mike Roppo our project leader was responsive to address issues and provide explanations before the job moved forward I must state that some of the worksite conditions at the end of a couple jobs were not ideal For example white residue was left on our hedges and some of our walkway from workers mixing materials  possibly grout Also workers left cigarette butts in our newly installed small rocks landscaping that couldnt just get swept out easily Workers did clean up nicely for all interior jobs Finally after completion of both bathrooms two more events occurred First Horizon came out and made repairs that surfaced like settling cracks in the grout for example This was part of their contract but it was done in a timely fashion Second Horizon was helpful with our complaint to the contractor license board by providing a statement of the condition of the bathroom remodel that was abandoned Overall we would include Horizon on our list of contractors to work with again

Sounds corny but it is true  When you deal with Horizon Construction  remodeling you are treated like family 
Its my last major project and I have been putting it off for many years Life happened and it is never the right time to remodel But we are glad we finally did it
 They are very patient people and never made me feel indecisive despite the fact that I am I doubt there are many firms in the entire country that are genial and comfortable and just plain nice Also they explain everything in as much or as little detail as you want and all those details are laid out in an organized and thorough fashion Everyone there is super professional They are a treasure
Love my new house 
Thank you Horizon Construction and remodeling

We were impressed with everyone we interacted with at Horizon especially our contact person named Mike  They finished the project before estimated time and there were no extra charges for anything  We would recommend this company to our family and friends

Frequently a home renovation is not for the faintofheart There are countless general contractors to choose from some firstrate and some unscrupulous and which one to hire is often the biggest unknown factor in a successful execution of transforming an idea into fruition In my case I could not be happier Mark Besnos his wife Enna and all the team at Horizon were absolutely the best Having done many a previous renovation on properties over the years I can truthfully say that Marks diligence and demand for perfection overseeing my project is something Ive seldom witnessed before He is more than a simple hammer and nails contractor Mark is a symbiosis of one part architectural engineer with the aesthetic eye of an interior designer With his immense help we were able to harmoniously blend the various colors of granite travertine tile cabinetry and backsplash updating a tired midcentury ranch home kitchen into a Tuscan showplace

Horizon Construction  Remodeling in 2018 lied about getting City inspections done damaged my home and covered up the damage and left dangerous conditions throughout my home leaving myself and my family at risk For example just some of the things Inspectors found sharp roof shingles unattached on my roof which could have fallen and cut us they left exposed electrical wiring in the attic  potential fire danger extremely hot pipes not insulated which could have burnt us and more The City is making me remove construction Horizon did because they lied about getting approval DO NOT HIRE THEM They are a dangerous company They also gave a portion of the remodel to another general contractor not as a subcontractor without my approval  Horizon Construction Mark Besnos did not supervise this other contractor whos license has been suspended and is being prosecuted by the California Attorney Generals Office All of this can be confirmed  This was a big project and Horizon Construction  Remodeling took my money and have left my entire family devastated by the amount of damage they did to our home

We just completed our remodel of two bathrooms with Horizon Construction We are very happy with the final product The work was completed on a timely basis with great communication regarding scheduling problem solving and attention to any issues that came up We did have a few issues that needed some attention but they were completed to our satisfaction I was very nervous when we first started the project because I am very detail oriented and was afraid the work  might not meet our expectations but it most certainly does 

David was our project manager and always responded back to any issues that came up on a very timely basis always available via phone or email even on weekends The office staff was equally responsive and that made this project so much easier to deal with 

We did have a little delay due to the rainy weather over the last couple of months but other than that someone was here working pretty much every day since our project started the first week of January  

 Very happy with our choice of Horizon and highly recommend them for your remodeling needs

We chose Horizon Construction  Remodeling for our project    They are a family owned business that provides outstanding customer service  Our project was a kitchen and living room remodel  Our home was built in the early 50s with the center piece of the home being an indoor barbque taking up most of one wall of a very small kitchen and a massive fireplace in the living room  After weeks of delays and concerns from the city an engineer and architect from Horizon were brought in to help finalize plans  The final decision was to remove the massive brick structure  The kitchen and living room were gutted fireplace and barbeque demolished and a new wall was constructed   We especially liked that everything we needed was on display at their showroom and the staff was extremely patient and helpful as we make our choices  Throughout the remodel our project manager David and the office staff kept us informed as to what was happening and who was coming to work the next day  Each day the crew working cleaned up and did not leave a mess  David Enna Genesis and the office staff were always very professional and constantly checking as to how we were doing since we stayed in the home throughout the remodel  We are extremely pleased with the job done for us by Horizon Construction Remodeling and we highly recommend them
Rick and Sandy Lewis

The team at Horizon Construction  Remodeling has given us the master suite of our dreams My wife and I love our midcentury house but the master bathroom left a lot to be desired Our project manager Mike helped us maximize the space by borrowing from a largely unused kitchenette area and was able to include every single one of the custom cabinets appliances and fixtures we set our hearts on Now we have a luxurious spacious bathroom and a lovely bar area with plenty of storage that will be excellent for entertaining guests Although there are always some complications in a remodel this large the whole process went very smoothly and Horizon took care of us at every step  we were always left feeling our home was in the best hands Thank you so much for helping us fall in love with our house all over again

From the very first phone call I made to Horizon I felt valued as a client The office staff was always kind and helpful Our project manager David was easy to work with and was always responsive to any questions or concerns He stopped by frequently to check the progress throughout the project and kept us informed of the next phase and work scheduling All the tradesmen involved were professional respectful of our home great to talk with and did an excellent job Any remodeling project can be stressful but I believe that the service we received from Horizon made the process as smooth as possible  We love our beautiful new kitchen and bathroom I would highly recommend Horizon Construction and Remodeling for any home project and would certainly use them again

Mark Besnos and his crew at Horizon Construction and Remodeling did an awesome job on all of my remodel projects in my home I especially like that if there is something that you dont quite like they will fix it for you right away I recommend them because I love how everything turned out and I will use them again for my next project

Horizon Construction did an awesome job on our Kitchen Remodel  We put off remodeling for so many years but upon reading all the good reviews on this company we finally decided it was time  The outcome was exactly how I envisioned it  David our project manager as well as everyone in the office were always available to help us with any little or big question or concern  We were always told what to expect at each stage and all the contractors were very professional and always kept the work area clean each evening  All deadlines where met as scheduled and no surprise costs were incurred   Thank You Horizon Construction and Remodeling

I interviewed multiple contractors to complete a full bathroom remodel for 3 bathrooms  I ultimately chose Horizon because I knew they would be the right fit for the project I was undertaking  They are a small family owned business that has the customers satisfaction in the forefront of their minds   We agreed that we would complete the project in two phases  We completed a hall and master bathroom remodel first with the third bathroom to take place after the first of the year

I started this bathroom remodel with a different contractor  but it didnt go well So I hired Horizon Construction  Remodeling and my bathroom is absolutely stunning I will recommend them to friends and family David my project manager was great he always assured me that all will be taken care for me and I actually could sleep good at night And I did  Im very happy

I interviewed three contractors and chose Mark Besnos and Horizon for an extensive interior remodel of my home  master bedroom and bath guest bathroom kitchen  The project included removing a soffit ceiling in about half the house installing a new support beam to eliminate a post wainscoting in the living and dining room hardwood flooring in the renovated areas except the bathrooms two new windows and a new fireplace mantel  Mark wasnt the least expensive but based on his experience and our discussion I felt he would be hands on and would provide guidance during the course of the project  Mark has excellent taste  He was patient and worked with me and my cousin who was consulting with me very well  He was earnest in trying to accommodate his visits to my work schedule  A project of this magnitude is bound to encounter some challenges and Mark was good at explaining them and presenting options while giving me time to reflect  The various trades who worked on my home were top notch and when there were some issues Mark immediately took steps to correct fix redo what needed to be done An example is the flooring  There was a haze on the floor and Mark contacted the manufacturer and called in and paid at his expense a professional to inspect the floor and make recommendations  Mark and his team were always on top of things communicating often via email my preference and also texts  The end result has exceeded my expectations  I am thrilled with my new open concept home  The kitchen is amazing the fireplace is a focal point and I absolutely love my master bathroom   We had some fun with the guest bathroom as well  Now I need artwork  Bottom line    if someone leaves me a house in his or her will and I have to remodel it Im calling Mark and Horizon

We love Horizon We wanted to do an exterior remodel and contacted them They were there every step of the way and always available when we had questions They were on time and kept to their schedule They constantly kept us updated on the project Mark is greathe listened to what we were thinking and helped make it reality  We really liked that Mark lets you know if there are any problems and helps come up with solutions They take care of their customers  Enna was also amazing and was always available to answer questions We will use them again for our next project
Horizon did a wonderful job with our kitchen They were clear communicators all along the way and went the extra mile to accommodate our requests We love our new kitchen

My wife and I made the decision to completely remodel our 55 year old kitchen which included removing a couple of walls to open it up to the dining room and living room After deeply vetting numerous contractors and securing proposals we selected Horizon Construction in Fullerton CA Mark Besnos company owner was by far the most detail oriented and considerate home improvement contractor weve ever worked with Throughout all phases of the project Horizon provided extraordinary workmanship in a very timely manner Of course with any major project there are a few challenges Horizon Construction remedied every issue with effective contingency plans for any problem they encountered  Here is an excellent example of superior service We selected and ordered quartz counter tops from MSI of Orange CA  When the quartz counter tops arrived and were installed they had a number of finishing defects which Horizon tried to repair Unfortunately the defects were irreparable and MSI would not stand behind their product and workmanship Mark and Horizon Construction however alleviated our aggravation by selflessly offering us a partial financial reimbursement even though the counter top finishing was not Horizons responsibility 
From beginning to completion Horizon Construction exhibited professionalism pride of workmanship and a commitment to excellence If you are seeking the finest company to successfully bring your remodeling dreams to reality Horizon Construction is unquestionably the one

We were referred to Horizon Construction from a neighbor that had recently hired them for a bathroom  kitchen remodel  Although Horizons was quote was higher than previous quotes we went with them based on the quality of workmanship we saw in my neighbors home plus their great online reviews 
The first couple of weeks went well We were told the job would take 45 weeks to complete The first round of workers and inspector were on schedule Around week three things slowed down  The tile guy only worked between 35 hours a day We ran into a couple problems with paint that resulted in doovers  Some of the mistakes made by the painters were somewhat novice However our project manager was quick to respond and correct the issues The job was completed at the end of week five
At the end our experience with Horizon Construction was a great one The office staff and project manager were pleasant and attentive to our concerns  We are happy with the work done in our bathroom and would consider using them again in the future  I highly recommend Horizon Construction to anyone looking to do a remodelconstruction in their home

It went great Enna David and the entire Horizon Group were a pleasure to work with Expectations clearly communicated and met Trades arrived when scheduled on time and prepared The few problems that came up were quickly resolved to our satisfaction We are planning further work next year and will use Horizon Construction and Remodel again We have full confidence that we will be treated as fairly and professionally as we were on this project

We contracted with Horizon Construction and Remodeling to remodel all three of our bathrooms  Mark Enna and the administrative staff were fully involved throughout the project providing updates schedule reminders and addressing all of our concerns along the way  While we were upgrading the two upstairs bathrooms we had a family of 5 sharing a downstairs shower  Mark was good about keeping the project moving forward and getting us use of the upstairs bathrooms as soon as possible  During the demo work we uncovered bathtub rust  Mark covered the options and was able to work in the schedule a replacement with a project quick change order  We also decided midflight of the remodel that the existing cabinets were not going to work  Mark once again was able to provide options for us to address within our timeframe and budget  As during any remodel big or small issues and challenges will arise  Mark and the whole Horizon team went out of their way to make sure my wife and I were extremely pleased with the process and end results  We very much appreciated the communication periodic onsite morning meetings and the breakdown of payments spread throughout the 4 month project that allowed us a little more control of the finances  Overall we appreciated the honesty upfront discussions and their dedication to details to make our bathrooms beautiful  We would not hesitate to contract with them again  Thank you Mark Enna and the whole Horizon Construction and Remodel team

You can feel comfortable hiring Horizon Construction and Remodeling for your next house project  I had to do lots of repair and maintenance on my Queen Anne Victorian home and Project Manager Mike and the folks at Horizon came through with flying colors   I replaced the roof cleaned and reinsulated the attic added new floors upstairs upgraded some electrical repaired plater ceilings and painted the exterior with a three color Painted Lady look for the house  All the subcontractors were polite fine craftsmen and always on time Mike was great communicating  with me at all times  This situation has not always been true for contractors Ive interviewed to work on my house  Usually they come to the house say they will give me an estimate and never call back  Horizon and their team did  high quality work on a difficult older home

Horizon Construction and Remodeling recently remodeled my kitchen and I highly recommend their work  They completed my project on time and on budget

I chose Horizon to do a complete kitchen remodel add an additional 100 square feet and create a 9 pass through between the kitchen and family room  This entailed major construction  engineering demo footings support beams framing insulation electrical plumbing paint floor tile cabinets countertops and installing appliances  
 
Mark Besnos the owner was the project manager and Enna and Genesis back office provided education and guidance throughout the entire project  The approximate timeline given was three months it was finished in two months  Mark worked with me in building the kitchen in stages to ensure I was able to stay within my budget 
 
Mark made suggestions along the way which I appreciated  I agreed with some and others I didnt  For instance during construction he prompted me to think about raising the ceiling  Im very thankful I agreed with his recommendation  it worked out well  There was never any pressure to do anything I didnt want to do 
 
Communication is always the key to success  I was always aware of the next steps  Whenever I had questions Mark or Enna promptly answered  They even answered questions and concerns while they were on vacation  they are dedicated to their profession There were some small concerns or issues along the way  they were addressed and resolved in a timely manner which was greatly appreciated
 
This has been an educational and rewarding experience  A lot has to do with the relationship established with the client  The Besnos family Mark and Enna from the beginning have been friendly patient honest and trustworthy
 
I now have a beautiful dream kitchen to enjoy with family  Thank you Mark and Enna
The Horizon team did an OUTSTANDING job at my home We had a bathroom remodel which they basically completely redesigned and it looks absolutely amazing So happy with the outcome and service

We searched on all popular web sites to look for a recommended contractor  Horizon beat out other companies and we met with Mark the owner  I explained to Mark what we were wanting and looking for  Horizon was very timely and on task  They always kept me in the loop of what I needed to do and what they were going to work on  When I changed some of the design or wanted tile to be redone Mark came right over and addressed the issues  I liked how all of the workers cleaned up after themselves as well All of Horizens employees were professional and friendly Our kitchen looks great and functions so much better  Our kids want to cook too  Thank you Horizon

Our dream to remodel our kitchen began a couple of years ago   We interviewed contractors but none worked out or followed up with us   We began to again search in the summer of 2017 and met with Mark of Horizon Construction as well as with other contractors  We were especially impressed when we visited the Horizon  office to see cabinets and other materials  Also we were very impressed by Ena and the staff   Mark had great ideas and helped us design a new kitchen for us Work began in mid November due to our schedule  and progressed well with workers showing up on time almost every day  Work included demolition replacing all cabinets with granite tops and tile backsplash creating an island with a sink which involved moving plumbing widening of the doorway between the kitchen and dinning room enclosure of a preexisting sliding door  new floors in the hallways kitchen and dining rooms and creating a new gas line and venting exhaust for the new range and other electrical upgrades   The work progressed smoothly despite a few bumps in the road  Mark made certain all work was done to his high expectations   Ena and the office staff were always available to answer our questions  Inspections went smooth and quickly   The job was completed on schedule and to our satisfaction   We highly recommend Horizon Construction and will not hesitate to call on them again for future projects

The complete remodel of one of our bathrooms was just completed by Horizon Construction last week The bathroom is gorgeous I could not be happier The project manager David was constantly on top of the scheduling and progression of the work He visited almost every day to make sure everything was going to plan and always asked if we had any questions or problems Any issues that came up were immediately addressed Compared to many contractors I have dealt with the communication was wonderful  The quality of the work was top notch and the various tradespeople plumbers electricians painters tilesetters etc were all very pleasant and helpful They were always on time per the schedule or if there was a delay we received a timely email and reschedule time The job was completed on time per the original promise date The clean up at the end of the job was professionally done I would highly recommend Horizon Construction for any remodeling job

Horizon construction and remodeling Inc did our whole home meaning total kitchen remodeling cabinets tile counters lighting upstairs bathroom tile flooring and vanity all trim molding crown molding wall repair texture coat painting everywhere stairway new banister carpet vinyl plank flooring back front doors all electrical with new lights ceiling fans and interior doors What a Beautiful job We couldnt be happier Kitchen looks like a model in a show room The whole house is such a transformation that we feel like were on vacation Mark and his workers were on time and so courteous Horizon show room makes it so easy to pick out your products and its not confusing We would with no hesitation recommend Horizon  for All your remodeling needs inside and outside of your home Thank You to All the Horizon work team

We love the new bathroom The old bathroom was cramped damp and colored pink the house was build in 1957 The only venting was the window My father requires a full time caregiver and there was barely enough room in the bathroom for one grown man let alone two Mark came up with an excellent floor plan and matched his ideas with our hopes and wishes The bathroom was completely gutted The plumbing for the shower with shower head and hand shower was added and the plumbing for the toilet and the vanity sink was moved Three areas of lighting were addedover the vanity over the toilet and in the shower A combination venting fanlight was installed An additional electrical outlet was installed The bathroom window was replaced Floor to ceiling tile was installed for the shower as was a channel drain the shower is 8 feet wide The project was finished not only on time but 12 days early The entry into the bathroom and the new shower can now accommodate a person in a wheelchair Not only is it functional its beautiful in its modern palette of neutral grays tans and creams All work was professionally done and supervised by Mark After the project was completed Mark and Enna called to follow up When there was an issue with the shower not draining I made one call and Marks workers were out the next morning to fix it This was my first remodel project and on a whole it much better than I had hoped it could be We are very satisfied and will be hiring Horizon for future projects

We chose Horizon to refresh the exterior of our home based upon the good ratings in Angies List and Houzz  They were very prompt in setting a time to meet with us  Leo listened very well to what we wanted to have done and then he walked us through how they would go about getting the job done  He detailed for us the many steps they would go through to prepare for the work that would need to be done for removing old facade adding new stucco painting adding stone veneer and replacing patio fence  He explained some of the extra steps they do that others skip which are important for a longlasting result  Leo laid out for us the expected start time and timeline for completion  Based upon some other estimates that I had received Horizons cost estimate was very reasonable  Their backoffice staff was also very helpful to us in selecting the materials to be used on the job and working with us on scheduling  Once the job got started it progressed according to plan and all city inspections were completed timely without need for any change to the work they had done  The job was completed to our satisfaction on time and on budget they even did a few extra addons without charging us anything extra  Job well done thankyou

Thank you

Horizon did a great job with my room addition with bathroom and patio  Now I have a great guest room for when my friends and family come to visit 

I now start my day on my new patio enjoying my coffee in the shade  Mike the project manager was wonderful to work with   He was helpful in helping me designing both the interior and exterior layout  He had a lot of great suggestions and was very knowledgeable

I will not hesitate to call upon them for any additional work in the future

Mark and Enna were fantastic  Mark has an excellent understanding of construction and the realities of renovating a home  His recommendations reflect his extensive experience and his artistic flare  We found that by listening to him his ideas proved to be a better fit than our original ideas  We are so very glad that we took his advice especially regarding our kitchen remodel  Horizon has an entire showroom of materials and other construction examples at their Fullerton location  This made the selection of materials extremely convenient  We also found that their material options were of very good quality  We love the backsplash that we picked out in our kitchen

When we first met Mark he was 5 minutes early to our appointment  Everyone we dealt with after the initial meeting was either early or exactly on time  We never had to wait for anyone  When a repair was needed or a concern arose Enna resolved the matter very quickly sometimes within the hour  They were very up front about what was being done and they stayed on budget  We moved out of our house for 2 months and they had us back in exactly on schedule  No surprises  Our home was very outdated and needed some serious attention and that is exactly what we got  We would hire Horizon Construction and Remodeling again without question

In October 2018 I met with Mike Project Manager from Horizon Construction to do a basic kitchen  wet bar remodel  He was very easy to work with and explained the process very clearly Horizon replaced all my cabinets installed new granite counter tops backsplash sinks and faucets and painted the room This was to be completed in 4 weeks but ended up taking a little over 5 weeks as there were issues with some cabinets backsplash and minor electrical problems Every concern or even complaint I voiced was immediately addressed and corrected They all are focused on providing excellent customer service and making sure their clients are satisfied Enna owner contacted me recently to ask if there was anything else I needed and this was a month after completion Cost of the project was within the budget I had allowed and felt their costs are reasonable and competitive Even with the extra week to complete the project the result is a beautiful new kitchen island and wet bar I may be remodeling another room and would hire Horizon Construction again as their concern for customer satisfaction stands out

Work was done in a timely fashion and the quality was excellent Each stage of the project was 
managed well all workers were punctual and did a good job of cleaning up after work was done Work 
was completed ahead of schedule and we were very happy with the final results

Project Repipe whole house and install tankless water heater replace ducts and install new ACFurnace unit remodel two bathrooms

After speaking to three general construction companies we decided to hire Horizon Construction for our projects Their prices were reasonable as compared to the other companies and we appreciated the detailed written scope of the project that they provided to us Mark Enna and their office staff were very pleasant to work with they also have a very nice showroom

Overall we are happy with how our projects turned out Enna is great with communications She always replied to our messages promptly to address our issues and concerns We did have various issues with the workmanship and cleanliness of some of the trades that came to do the work which made us felt that the project manager was not always attentive to what was being done at our house We had to clean up a lot of the messes that were left every night when came home Horizon could definitely benefit as a company if they improve their ability to oversee a project more closely to ensure that things are being done properly by their subcontractors But in general Mark and Enna do care about the satisfaction of their customers They are committed to making things right They always made sure that we were happy with the end result We never felt like Enna or Mark would just ignore us or our concerns For this reason alone we would recommend their company to others

We loved the fact Horizon had a nice showroom where we could find everything we liked It made all decision process much easier for us 
Mark Besnos did excellent job he planned everything very well The communication was great and easy Enna Eskin was helpful at office and over emails We love our new kitchen it is just like we imagined even better  This is now a perfect summer house for our big family 
Thank you Horizon

Well I wish I had something fun and exciting like a room addition or kitchen remodel to talk about but our project was just a boring complicated extensive repairrenovation For more than a decade every time we had a major storm we got flooding in our family room and every time we thought we had fixed the problem when the next storm came the water reappeared We talked to several contractors and they all had pretty much the same opinion Since we couldnt figure our the source or sources of the leaking the only way to fix it for sure would be to completely remove and replace the stucco and paper from the rear of the house and replace all the windows This would also involve detaching and disassembling a large wood patio cover and then putting it back together One contractor didnt even want to take the job

We chose Horizon due to a high recommendation from my brother who had used them for a kitchen remodel The estimate and bid process was quick and smooth and communication and scheduling with Enna and the office was great throughout Mark was quick to address the problems which were many due to the fact that as it turned out our leaks were coming from more than one source

The quality of the work for the most part was excellent In fact the building inspector commented that the workmanship of the wrapping job was the best he had ever seen My only complaint is that the work of the window installers was less than stellar but allinall  the final outcome was good The color and texture of the stucco also perfectly matches the rest of the house

We did a water test and all looks good We wont know for sure until the next big storm but Im confident that well have a dry family room so confident In fact that we just installed new carpet

Mark and team just finished giving our old house a face lift Outstanding job Mark gave us some great advice on how make the house look its best His inputopinions matched our taste Marks attention to details and the quality of the work ensured the outcome was to our satisfaction We would definitely recommend them and use them again on our next project New garage doors are on order

After talking to several contractors we reached out to Horizon Construction for a bid Mark came out to our house to discuss our project After talking a while Mark gave suggestions for changes to the blue prints It took 7 months with our previous contractorarchitect to get the changes made but they were unquestionably worth the wait Once we had approval from the city Mark worked us into their busy schedule right away Mark and his crew worked every day to get our project finished in the timeline they gave us 
Like most projects there were setbacks budget changes and other bumps in the road However Mark and his team worked really hard They did a great job scheduling inspections to keep the job moving All of the budget changes were because of things we wanted or added not because of his incorrect bid When issues arose his office staff was great at contacting us communicating via phone and email and answered questions quickly 
Mark and Enna were a joy to work with they were punctual professional offered good ideas and allowed us to do some of the work ourselves Mark is very particular in the way he expects the work to look he treats his projects likes it is his own place Mark and Enna always worked diligently to be sure we were happy with the products and services they provided Despite skepticism from friends and neighbors Mark was done a few days early 
We would definitely recommend Horizon Construction to any of our family and friends

The owner is stuck up and rude Says hes the owner and is taking his time to come give us an estimate Says he doesnt do small things and looked like he didnt want to be at our house wasting his precious time The way he talked and acted throughout the process made me feel like our job was too small for him and we were wasting his time When I called to book my appointment for a consultation I was very specific twice about what I needed to be done and asked if our job was too small and the person who setup my appointment said their smallest job was 10k So he should have already know the job details prior to coming But when the owner showed up and realized we were small to him he didnt seemed like he wanted to waste his time on us He quoted me 47k for doing my yard which I had bids from other contractors and the highest bid was 15k I told him that and he replied that he will hire and attorney and open escrow with 10k and said if I can find someone to do the job for 15k he will give me 10k and if not I need to give him 5k What he said was unbelievable I said Im not going to waste your time anymore and he said EXACTLY and left On their website it says we are your friendly contractor and want to make it a delightful experience for our customers  Well our experience wasnt really delightful and the owner wasnt really friendly Maybe if I had a million dollar home for him to remodel and the job was hundred of thousands he wouldve acted and talked differently because he did mention he was working on a 200k pool in Palos Verdes for a 15million home Its fine if you dont work on small jobs but tell your customers ahead of time instead of coming into their home with no common courtesy

Thank you for your reply We did hire someone to do the job But its not the price Im talking about that is wrong with your company Im talking about your owners attitude when he came to my house I think he should at least apologize for that instead of trying to write a response to this review to prove that there was nothing wrong with his attitude and the way he talked to a potential customer I dont appreciate it someone that I asked to come give me an estimate to act like the way he did Thank you for wishing me good luck because I do feel the luckiest part was to not hire your company for the job

We did our research Horizon construction company was great The workmanship was beyond our expectations Our kitchen turned out better then what we thought possible If youre searching for a construction company for any remodel give them a call you will not be disappointed Thanks to Mike our contractor he listened to us and gave us great advise  They even supported us with fixes after the warranty period just awesome

We were looking around to get a kitchen and bathroom remodel We met with several contractors but really liked Mike He was professional knowledgeable and we liked his design ideas and the quote 

We ran into unexpected delays from the beginning and that set our timeline back out the gate asbestos abatement However when the project got moving it took off well 
There were some other bumps in road that caused delays as well most were unexpected 

Overall we give a four star rating  Certain aspects of the process were great and others were lacking 
The office staff was great and tried to be helpful and accommodating We had been lead to believe that we would have a working toilet and work would be done around it since we only have one bathroom We had made arrangements for the first few weeks and as we got closer to thanksgiving week and we were aware that little work would be done it became a problem  Enna made it work and got the flooring laid and the toilet connected before the holiday 

The downfall of the process was either scheduling or communication or something  When we made a change no matter how big or small time was added to the timeline Although technically they finished within the timeline there were days on days on days where little or nothing happened One day someone came for all of fifteen minutes and then nothing for a week  We had all the rooms painted and we have never known painting to take so long The plumber was great The electrician was great the framer was great  They all cleaned up well at the end of the day and the few times it wasnt quite right Mike was on it and had it taken care of 
 
Overall we are happy with the end result and would hire Horizon again

Horizon Construction was such a lucky find for me I inherited a house from my parents on Balboa Island that was built in 1933 As my parents aged there was a lot of deferred maintenance that needed to be addressed I had several contractors come and give me estimates and advice but no one took the time like Mike of Horizon Construction did to really find out what I wanted to do and give me realistic quotes He was able to preserve the charm and character that the house had while making it safe and clean with modern amenities It was a long 8 months project but in that time the quality and care was always there and my wishes were foremost  I am happy to give the folks at Horizon Construction Two Thumbs Up and would urge anyone wanting a remodel to contact them

Sincerely
Suzanne S
We are happy with the final results of our remodeled kitchen  Eitan our Project Manager was the best to work with  Thank you very much

Enna Mark and team did a great job with our full kitchen remodel We knocked down two walls did a large support beam and gutted the complete kitchen Mark suggested we move the sink and reprofile the window which turned out to be an excellent suggestion Were very happy with the kitchen and can now entertain without being stuck in a very warm and small box separated from our guests

Enna spent a lot of time with us near the end of the project to make sure we were satisfied and that everything was to our liking

The bathroom is beautiful  It was very stressful and I agonized over each decision  Mike project manager and Robert contractor helped with decisions and obtaining materials  Sol was a great worker  Mike assured me that everything was fixable when I was catastrophizing  I had to remind myself of that many times  Im so glad its over  I would recommend them

My husband and I are so fortunate to have found Horizon Construction on the Houzz website to help us with our master bathroom remodel  It was extremely important for us to feel that our contractor was listening paying attention to detail and caring about doing a great job  We got all that in spades in working with Eitan Beznos our lead designercontractor who became a trusted friend through every step of the process  He consistenty monitored the progress and was in contact with us almost daily to ensure we were satisfied with each installation element along the way take action to address any problemsissues update us on whatwhen to expect next and offer helpful advice on lingering decisions to be made  He also even helped find the exact tile from a photo I had shown because he knew it would make us happy not having to settle for something else  Our design concept for the bathroom really came to life and it really is a showstopper  We are amazed at how it looks now and are already planning to contract with Horizon again in a few months for our second bathroom remodel

Our small old bathroom was starting to have a lot of issues so we decided a remodel was in order We found Horizon Construction online and decided to request an estimate based on the reviews After our first meeting with Mark we felt comfortable with him and were impressed with professionalism and attention to detail Their showroom office had many displays and samples that it made it easier for visual people like me and my wife to envision our design Our bathroom project had a few twists and turns but Mark was very flexible and committed to customer satisfaction Marks workers were easy to work with and the Horizon Construction staff was kind and willing to help with any questions issues or concerns we had All in all we are happy we got the bigger bathroom we wanted I would definitely recommend Horizon Construction for home remodels

We recently had our master bath remodeled by Horizon Construction  This was our first experience with a remodel contractor and we didnt really know what to expect  In our first meeting with Mark he made several suggestions that we decided to go with such as putting in a light above the tub and adding an electrical outlet on the other side of the sink  

We really appreciated the fact that Horizon had their own showroom and could make suggestions on combinations of tile vanities and counter materials  After going to the big box stores and looking at tile and counter top materials and still not knowing what we wanted we found Marks input invaluable 

The workmen all were very good at their jobs  Steps were taken to protect the floors leading to the bathroom under remodel Trash was removed in a timely manner  

There were lots of items we needed to purchase in the first couple of days so that when the walls were rebuilt accommodations could be made for the water supply drains and electrical  Decisions had to be made along the way and we answered them the same day so as to not cause a delay in the schedule  There were a couple of issues that came up and Horizon addressed them as we went along  

We were so happy with the result that we hesitated to use the bathroom for a couple of days after completion we didnt want to mess it up

Bottom line is we wouldnt hesitate to use Horizon Construction again

I decided to have a load bearing wall removed which sounds a lot easier than it is Horizon was the only company I contacted that didnt waffle on giving me an estimate or insist that I must get more done in order to be taken seriously  The office staff was friendly and engaging without being pushy and sales crazy  I found Eitan Beznos our assigned contractor to be friendly  ethical  receptive and always a calming influence in the midst of the project which  as anyone whos had major construction done  knows can be a real upheaval of a familys daytoday life All the workers involved were pleasant and efficient I was impressed also by the respect and friendliness between the workers and  Eitan  Im very big on customer service and to me a homeowner with a quirky mid century home that needs quite a bit of work I feel like Ive found a reputable company that I can trust and partner with to turn my home into the neighborhood jewel that it can be Im looking forward to having Horizon remodel my kitchen later this year
