Horizon had to take down two walls and put In a beam to create our open layout kitchen It was a huge job and we took three bids But the other two bids wouldnt take out the walls and we didnt want to settle Mark said yes right away and brought an engineer who gave the okay Every change easy passed by us for approval and the work was done very well Issues we had after the remodel were handled Someone visiting said it looked like it was always there but my husband and I know what a huge transformation this kitchen was to our house and our lives Enna was a great lifeline through the whole project which was completed before the estimated time

Complete remodel of kitchen demo of old exterior concrete stone and fireplace Replaced with stack stone Installation of wood flooring 


We went through several contractors 6 to be exact before we found the right one From the moment we called Horizon Construction Enna made use feel very comfortable We explained to Enna what we wanted and what we were looking for She stated that Mark Besnos would be out to see us and see what he can do Mark who is the owner and designer gave us a very beautiful vision of what our kitchen would look like We felt at ease with Mark and fell in love with his ideas We have finally found our contractor We only had signed a contract with Horizon to remodel our kitchen but asked mark what he could also do with the exterior of the house and gave us another beautiful vision He recommended to remove the old concrete stone around the house and by the fireplace and replace it with stack stone The final out come is amazing We also wanted to remove the old carpet and install wood flooring and gave him the job as well and they did an excellent job of installing our wood flooring Our overall experience with the Horizon Construction crew was very good The crew was very polite on time and cleaned up after them selves at the end of the work day Mark and his foreman Elly were there almost everyday to ensure that the projects were getting done as we have specified and would correct any issues we had with some of the installations Given the amount of time we gave Horizon Construction they finished the job as specified and did a beautiful job We have gotten many many compliments on our house and can only thank Mark Enna Elly and the Horizon Construction crew for all there hard work and for making our experience and great one

Just want to say that we are extremely happy with the kitchen remodel that Horizon Construction completed for us Our home was built in the late 1940s and was really showing its age We wanted to have an open floor plan that incorporated the kitchen dining room and living room We had some ideas and a budget for what we were willing to spend Mark took our ideas and make them come to life He has an eye for design and style and a commitment to quality and detail He and Enna are both committed to making sure their clients are satisfied and happy
We took out a load bearing wall between the old kitchen and living room and now have a wonderful large room This was the second kitchen remodel I have lived through and this one was definitely the best Mark said he would be finished in 9 weeks and he was Their crew worked Monday through Friday and showed up every day  Enna called daily to keep us up to date making sure we had appliances and spec sheets ready for the crew and making sure all our questions were answered 
Mark was at the house every morning to direct the crew and attend to any details He made sure that everything that we couldnt see was done correctly as well as attending to details like overhead lamp and outlet placement and overall design functionality and appearance Mark had the placement of the lamp over our dining table changed several times without our knowing until he was satisfied that it would be in the right place  and it was
The crew was absolutely great They arrived at about the same time every morning went right to work but were always patient and answered any questions we may have had The absolute best thing is that they cleaned up their work area every day without fail They put up plastic so construction dust in the rest of the house was kept to a minimum which I really appreciated
If you are wondering if Horizon is the company for you  our answer is YES Do it you will be very happy with the result We sure are

We chose Horizon Construction because of Marks vision for our bathrooms in our initial consultation Our bathrooms are rather small and we had a few ideas of what we wanted before Mark came over but he quickly suggested what would and wouldnt work based on his extensive experience and design knowledge Mark is very good at being straightforward with you on what needs to be done for the space you have to renovate Some might consider his straightforwardness slightly abrupt but dont let that put you off  hes very good at what he does and has a passion for his work and the details and he knows the work his crew does is a reflection of himself and his company as he should

We mainly interacted with Enna Horizons business manager and design consultant from that point forward though Mark did visit the project regularly He also made himself available at any time should you want to go over any details with him Ennas responsiveness and regular communication is a big reason we are as happy as we are with how the project turned out Not many contracting companies have someone like Enna to be your customer service rep design consultant project coordinator complaint department etc Enna is very responsive competent nice and professional and made the 2 months of having workers in our home a tolerable and almost pleasant   experience 

Day one Enna and Mark met us at the tile store to sign the contracts and help us pick out flooring countertops and glass borders which was incredibly helpful Work began quickly afterwards and the crew was at our house just about every week day for around 2 months Each crew member was very nice respectful hard working and we trusted them implicitly to work and lock up after themselves while we were at work Coming home from work each day was an exciting event seeing progress was a treat and they always cleaned up after themselves each day 

Mark visited the site regularly and corrected any issues and small details he found and listened to any concerns we had We never felt we were being given the runaround or that our ideas and concerns were insignificant For example they installed a 4 vanity backsplash which didnt connect well to a 6 wood trim piece We pointed it out and they tore out the marble backsplash and redid it to 6 

Now Im not saying there werent frustrations Some language barriers and miscommunication between ourselves management and the crew reared its head from time to time but whenever issues arose they were always fixed to our satisfaction and never impacted the end product I dont believe you can have a multimonth long project without these issues arising and I chalk them up as normal and dont mark them down for this 

One miscommunication example was that we asked them to put insulation in the shower plumbing wall which bordered the bedroom for noise reduction They forgot to do this during the rough plumbing and said if we still wanted it done they would open up the drywall in the bedroom side then patch and paint the bedroom wall which they did end up doing This was a minor issue and we would have been fine if they didnt want to do the work but they went out of their way to make us happy

Other minor issues stemmed from the crew not looking at the fixtures we purchased before finishing the rough plumbing in the first bathroom Their expectation was that we would point out anything other than standard fixtures we had a bar with handheld shower head they assumed fixed shower head Our expectation was that they would check with us before commencing rough plumbing or at least take a look at the fixtures The result ended up not being a big issue  a slightly less than ideal placement for the water outlet valve However we learned a valuable lesson and made sure to go over rough plumbing for the master bath with them beforehand

In the end both baths turned out beautiful more so than I imagined Overall we had a very positive experience and highly recommend Horizon 

A few tips 
Get your fixtures early unless youre ordering from a big box store some items take a few weeks to get in 

Make sure your expectations and visions are communicated Enna writes up a detailed scope of work make sure this is correct though some items are difficult to envision when you initially go over the contract 

Make sure to meet with Mark and show him your fixtures and expected placements before the crew starts rough plumbing It will be much more difficult to change things once this has started

We had recently purchased a home and wanted to do some extensive remodeling before we moved in That job included
 Installing a new loft in a room that had a vaulted ceiling and tying that new 2nd floor room into the existing stairs and hallway This included new recessed lighting for both the new loft and the nowshorter bottom floor room
 Remodel the kitchen including removal of an old fireplace to open up the kitchen and living room new tile floors reface and refinish all cabinets replace all appliances new backsplash
 Create a new bedroom from an existing open space and reframe the closet walls in the new room and in the adjoining master closet
 New wood floors in the 1st floor of the house and new carpeting in the 2nd floor
 New interior paint throughout
 Refinish the front door
 Miscellaneous installing new lightsfansetc

This project required securing a few city permits which Horizon did without problem

All in I think this was about a 35mo project We did not move in until it was completed

We now love Angies List because thats how we found Horizon Mark Enna and Eli 

Weve had both good contractor experiences and otherwise We had never used Horizon prior to this job Our experience with Horizon has gone very well over these months We wished we had a bigger budget to have them do more work for us because they do great work at good value but eventually we simply had to stop so we could move in

Horizon is geared for client satisfaction on reasonably sized general contractor jobs Heres a few excerpts of our experience
 As we were settling on early design decisions Mark was really helpful Mark has a unique set of skills in design engineering contracting etc He brought great ideas forward that were good value decisions For example we were creating a new bedroom for our son which was on the small side He recognized that and came up with the idea to reconfigure the closet and master bdrm closet that was reasonable got us a bigger room for our son and made use of wasted space so that the master closet is still the same size or slightly larger
 We had many conversations as normal for such a project about materials finishes and etc Mark was really helpful at guiding those discussions to make good value decisions based on what he heard from us Weve had contractors in the past who really know only one style or pricepoint and try to push it constantly but we felt that Mark did a great job of listening to what we wanted and coming up with good creative ideas and compromises based on our objectives
 Mark Enna and Eli were all consistent and reliable If they said they would meet us at the house at a certain time they were there on time and ready Wed be lying if we said they were perfect but they really made every effort to do their best
 Our area has a substantial list of HOA requirements We never once had a single complaint from a neighbor or HOA the entire time despite a lot of work being done They hauled off their own trash so our little trash bin wasnt overwhelmed and generally kept the place picked up Thanks Eli 
 Shortly after we started wHorizon my husband noticed that somebody had backed into the mailbox and asked Mark if he thought one of his guys had done it Mark just looked at it and said Dont worry Ill fix it A couple days later a new mailbox is there that matched the old one all fixed up No debates just happened
 Near the end of the project my husband made a comment about how the drain plumbing was routed A couple days later it was fixed Again no big debate or issue just happened
 After our front door was refinished the exterior had a green tint to it that we had not expected It wasnt terrible and perhaps we were the only ones who would notice Mark asked how we liked it and could tell from our first reaction we didnt really like how it looked But it was not a terrible issue and we formally told Mark and Enna in writing that wed accept it asis and not to worry resandingfinishing it only for a modest cosmetic issue It looked fine and quality was good but we just had an expectation of a more brownish deep wood finish A week or so later they refinished the door anyway and now looks perfect

There are more little stories like that but you get the point We thought that Horizon was highly focused on Customer Satisfaction in the way they ran the project from beginning to end They took care to do good quality work sought client feedback in a constructive way and addressed issues quickly and practically They had to get some city permits in this project which they got without a big problem and they passed all the city inspections without issue

One of the things which makes Horizon unique from others we considered was that there was no middleman handoff from the Sales rep to the person who actually manages the job We worked with Mark Enna and later Eli throughout the entire project We really enjoyed getting to know them and we thought the continuity of the relationship definitely contributed to the efficient outcome

In our experience with Horizon we found them to be professional ethical skilled and hardworking throughout the process We would recommend Horizon to our own family members

Thank You Horizon You are a great team

As you can see this was a major remodel project I wanted a contractor to oversee all aspects work with me on the design stay on top of the job do professional grade work and show up every day all at a fair price I got that with Horizon You can go with a cheaper contractor but I doubt you will get all of these qualities Mark spent a lot of time with my wife and I selecting cabinets granite countertops and flooring making design suggestions He also made recommendations as the job progressed Enna was in contact with me daily and was a pleasure to deal with The job started the day they said it would and ended on time I checked the work done daily If there was every an issue or I was not happy for some reason it was corrected without discussion Horizon even did some upgrades to improve the look of the job and did not charge for it They did not charge any large up front fees instead I paid as each aspect of the job was started and completed Mark did a final inspection at the end sending some workers back to do minor touch ups I would highly recommend Horizon

We recently had new wood floors installed in the entire downstairs of our house  The job included demolition of existing tile and carpet  They hauled away the old tile and carpet and did a wonderful job installing my new floors  Horizon also converted my old patio into a new patiosunroof  They added walls around the existing patio and installed windows and a sliding  glass door and doggy door  I had a wonderful experience working with Horizon Construction and Remodeling  Mark Besnos and Enna Eskin were very pleasant to talk to and they responded to every call I made to them  Mark was on the job frequently to be sure things were being done to my satisfaction  His crew was very hard working and did an excellent job  they were on the job daily and always cleaned up prior to leaving  I was amazed at the progress that was made each day  The entire job took approximately 4 weeks and stayed within my budget  I am very pleased with the final product  My floors are beautiful and I love my new patiosunroom  I would very highly recommend them to anyone that had a  job to be done  I definitely plan to use them again in the future

We had a bathroom from 1964 completly remodeled The original bathroom was about 10 ft by 412 ft with a tub shower and dividing wall We had the tub removed and one wall torn out and rebuilt to expand the room by 212 ft We had the original window removed and replaced it with a custom size window which was built into the shower walll This required structural wall modifications and outside stucco work We moved all of the plumbing to allow for a large tile shower to be built This required cutting the slab foundation and installing new drain plumbing for the shower toilet and sink New vent pipes were required and had to be installed in the new wall and thru the roof The shower required extensive plumbing to allow for a cieling rain can body sprays and a hand held head We added a fan light which required venting thru the roof The shower was tiled from floor to cieling and the remainder of the room was also tiled about 40 up from the floor A frameless 38 glass door was also installed Two recessed lights were installed in the shower cieling along with vanity lighting

Horizon remodeled 3 averagesized bathrooms and retiled a fireplace The job included Hotmopping and floating cement on showers installing tile on floors shower bath surround and fireplace installing bathtub custom shower door and vanities quartz countertops sinks toilets faucets fans and lighting painting installing baseboards and bath accessories 

When I first met with Mark Besnos it was clear that he had an eye for detail Mark had some great design ideas and helped me pick out tile cabinets Everything was done very professionally Mark drew up a detailed contract and all changes were made with addendums Mark also provided all of the relevant licenses and insurance documents without having to ask In the end Mark made sure every last detail was perfect 

Enna Eskin did an amazing job managing the project She was always super friendly knowledgeable and professional and was great about using email and text to keep in touch while I was at work Enna kept me informed of what was happening throughout and also let me know ahead of time when there were things that I needed to do 

The work crews were friendly and considerate They worked very hard and performed highquality work They did a good job of protecting my floors and furniture and keeping the mess to a minimum 

I love my new bathrooms and fireplace Everything turned out beautifully and was done on time and within budget

Early in 2012 we took three contractors bids for a master bath remodel for our home In addition to a price we could afford Horizon Construction gave us some good design ideas and a feeling that they would take good care of us They werent the cheapest bid but we wanted to work with someone who got all the costs out there up front without adding on later We felt thats how they made their bid so we selected them for our job 

The project would remove the small glass shower enclosure and basically unused bathtub that were there from the original home construction and also upgrade the vanity with a nicer piece and put a granite top on it The old toilet would be replaced The linoleum floor would be replaced with tile which would match nicely the tile of the new shower enclosure Since we dont use the bathtub we opted to have more open space beside a larger shower enclosure and no bathtub Horizon would also install the toilet sinks and plumbing fixtures that we furnished for the job mount new mirrors over the vanity install new lighting and paint the walls

My wife and I didnt have firm ideas on the decor so the consultation from Horizon was very helpful We did a session at the building materials showroom together Once we settled on the color scheme and materials and the fixtures that we needed to furnish to them for installation the demolition work began and was finished very quickly and cleanly Horizon did almost all of the work during the daytime when my wife and I were both at work They took good care of our house and securely locked it up at the end of their day when they left

The floor and shower tile work was perfect and the custom glass nothing fancy just clear but its just what we wanted was installed on time and still looks great Partway along Horizon suggested we consider a unique tile backsplash around the vanity using the same accent tiles that are in the floor and the shower They gave us a special price and although we hadnt wanted to add to our budget we took their offer Its a really pretty blue aqua glass tile that is the key element to the whole decoration scheme The look we got is a bit unique and breaks from the cookiecutter conservative approach of the original homebuilder Very nice and more than worth the money If we ever sell the home well point out the very custom look of the vanity

Horizon got the building inspections and everything got approved straight off Once the painting was done there were just a few finishing touches to get but Horizon finished ahead of the project schedule which is nice if your master bathroom opens onto your master bedroom and youre actually trying to live there as we were My son was so glad that we didnt have to share his bathroom any longer But the bottleneck was worth it when work was complete

Incidentally for the new toilet which we picked up at Costco remember tight budget we bought the AMDM IntelliSeat an electronic toilet seat if you dont know what it is just Google itonce you have it you cant go back to replace the standard seat Although Horizon didnt seem to have experience with that product they installed it perfectly and we love it

About six months after the project was completed and wed paid our final check to Horizon the motionsensing light switch theyd installed in the bathroom began malfunctioning It got to be too annoying so I gave Horizon a call to see if theyd fix it for us They reminded me that they made a full warranty on all their work and scheduled someone to come out and work on the switch Their man came to our house and replaced the faulty switch with a new one which now works perfectly

We love our bathroom and are so satisfied with Horizons work They are friendly professionals who follow up deal with issues and problems when they occur finish ahead of schedule and back up their work

This project included total demo and reconstruction of 3 bathrooms It included converting the master bath from a Roman tub to a walkin shower with travertine to the top of all walls which had cathedral ceilings and a triangular window and replacing toilets vanities sinks and all fixtures In the guest bath the tub was replaced with a new tub and travertine on the walls The sink vanity and toilet were also replaced adding an enclosure using 38 inch sliding doors In the downstairs shower old ceramic tile was removed and replaced with travertine The toilet vanity and sink were also replaced The floors in all bathrooms were removed and replaced with travertine
 
In late September 2012 after getting an estimate from another company for our planned remodel of 2 bathrooms a large master bath and a smaller downstairs bath we made an appointment with Horizon Construction and Remodeling for an estimate We had previously read reviews here on Angies List
Mark arrived at the designated time discussed with us our plans then took measurements of the bathrooms He also made suggestions regarding the project He suggested that we meet with him at MSI to look at a variety of materials so he could more accurately provide an estimate
After deciding to have Horizon do the project we made an appointment with Mark to go over the contract scope of work and the payment schedule It was determined that work could begin on October 3 but since demolition could only begin midday We decided that early morning the following day would be best
The demolition crew arrived as scheduled and the project was started Demolition of the 2 bathrooms was completed in 2 days and work began on the remodel construction Each segment of the project went smoothly In the meantime we went with Mark to select a marble slab for the countertops We also met with the cabinet maker regarding the custom vanities and color of the stain
Work progressed smoothly and ahead of schedule Along the way we made several changes Enna was very helpful in accomplishing those changes and doing the paperwork involved She is an invaluable asset to the company
When the original project was well on its way to completion we decided to go ahead and do the third bathroom since we had enough marble left from the slab to do the countertop Also the vanity in the upstairs guest bath was the same size as the downstairs bath which made the custom construction easier and more efficient
Mark was here on a regular basis to check on progress answer questions and listen to our concerns In some cases he had noticed things that needed correction before we even brought them up
Any remodel project and especially one of this magnitude is stressful I know of several cases where projects lasted much longer than anticipated but that was not the case here The projected completion date was January 10 2013 however work was completed December 15 2012 which made our Holiday Season more enjoyable than it might have otherwise been The master bath which was converted from a Roman tub to a walkin shower is amazing and the other two bathrooms are elegant as well
Horizon Construction and Remodeling is dependable and you can expect them to do what they agreed to do The quality of their work is good and everyone we encountered was responsible for their part of the job My only admonition to you is that you make sure the scope of work that you sign off on includes all the things you discussed and thought would be there
If you have a project in mind call Horizon Remodeling and Construction and give them an opportunity to discuss it with you before you make a final decision We are pleased with how our bathrooms came out and would not hesitate to call Horizon for another project

They took our 1000 deposit and never worked on our deck or kitchen  They were going to build our deck then remodel our kitchen for 80k  It didnt happen  They were to work on our deck prior to out kitchen      It took over 1 month for them to respond to us at all after giving them our deposit check for 1k    We kept waiting and waiting for a response but we never received anything from Adam our project manager
Adam came to our house he was a great sales person  He convinced us that a SOD Builder is a fantastic company  My wife had a great rapport with Adam during the initial interviewquote  She mentioned I would travel to his home country Hungry for work   He was excited and asked me questions where I went and how I liked it  He seemed very personal and trust worthy and I was sold
I cut them a check for 1k on April 12016 for a deposit  It was cashed on April 15th 2016  
Adam promised they would start immediately and he would personally be in charge of the project and be able to start the week of April 11th  We were so exited getting a new deck and remolded kitchen   They signed us up for Buildetrendcom  This was a way for us to see the progress of our remodel  I thought we were in the right hands
We sent all the prints for the deck and permits to Adam  The prints for the kitchen and permit were in progress
We scheduled a time Monday April 11th for the foeman to come get an assessment on the Demo of our deck since Adam was the project manager we thought Adam was going to be there too  But to our surprise only Damien subcontractor and another 2 workers were there 
Damien asked for the drawings that we gave to Adam  I was shocked why didnt Adam Project Manager give Damien Sub Contractor plans for our deck  Our architect gave the official prints to Adam  I dont have a copy  I ran scrambling thru emails looking for some type of schematic  I finally found it after 20 mins of looking  our Architect came by 10 mins after  Our Architect was also expecting the SubContractor to have the blue prints  This was totally unprofessional  There was no communication between Adam and the SubContractor 
After Damien left we were told by SOD via Karla  that Adam would oversee the project from the office  He will never be on Site only for emergencies  The interview was the last time I talked to Adam or receive and email from our Project Manager  This was not conveyed to us as the owners  I wish he would have mentioned it during the quoting process  We didnt even get Damiens email address
Back to the story  Now Damien has the plans no work for the rest of the week We try to contact Adam to get pricing on the wood  No contact from Adam from Tuesday Apriil 12 Friday April 15  
Monday April 18th rolls around no work has been done on the Deck no contact from Adam for pricing    We try to contact Adam or anyone from SOD but nothing  No Contact from Adam from Monday April 18th  Friday April 22 

Monday  April 25 rolls around this is the 3rd week NOTHING  has been done to the Deck  NO contact at again from Adam or SOD  Monday April 25  Tuesday April 26th

We recently did our huge kitchen transformation The job included the removal of few walls ceilings popcorn being removed new plumbing new lighting and outlets with some smart home features etcThe interview process was very intense and massive We feel we interviewed a fairly amount of contractors 7 We talked and met a variety of peoplecompanies from small to large We called to each one and spoke to them over the phone and did a research about them making sure that they have valid license insurance and bond We talked to few secretaries that couldnt say our names correctly even and made mistakes with the appointment schedules  When we called Oren from SOD builders he the owner answeredhuge and big advantage on the rest Some of the contractors that visited our house for an estimate would either agree to all of our requests by saying absolutely or of course yes we can knock down this wall and not worry about support  And some of them kept telling me how they wanted to model our kitchen not listening to our requests or ideas Oren was a very straight to the point kind of guy and without any selling stories  He told us we could knock down walls but be sure about any support beams that would have to stay or replaced  The first day we talked through the design and all the financing options  Since it was our first big project we honestly didnt have any idea about how much it could cost The demolition was quick and clean It took them only 2 days to complete this task The working team were very nice to us and we got to know a lot about them They made sure to use plastic covers every day and sweep up at the end of every day and made sure our house was livable We ran into some of the beam support issues we mentioned above  Oren came up with a great solution that caused us to redesign the kitchen look Oren came up with a suitable layout that worked for us  This actually changed the focal point of the kitchen and we loved the new look with this change The project took a bit longer than we thought it would but was within the time frame that Oren promised us  We couldve had it done in less time but we wanted to take our time and to make sure that we are comfortable  The final kitchen is really stunning We can see that there was a lot love care special touch and craftsmanship into the smallest finishing details Oren was on site almost every day  If it wasnt him then his foreman was  He was equally as professional and committed as Oren was  Oren saw every step all the way through and ensured no detail was over looked  There was even a few details we asked for at the beginning of the project that we failed to remind him of that made its way into the final product  We were really happy to see this There were several of small problems and things that needed to be addressed after the project ended but Oren was there  He popped in to make sure all was still good  He does this because the house needs a chance to settle in a bit  He addressed them no problem OVERALL EXCEPTIONAL JOB by Oren and his team at SOD builders  We will definitely be working with him again

This is the second time that we use this company for a project at our house A while back we used them in our previous house and we liked the way they worked their price and the end results of the work that they did This time was not difference Out initial meeting was with Oren He came to our house on the day and time that we scheduled ahead of time When he came over he looked at the bathroom and came up with some nice recommendations and ideas that can still fit in our budget and be nice The bathroom includes paint vanity Floor and shower The massive work took over 2 weeks Each day Oren made sure to come over with his team of workers 34 each day and to guide them on how things need to be done and what has been done since the last time he visited our house The total amount was very fair and we didnt have any changes or hidden charges at all

SOD builders did a room addition to our house it was clear that additions are their specialty This is our first time remodeling so we were new to the process Daniel our project manager took a special care of everything that was involved in this addition from revising the plans helping in choosing the final materials purchasing them and making sure that they will arrive to the house on time so all the workers will keep working without stopping due to missing materials The whole work went smoothly and without any problem We are honestly and fully satisfied with the end results and we are so happy that we hired them The workers arrived to the house always on time and didnt miss any day during the work they were honest and open to any idea that we had and answered to all of our questions when we had them We knew we wanted to add another bedroom to our house but were not really sure about the specifics Daniel shared his ideas while working with ours Daniel and the workers truly know how to work with their customers which made this whole experience so much easier In the past we heard horrible stories in the past about companies surprising customers with hidden fees which results in paying more for the project than originally planned The price we agreed on was the same from beginning to end If you are looking for a trustworthy and dedicated company then we recommend SOD builders 100

We highly recommend SOD Builders  Extremely professional competent and hard working  Oren was extremely patient with us as we tried to work out how to get the kitchen of our dreams within our budget  He genuinely wanted us to be 100 happy with the design before we committed  The price Oren gave us was very competitive and included an interior designer Carmit Oron who pulled a beautiful functional design together that is perfect for our busy family  Oren made everything so stress free for us he took care of all the details of the building permit and project management
The workers turned up at our house on the set date and from then on we had workers in the house most days  If they couldnt make a day in the week they asked if it would be okay to come at the weekend  They were reliable polite friendly and very tidy putting up plastic screens to protect the house from dust and sweeping at the end of the day We were connected to the whole team with the BuilderTrend App this was invaluable as my husband and I both work and it allowed them to communicate with us and send photos of the progress  Oren checked in with us regularly and and answered emails 247 always with his goal of us being happy nothing was ever too big a problem
We are so happy with our kitchen and I will be calling SOD to do our next projects  Truly a first class construction company with exceptional customer service  Calling SOD was the best decision I made  I love my kitchen

I contacted SOD builders to see what it will require to remodel my kitchen At first I spoke to Michelle who was very nice and polite to me over the phone and she asked me some basic question in order to understand what my goals are After that phone conversation she asked me if I would like to schedule a meeting with Oren The meeting was scheduled for the following week and Oren arrived to my house on the time frame that Michelle gave me she was kind enough to even call me an hour before to make sure that Im home and to inform me that Oren was on the way The meeting with Oren was very good Oren was able to provide me with good samples of cabinets Floor and paint colors combinations His main goal on that meeting was to see the existing kitchen and to get some measurements of the space in order to maximize the space At the end of the meeting Oren and I scheduled another meeting in order to present to me a 3D design of how the new kitchen will look like and how much will it cost me even though I mentioned my max budget at the first meeting The second meeting was very good as well Oren presented to me the kitchen design that showed me how the new kitchen will look like and I was very impressed After finalizing all the estimate materials colors and the price Oren went back to his office in order to generate a schedule work plan so I will know what and when my new kitchen will be ready The work went pretty smooth and it went according to the schedule plan that Oren did The workers were nice and polite as well and Oren visited the house almost every day to make sure that the work is going according to plan A month and a half after my kitchen was completed and it came out even better than the one that I saw in the design

Very good company and people to work with Originally we were interesting in removing a wall in the dining room area that will show a bigger open space We spoke to several companies and we came across SOD builders We loved the fact that they are having multiple offices with lots of years of experience and that in our initial meeting we were able to get all the answers for our questions and the ideas that could improve our house Oren is a great communicator person and he has a good amount of knowledge when it comes to remodeling and design He met with us several times and he also was able to give us a price that was very comparable to the other ones we got The work started with the removal of the wall and it continued from there to the kitchen and bathrooms We rebuild the space for the bath tub prior to the new installation of it and floor We couldnt have been more pleased Oren did expert work very cleaned and detailed They worked up daily and they were so nice and pleasant people  We are so thrilled with this bathroom  We had no idea it would look so nice I cant recommend this company enough SOD builders is the one stop shop place they provide everything that you will need for the job  If you are looking to upgrade or remodel your bath or kitchen go with them

We hired SOD BUILDERS as the first project we decided to NOT complete ourselves due to some difficulties that came up and it was too much for us Were typically DIYers and we are pretty good at it if we do say so Our kitchen project was much larger in scope than we could tackle and a friend recently had SOD BUILDERS complete their kitchen We didnt shop around and we trusted on our friend recommendation and we also saw the finished kitchen that they did Our initial meeting with Oren just gave us all the information we needed in order to give the approval for this project We were paired up with Oren who visited our home listened to our ideas and took them to the next level His details and space planning expertise was good  complemented by Juan to help select finishes This was also the first time I put my trust in others to select or at least to help us with finding finishes and materials Their pricing for this project was reasonable and worthy the project management and coordination was painless and the overall results are stunning

My husband and I purchased our home in last year that needed of lot of remodeling  The house was in a very bad condition and it needed to be fully renovated From our past experience we knew how the process was going but we were fully committed to finding the right contractor for this and to get this renovation project going and complete It pretty sad to see that no one in my family friends or neighbors were able to refer someone they had used in the past because they had such a bad experience during or after the remodeling We interviewed pretty much a lot of contractors but we must say that Eran from SOD builders was the most honest and pleasant contractor weve met from all the other ones From the very beginning he told us what to expect and what we need to do before hiring A contractor He initially told us we need an architect to change the structure and layout of the house We tried to differ from his advice but we realized he was right about hiring the architect We needed an architect to legally change the structure and layout of our house Eran invested time to gain our trust by presenting to us some of his previous jobs for reference His estimate SOD builders was not extremely low which means his work was not low quality but it was not extremely high either it was in the middle  We believe his price was very fair and reasonable for all the amount of work we required Now after the work is completes I can write that I am very happy we decided to hire him for this project 
From the moment Eran took over this project his team has made this process a lot easier for us they completed the demolition of our home in 4 days which was impressive They began by leveling out the floors and created the new layout of our home right after They were knowledgeable well experienced and they followed all the steps and stages in the plans Everything that was on paper was coming to life right before our eyes and it was an unforgettable experience The footing  foundation are very solid the framing exterior finishing and the interior finishing were remarkable and used great materials Overall his team are highly skilled contractors and I will forever be grateful for their talent and exceptional customer service His team was extremely professional respectful hardworking and reliable individuals They were always united always on time and always available to answer our questions It was such a beautiful pleasant experience that I will always speak very highly of SOD builders and I will never trust anyone else other than this team to do work in my house or any other project I may face in the near future

We had a great experience with Oren from SOD builders Oren was able to do a good job at our house remodeling the master bathroom and bedroom of our kids with his bathroom too
The bathroom in our kids room is jack and Jill that has a showertub with large vanity The decision to work with Oren and his workers was taken after several meetings with him and his designer Michelle Michelle was very creative with her ideas about what to do and Oren explained to us each step and stage of the remodeling The materials were selected by Oren and he gave us several options after he learned what we would like to do and what type of styles we love The work in the bathroom included the removal all the old tiles bath tub and shower and install new ones with the design that we selected The work came out very good and it brought a new life to the bathroom including the new shower handles Paint vanity with sink and faucet
The master bedroom required more work due to the age of it We wanted to have marble floor and special tiles all over the walls paint and some extra storage cabinets that will allow us to have extra space Oren worked with his workers on this project on a daily basis and the remodeling came out very good Oren was able to assign 2 teams of workers to our house and to make sure that the work will end according to schedule

Oren from SOD builders is great general contractor I have ever hired A close friend recommended him and I couldnt be happier Oren first did some smaller jobs like replacing all our toilets with watersaving models He also fixed a serious leakage problem that we didnt know about because it was caused by the flooring people not putting in the correct toilet seal The musty smell that we couldnt find is now gone He finished a bathroom remodel tearing out the vinyl showertub and replacing it with a Jacuzzi whirlpool tub The bathroom was quite large and now looks even larger not to mention beautiful He and his workers on the tub and tile installation that was complex and timeconsuming I was especially happy that he was able to adjust what I wanted to do to keep me within my budget by suggesting different tiling pattern choices We went with his suggestions and it is so much better than what we were going to do We would highly recommend Oren for repair work and remodels though we hope he doesnt get too busy We have started a new todo list for him

This company SOD Builders proved to me how great they are Its hard to remodel a house especially when you don t know where to start from or what to begin with I found SOD Builders on several places including a magazine and I called to their office and spoke to Sofia Sofia scheduled an appointment with Oren and she also called me an hour before to confirm the appointment Oren came over and after a 2 hours meeting he was able to give me an estimate for the kitchen He was so good of explaining the all the building and safety codes so I was pretty amazed with his knowledge He didnt push me to sign anything like other companies did and he wanted to have another meeting with me in order to show me a design of the new kitchen I liked that so after the second appointment and looking at his new design of the kitchen I decided to hire him His team of demolition people carpenters framers etc Was so knowledgeable and clean This guys do know how to take care of customers and how to work clean and good Oren was coming almost every day to check the work and go over the details with me again in order to make sure we dont miss anything and that Im happy with the current progress The job turn out great Oren made sure that I will not have to pay any other fee more over the contract I would recommend him to all my friend I am very HAPPY

Oren with SOD builders was the Manager that managed our remodeling project and his end results work and schedule was just perfect  I know when usually you start a remodeling project of any kind you figure the schedule to be very flexible and the remodeling project to always take weeks or months to finish beyond what the contractor says but in my review here I would like to tell you that Oren and his crew of people finished on time  All the workers worked every day and did not miss one day or late and the work was without any doubt top notch  I had really nothing to complain about  Therefore Oren and SOD builders deserve this positive  What I liked most in this remodeling was that Oren made sure that the workers will know exactly what do each day and that all the materials will be at the house waiting for them and not the other way around

I had two bathrooms completely remodeled with SOD builders Oren Oren did a great  quality work and delivered 100 on budget I was concerned about any hidden problems or charges at first since I had some concern there were few leaking pipes behind the wall that might have caused an issue Oren and his guys did a thorough probe testing before starting and making their estimates Everything ended up very well and I got two beautiful new bathrooms even though it was one week behind schedule but completely on budget which was great thing after all Our experiences with Oren The supervisor and the Designer on top of the tradesmen were 100 positive They took our need to leave in the house a fully functioning bathroom at all time and made it happen I must mentioned that several other companies told us clearly that it will be impossible to have it when I got an estimate from them  that was also more reasons to what SOD builders gave us and lived up to I am very pleased with our choice and the results

I have no complains about this company and the people that worked at my house At my house Oren sent 4 workers that came over and did all the paint work They covered everything and made sure to move all the bulky items so they wont get damaged After they finished the work they returned and arranged the items and then moved to the next area Oren assigned to my house his supervisor Charlie and he visited the house several times during the work time and made sure that we are happy and that there are no problems Most of the paint work was a sponge paint with 2 colors but the common areas were with a special paint which took longer to do Im very happy with this company and I highly recommend them for any paint work

SOD builders just finished a full remodeling of our house It all started with our meeting with Oren and Michele by measuring and understanding what we want to do Michele came over several times and presented to us her designs and Oren was the person that tried each time to improve the space and to maximize the quality of the materials The remodeling started with the Kitchen and bathroom at the same stage of work while the work in the kitchen in process Oren and his workers started to work on the dining room  laundry room The plumbing and main rain replacement repairs work was done by several of his people and they did a great job in that part too The kitchen that we remodeled was with oak wood and included an island counter tops new outlets and appliances
The hallways contained several closets and storage spaces that were designed and installed by Oren and his people All exterior windows and texture coated the exterior of our house We had never before taken on anything like this and Oren walked us through every step of the way from permitting to code to design explaining what needed to be done in realistic steps The crew of workers showed up to the house on time every day and did a very professional job in all respects Any difficulties were taken care of immediately by either Oren or Avi Many great ideas came from these 2 and also from Michel The proof that SOD builders are great company is at the end results as now we have a beautiful home with all the modern touches and for much less than other bids that had much less work involved Everything that Oren said he would do he did I would recommend SOD builders for any size job you have in mind they stand by their word

SOD builders provided us with an amazing customer service throughout the process of the remodeling from start to end Their prices were very competitive It doesnt get much better than this We were having foundation work done on my elderly mothers home in LA We arranged this remotely via a friend that recommended us to Avi and Oren Avi took time care and patience to make sure that the remodeling will be comfortable with the process and to answer each and every one of our questions This alone makes us recommend them as highly as possible Customer service of this level is very very rare today The work that they did was managed by Oren Oren brought his 3 men team and made sure they will do an amazing work and as fast as they could  I would use this company again without any hesitation Id give 6 stars if I could

we LOVE LOVE LOVE SOD builders this is the THIRD time we are using them over the last ten years each for progressively bigger and bigger jobs they are so kind and on top of stuff and just get it done they have a manager assigned to the task so you have someone you can always call and they have someone for everything just whatever you need and they do it right 
whether it was little finishing touches or knowing just how to redo our old hardwood floors what sink to put in how to fix our cabinets fixing the deck outside making our outdoor area a beautiful patio space we now love making beautiful built ins for us interior and exterior painting fencing electrical refreshing our kitchen so that now it is just gorgeous all of it just done perfectly 
literally i cannot say enough good things i would never ever use another contractor working with SOD feel like you have an uncle in the business that you can just call when you need help and you know will be taken care of like family 

HIGHLY RECOMMEND

Great company and people to deal and work with The main thing that I liked in this remodeling was the communication and the care that Oren showed me He gave me the feeling that his is remodeling his own bathroom and he cared for every detail in the remodeling The bathroom remodeling that I did started with the selection of all the materials color combinations and all the hardware that Oren will install in the bathroom Oren planned everything pretty good and he made sure not to have any extra materials so the total amount will remain the same At the end of the remodeling the total price was the same as the original estimate and this meant a lot to me because I heard so many stories where the final price become higher due to extra items that the contractor add during the remodeling

We had the need to enlarge the bathroom and to add a bath tub We spoke to several contractors and companies about this project and we met with few of them When we spoke to SOD builders The person that we spoke with was very nice and polite She scheduled a meeting with Adam Adam came over at the time frame that was scheduled ahead by the office and he was the person that was able to give us a good quote for that and we were able to speak to some of his past After we approved the quote and gave our OK to start Adam sent his workers to start work The work started with the demolition of the existing bathroom and adding the new frames Then all the plumbing and drainage was completed with the lighting When all of that was completed they did all the drywall and paint including all the electricity The floor was one of the last items that they did and it came out great I want to mention that we enjoyed working with Adam and his team of workers They are nice and professional people

We recently had a master bath and a guest bath remodel with SOD BUILDERS
Their project manager Lance was very helpful in choosing the right materials and answered all our questions in every step
The team was very friendly respectful and cleaned every day the work was done
Although some issuesextra fixes came up they could finish project on time
Best customer service from the office too
Love our new baths

This was my first remodel and it was a large project for a small space SOD was very professional from the beginning I never felt nickel and dimed which is typical for construction companies in this market The workers project managers and management were very responsive and focused on making sure I was happy with the work The quality of the remodel was excellent Ive gotten so many compliments from guests who have seen my gorgeous new bathrooms

Look no further The construction team from SOD Builders saved my life after a stupid contractor disappeared leaving my house roof bathroom and kitchen unfinished he left trash all over and my roof was openuncovered and literally exposed to the rainwind and weather
I found SOD Builders on HOUZZ and made a decision to hire them after interviewing Oren and Michelle 
They were able to address the issues we had and found ways to help us to complete the work in minimum time and cost 
Me and my wife cant explain how we thank this company since they are our new angels
Thank you  thank you  Thank you
We are going to recommend SOD to anyone who need construction and home improvement work

Weve remodeled several homes and SOD Builders was by far the best experience weve ever had working with contractors 
We remodeled our entire home and added 800SF to the back of the house
The build pool house we cant wait to use it this coming summer Either Oren or Adam was on the Job Site almost every day the workman were courteous and cleaned up after themselves and the job was finished ahead of scheduled and turned out beautiful We could not give a higher recommendation Excellent company to work with

Ive been waiting for awhile to write this review I was genuinely hoping things would have worked out between us and SOD but that was not the case To be completely upfront we never got to the actual buildingconstruction part of our relationship with SOD We worked with them for over a year and ultimately left with a sour taste in our mouth over the whole experience Im giving two stars because even though we didnt end up working with them their designer Michele sp and some of their staff were great to work with 

We wanted to do the following to our home
Remodel master bathroom
Master bedroom  Install new flooring paint and sliding glass doorone window replaced They quoted 10000 for just this  FYI
Stairs  refinished
Living  build a custom bar resurface fireplace

We reached out to SOD through Houzz and they were prompt to reply They sent someone out to give us a quote Everything went fine and we called a few times after that but never received the quote After a few months we were slow to followup too they sent someone else out to give us another quote as it had been awhile since the first guy had come out to our house Thats when we started working with Michael and things went terribly from that point on I mean very very terribly 

Michael came out and did a walk through of the house with us He was having a hard time grasping what we wanted and wasnt understanding our vision On top of that we were having a hard time understanding him and what was included in their services At this point we were becoming frustrated but Michael assured us everything would be fine After a month we received the quote from him It was extremely poorly written and we couldnt tell what was included and what wasnt We had three separate phone calls with Michael and still couldnt tell what we were getting We said we wanted to think it over for a few weeks After a month we again contacted Michael and asked about the price difference between adding a bathtub to the master or not He then told us we would need to pay him 5000 for an architectural designer before he would do anymore with us This set off major red flags for us We were told before that design was included with SOD Michael then said he was going to be out of town but he wanted to send his colleague Ram to our home to see it and take some measurements that he missed We thought that was weird but agreed to call and setup a time with Ram After speaking with Ram it became VERY clear to Ram and to us that Michael hadnt work for SOD in over a month and Ram was very panicky because he thought Michael had told us when he clearly hadnt The most alarming part was NO ONE FROM SOD EVER CALLED US TO TELL US So we almost signed a contract with some other company and didnt even know it

At that point we called SOD and I feel like we were super reasonable since they never bothered to tell Michaels clients he had left the company We just asked to meet with someone else They sent their designer out to our home She was great and really restored our faith in SOD When the owner returned he came out and sent us a new quote We were discouraged to see the same quote style from Michael and ended up having to have ANOTHER call with the owner to figure out what was included and what wasnt We solved it by making a spreadsheet since about 10 items we asked for didnt show up in the quote AT ALL After that we took their final numbers and compared them to what Michael provided us in his first quote when he actually worked for SOD and they were much higher We approached the owned about the difference and he said  doesnt matter I wont go down to that price So he wouldnt honor a price his former employee made and we spoke to SOD again 

They never called us after that They never made any attempt to do right by us even though they basically set us up with someone who tried to defraud us I am honestly just 100 disappointed in the whole experience 

I think they do great remodelconstruction work if you can get past the poorly explained process bad company organization and lack of customer service We didnt and we lost a year of our lives to it I would not recommend SOD to anyone and I dont think they care about what they did to us or how our project was handled

I met with Eran from SOD last Spring and he had a lot of great ideas for my kitchen and bath remodel Their bid was very competitive and I selected SOD to do the project One of the key differentiation was that Eran did 3D renderings of the space and we went through several rounds before finalizing the scope of work This was a great way to finalize all of the details in a visual way which saved me on hiring a designer and undoubtedly saved a lot of rounds of changes once construction began Throughout the project everyone from SOD was incredibly responsive and Eran was my point of contact throughout the entire project Hes easy to work with highly serviceoriented and always available by phonetext or email

SOD has a large team with plumbers electricians and provides full services  from counters to flooring and shower doors The quality of the work was very high and they were also receptive to getting the smallest details just right I was most impressed after the job finished when Eran and team went above and beyond to make sure that every last detail was taken care of

SOD is an entrepreneurial modern construction company and I would use them again

I would definitely use SOD again for any future remodeling projects During the initial process of getting bids from various vendors they were not the cheapest or the most expensive but they had the best customer service and that is what won me over This being the first time Ive ever done a remodel I went over every detail of the bid and checked their referrals licenses insurance coverage etc Even before I committed Daniel was super great at responding and answering all of my questions and putting me at ease The process was painless and pressure free and I very much appreciate their approach

Daniel was an absolute pleasure to work with and his team did a wonderful job They were polite courteous considerate they made sure to cover areas that they would be walking through cleaned up the area daily etc and very accommodating during the entire process especially with changes along the way They remodeled both bathrooms at the same time from demolition to finish It was hard living with both bathrooms being done simultaneously and seeing as how these were my only bathrooms in my home my musthave was to have a working toilet during the remodel showering could be done elsewhere but a working toilet was deal breaker for me They not only finished ahead of schedule total time about 5 weeks but they also did a few extras for me ie installing a ceiling fan replacing hallway ceiling lights The results were remarkable and I couldnt be more pleased with the results Ive received many compliments on the work and have referred them to several friends and coworkers and will continue to do so

I would not hesitate to use them again When I remodel my kitchen I plan on using them again

I chose SOD for a complete kitchen remodel and plumbing upgrade Working with the designer Michelle was a pleasure  She had a clear sense of what we were looking for and knew just when to offer her opinion as we were sorting through the dizzying array of options  When the building actually began everyone at SOD was easy to contact the crew always professional  There were a few glitches but they were minor nothing out of the ordinary for such an extensive job 

Early in the process Oren the owner of the company told me that he would do whatever it took to make sure I was happy at the end of the joband he completely delivered  There was no request that wasnt honored no small issue that was ever contested They never made me feel picky even though there were times I felt that way  Oren called me a few months after the job was done to make sure I was happy  When I mentioned a few minor issues that had come up a cabinet door was sticking and the faucet had worked a little loose he had someone come out within a day to take care of them SOD didnt give me the cheapest bid they werent the most expensive either for the record but its worth a little extra money to find a builder that does beautiful work and is willing to work with you to make sure youre satisfied

Oren the general contractor gave us a bid that was reasonable and when he came to our house he brought his designer Michelle who showed us pictures and gave us ideas about what could be done to our house  Michelle was with us to help pick out tile granite slabs paint colors and cabinet styles  The job itself had one hicup but was remidied by Oren  The foremanwoman that was assigned to our job told us that if we had any questions we could call her day or night and she would be available  This turned out not to be the case and Oren eventually let her go and we were given a new foreman Robert who was available whenever we needed help
   Overall everything went well  Oren had workers at our house just about every day and the workers were very professional in doing their jobs  They even swept up at the end of the day so we wouldnt track dust into the rest of the house  Our remodel started on January 6th and was completely finished by March 14th  I have waited until now 6 months after completion to see if anything went wrong before giving my review and I can honestly say that everything has held up well  No cracks in the drywall and no leaks anywhere  Given all that was accomplished in just over 2 months I would say that Oren and his crew did a wonderful job

I am extremely pleased with the job that SOD Builders did for me a full kitchen remodel including a complete gut and redesign of the room   The quality of their work was topnotch the workers were always professional respectful and friendly   In particular SODs designer was very helpful in bringing my vision to life

No project of this magnitude is completely glitch free but SOD was very responsive to my every request  This is not a contractor you have to worry about deserting you midjob  

The answer to the ultimate question Would I hire them again for other work is Absolutely  Though it took a bit longer than I would have liked to complete the job in the end I couldnt be happier with the results  I will enjoy this space for decades to come

We absolutely love Oren and SOD Builders Inc  After meeting with multiple contractors to remodel our entire home and we added 1500SF to it Oren was a breath of fresh air  He wasnt pushy like most other contractors  Instead he was polite knowledgeable trustworthy and professional  This project was our first remodel pretty massive for first remodel and we didnt know anything about the process  Oren guided us through everything from start to finish He listened carefully to what we wanted gave us suggestions and showed us lots of examples on his computer of other homes he had remodeled and build  Lance and Michelle went with us to stores to help us pick out everything in our homeappliances tile and counters They built us all custom cabinets  He was patient and supportive always offering his perspective and advice and helping us make color and style decisions  He Michelle our head designer and the rest of their team were all a pleasure to work with  They were hardworking polite knowledgeable paid attention to every detail and showed true pride in their work  Lesmi checked in with us every day either by phone call or by email  The crew cleaned up at the end of each day  The team was so efficient that despite us adding a few additional projects along the way they finished the project ahead of schedule  And we are extremely happy with our new home  It is more beautiful than we could have imagined and we are so thankful to Oren and his team  We have already recommended SOD Builders to family and friends and are looking forward to having him redo our rental home in the near future

We called SOD to start a kitchen remodel  During the time they quoting us on the kitchen our hall bathrooms pipes exploded and we decided this project was more pressing  We were glad that we got to work with this company on a smaller project before tackling the huge project of our kitchen remodel  SOD did an awesome job with the bathroom  We are extremely happy with our new modern bathroom It is beautiful  We always felt comfortable with all the specialists that came to work on the house The work they did was top notch  Any questions or concerns we had during the project were addressed quickly  They also helped us to figure out design details and since this is not my forte we really appreciated the guidance  

We were so happy with the bathroom remodel that they are working on our kitchen now  It is coming together beautifully  I would absolutely recommend them for any project that you have

We love our kitchen and whats even more amazing we still love everyone at SOD  Through every step of the way we felt like Oren Michelle and team did everything in their power to give us exactly what we wanted or as was often the case something better than we could have imagined   We are a bit clueless on the design front  We knew we wanted a Dwell worthy high end kitchen that had warmth and natural stone elements while still being sleek and modern We had no idea how to do this  Michelle helped us design the kitchen change the layout reposition things and redesign the kitchen again  She helped us select materials match stain samples hardware everything And this call me anytime and I will pick up or call you immediately service is just part of the deal Its how SOD operates 

If there was ever anything that we were unhappy about it was addressed immediately I believe someone came out three times to make sure the wall of cabinetry fit into the soffit line perfectly We chose an incredibly difficult tile to install for our backsplash Each tile is individually cut and affixed to paper  The tiler pulled out individual tiles that we felt were too dark or light or misshapen dozens of them until it looked perfect They were very accommodating when working with the Miele specs for the custom panel refrigerator and even redid a panel when we saw a blemish The cabinetry makers SOD uses are craftsmen and you can tell when you look at the end result and feel the substantial drawers and cabinets in your hand The cabinetry and drawer hardware used is on par with what Poggenpohl and Boffi  After months and months of hard use I still get a little thrill every time the drawers soft close smoothly 

When we were conducting our search we were looking for quality excellent customer service and affordability SOD provides all of these NOT ONCE did we feel taken advantage of or overcharged in any way Our quote did not change  There werent any hidden costs or fees  In fact we found that we were so on budget that we were able to splurge on our cabinet hardware and backsplash

It has been nine months and we have not had a single issue with anything in our kitchen  It is still beautiful it still looks new and it is very very user friendly  This is a kitchen used and abused by children but appreciated by adults 

We couldnt be happier and will use SOD again in the near future

Professional clean knowledgable and punctual They finished building our new roof before a week was over and did not leave a mess 

Id definitely hire them again

I sent an urgent request to SOD builder to get a bid for my bathrooms and garage remodeling project due to the water damage at home SOD customer service was really nice After I canceled my first appointment they were able to schedule a project manager to visit my place according to my time The project Manager was helpful and professional We got the estimates within 3 days

I had a guest bathroom remodel job and met with approximately four contractors SOD Builders came in with a cost that was within our budget We broke the job up into two stages the first was a demo of a 3x3 shower and build a walk in tile shower that can accommodate ageing parents with a grab bar shower bar soap shelf and seat New tile was laid and our new shower was a nice combo of large tile glass tile mosaic and stainless steel appointments and a seat Oren and his crew took about two weeks for the complete job which also included installing a shower light fan combo paint and trim The second portion of the rebuild was the installation of a new vanity and placing tile where the old vanity once stood This vanity was not made for a corner and SOD builders took the marble splash guard and matched it to another piece to create a corner vanity unit We are very pleased with the work performed and the crew that worked on this job We would highly recommend SOD builders for your construction  remodel jobs

Services provided
Completely remodeled the kitchen updated 2 bathrooms completely remodeled the master bathroom relocated the laundry room installed attic insulation replaced all windows and interiorexterior doors and installed wood flooring

Details
Oren and Michal his designer were fantastic to work with  Oren and Michal both met with us to walk through our home and understand the project we wanted to do  Orens bid was competitive but the biggest reason we decided to hire him is because we could see how passionate he is about his work and we felt that Michals vision was a perfect match for the look and feel we were going for

Michal was very helpful in the planning phase and helped design our kitchen layout and cabinets as well as our master bathroom  She was also extremely helpful when it came time to start picking finishes  She totally understood our style and helped us narrow down design options  In addition she was not afraid to let us know when she felt that we may be making choices that we could regret  We greatly valued her opinions and support

We had bought an older home that needed a lot of updating and improvement so the job was quite big  Luckily we were not living in the home during the remodel  However we stopped by to check the progress at least a couple of times per week and were always impressed that the workers cleaned up after themselves each day and stored their tools even though they knew we werent living there  Whenever we did see the workers they were always pleasant and courteous  

About midway through the project Orens foreman leading up our project left the company  This caused some delays but the new foreman Hector was even better than the first and did everything he could to help make up for lost time  We had told Oren from the beginning that he could take his time because we werent in any hurry to move in we were living at my fathers house so that I could take care of him until he passed away from cancer  The project was completed about 2 months behind schedule but we had added some work to the original scope and wanted Oren to take his time to make sure everything was done exactly how we wanted it  

We have now lived in our home for about 3 months  After we moved in we began to notice certain issues and defects and kept a running list of items to be fixed  Oren sent his crew back out about a month ago and fixed everything on our list with great attention to detail  We could not be any happier with our new old home

We have worked with other contractors on smaller projects at our previous homes before and they always quoted us much lower but the final bill was much higher and the quality of the work was lacking  We paid Oren exactly what he originally quoted us and are very happy with the results  We would highly recommend Oren for his professionalism attention to detail and passion for his work  He is an honest person and demands the same level of honesty and quality from his crew

I was impressed by SOD Builders commitment to satisfaction We had lots of small details that we wanted to do right and Oren was absolutely willing to get all the little things done properly and without a charge The most impressive thing was that we agreed on a price at the start and Oren stuck to it even when it would cost him extra money to get right

They did also a very good job of keeping my place clean keeping things running while doing construction and overall being very responsible and with a great regard to quality

SOD Builders is a onestop shop to my dream house  With a complete team of project manager designer architect licensed plumberelectrician tilefloor specialists painters carpenters they can put together pretty much any requests that you may dream up for your projects  They did a gut renovation for me on an entire floor including demolishing and rebuilding a kitchen and 2 bathrooms removing popcorn ceiling and smoothing out textured walls updating all plumbing and electrical and putting in new hardwood floor  SOD Builders provided highquality work expert advice and topnotch customer services  The one thing the owner Oren said to me most often during the project was whatever makes you happy well do it and they do  They are very flexible to unexpected changes and always accommodating to the needs of the customers  I picked out all the floors and tiles I wanted and the project manager Adi helped me looked all over California to find the best prices for the materials  When a part of the fireplace didnt turn out looking like the design I had in mind they immediately sent a team to rebuild the area to change it to look exactly like what I wanted  For the bathrooms we decided to put up tiles on all walls we originally thought since all the walls were also newly built installing the cement boards under the tiles would be sufficient enough but Oren insisted on using the floating cement because he believes the method makes the bathrooms much more durable and provides better quality even though it was more costly to him and took longer to build  There were many examples like these throughout the project  I would highly recommend SOD Builders to anyone

We first heard of SOD through another review company  They had the highest review rate and highest score  So we gave them a call  

My wife and I had a very good idea of what we wanted and how much we were willing to spend  I had originally built this bathroom and addition so I had a base knowledge in construction  When SOD arrived they were very professional and respectful and came with a slew of referrals  They listened to our ideas and then offered modifications to enhance our vision  We were very happy with all their changes to our initial design and even more delighted in that most of these opinions actually lowered our costs  Their offer was many thousands below the nearest competitor and their ideas were superior to any views we had previously heard  Their time frame was 3 weeks from start of demo to final inspection
